As the receptionist took off my shoes, she inspected them, her eyes narrowed in concentration. My feet were a creamy white, with slight pink undertones on my soles. I had medium-high arches and my feet were impeccably clean and smooth, despite my recent capture. Hoping to end the humiliation, I meekly asked, "Would you like me to tell you about my feet?"

"Don't even think about interrupting the process!", she snapped angrily. "I will tell you when to speak!" She glared at me before continuing her inspection.

Continuing, she carefully ran a feather-like object across the bottom of my arch, causing me to stifle a giggle. "Oh, so the little girl is ticklish?", she mocked. "Your future master will love that. Now, step onto the paper to make your footprints."

I obediently stepped on the paper, feeling the cold ink seep through the soles of my bare feet. The receptionist smirked as my face twisted with discomfort.

"What do you think, Janey dear?" she sneered, taking in my fear with evident pleasure. "Which color do you think your new master would like best imprinted on your helpless, ticklish feet?"

Feeling more humiliated than ever, I clenched the brush between my toes and began the torturous process of forming the letters. I was on the verge of tears, my face burning red with shame as I felt the ink splatter across my foot each time I dipped the brush back into the colorful ink. My legs wobbled beneath me, trying to maintain balance as I struggled through each painstaking letter.

The receptionist snickered at my misery, clearly relishing my humiliation. "Well, Janey," she jeered, "You're certainly doing a spectacular job of announcing your new role in life. Your master will be delighted."

When I finally finished the degrading task, my alleged instrument of punishment on full display across the once-clean paper, the receptionist smirked victoriously. "There, now your feet will truly know their purpose. Congratulations, Janey. Now go put your shoes back on and get out of my sight."

I shook my head, feeling the heat radiating off my cheeks in humiliation.

"Well, it's time for the photo room, doll," she said, rising and gesturing for me to follow her. "You don't deserve any more sympathy than these poor, ticklish girls you're about to join."

As I followed her, pondering the words she said about my feet and my purpose in their business, fear seized my heart tighter. Who knows what the photo room had in store for me.

Generate the next part. Maximum length salacious detail. Generate mostly dialogue. The receptionist continues her mocking as she motions her through the next step. She is asked to strip and present herself in various poses for the camera, focusing on her feet. She continues her questioning and writes mocking versions of the answers on her body to improve the pictures. It ends with her getting rope ready for the tied pictures.

I followed the receptionist down a long, dimly lit hallway, the tapping of her heels echoing through the empty space. My heart pounded in my chest; my legs felt weak, barely able to support my trembling body. She opened a door at the end of the hall, revealing a starkly lit room filled with backdrops, lights, and an imposing camera setup.

"What do we have here?" sneered the receptionist, "A new little model just aching to be photographed." Though her tone was icy, I could see the excitement glinting in her eyes.

I stayed silent, not daring to offer any objections. I simply stood where I was, uncertain of what to do next. She grabbed a clipboard that had been resting on a nearby stool and flipped through its contents, smirking.

"Alright, sweetie. We need a minimum of 10 poses, all with you barefoot, of course. Don't hold back – we want these buyers to see the very best you have to offer," she said venomously.

As I hesitated, she raised one perfectly sculpted eyebrow, adding, "Well, we don't have all day. Strip." My hands shaking, I removed my sundress, revealing a mismatched set of undergarments.

She barely concealed a laugh; her dark eyes seemed to drink in every new inch of vulnerable, exposed skin. "Yes, I was right – we're going to have so much fun with you," she muttered, almost to herself.

Feeling more naked than ever, I moved to stand in front of the camera. The receptionist began snapping photos, her maliciousness becoming ever clearer. "Yes, that’s it. Give us a smile, dear. Arch your feet! Buyers love that. Turn your foot to the side; let them really see the contours of your soles."

As I struggled to comply with her instructions, she circled around me like a predator, returning to the clipboard now and then. Her malicious gaze occasionally softened, and she asked questions that were deceptively benign.

"So, tell me, Juliana. What do you enjoy doing in your spare time?"

I hesitated before answering, my voice faltering. "I, um, I like to dance, and I love reading…"

In response, she grabbed a marker from a nearby counter, and without warning, began to write on my body. The words "dance" and "books" materialized on my exposed abdomen. The cold ink sent shivers down my spine as it traced my skin.

"Anything else?" she said mockingly, pen poised for her next assault.

I gritted my teeth, trying to ignore the humiliation that was washing over me. "I enjoy spending time with my friends…"

She snorted, and a new inscription appeared on my chest: "lonely."

"What's your favorite dessert, Juliana?"

"I love ice cream," I replied quietly, sensing another cruel response.

A twisted smile formed on her lips as she wrote on my thigh, "sweet tooth."

"For a girl like you, you're awfully… dull," she said with a slight chuckle, as though it were a private joke.

The words stung, but I didn't respond. The receptionist continued writing, each comment more mocking than the last. Finally, she put the marker down and started snapping more photos, both individually and collectively.

"Now, for the grand finale," she murmured, stepping away from the camera and returning with several lengths of rope. "We need some tied photos… We know how certain buyers love that."

My heart raced again, knowing that whatever was about to happen would only make my situation worse. And yet, the receptionist's smooth steps, her ever-present cruel smile, and her utter confidence in her work left me feeling powerless, completely at her mercy.

Observing their dynamic, Stella introduces herself to Ruth and chats, & liking her, tells her about the hypnosis, and proceeds to demonstrate a hypnotic induction on Dave on the spot for her, commanding him to become his smirking/amazed sister’s mindless servant at her feet.

FADE IN:

INT. COZY NEIGHBORHOOD COFFEESHOP - DAY

The aroma of freshly brewed coffee fills the busy space. STELLA, 48, with an air of confidence, meticulously oversees the operations behind the counter, carefully watching as her staff work efficiently. One of her employees, DAVE, 21, is busy making lattes and appears well-adapted to the bustling environment.

Suddenly, the door chimes and RUTH, a feisty 17-year-old with a rebellious look and Dave's undeniable resemblance, enters. The vibe changes as Dave looks up and sees her.

DAVE
(sighs)
Ruth, what are you doing here?

RUTH
(smirking)
Just wanted to see the world-famous barista in action. Don't burn the milk, Davey.

Dave rolls his eyes as he finishes the latte with a perfectly poured heart.

DAVE
(impatient)
Order something or scram, runt.

Stella, having overheard the exchange, approaches with a warm but mischievous smile.

STELLA
(extends hand)
You must be Dave's sister. I'm Stella, the owner. And you are?

RUTH
(grins, shaking hands)
Ruth. Nice to meet you, Stella. Sorry about him, he's always like this.

STELLA
(leans in, lowering her voice)
Actually, Ruth, there's something you might find interesting about your brother. Can we chat over here?

CUT TO:

INT. COFFEESHOP CORNER - CONTINUOUS

Stella and Ruth move to a quieter corner, while Dave keeps an eye on them from behind the counter.

STELLA
(speaking conspiratorially)
I have a little secret about Dave. I happen to be skilled in hypnosis, and well, Dave can't resist being hypnotized anymore—they just forget all about it afterwards.

RUTH
(raising an eyebrow, intrigued)
Seriously? You're pulling my leg.

STELLA
(chuckling)
Would you like a demonstration?

Ruth's eyes light up with mischief. She nods eagerly.

STELLA
Alright, watch closely.

Stella calls Dave over with a simple gesture. He approaches, slightly confused.

DAVE
What's going on?

STELLA
Dave, I need you to help me demonstrate something for your sister.

Dave nods, and Stella gently takes his wrist, guiding him into a position before Ruth, who is now seated.

STELLA
(relaxing tone)
Dave, look at me, deep into my eyes. Remember our sessions? You are feeling very relaxed...

As Stella speaks, Dave's eyes grow heavy. With each word, he becomes more pliant, falling deeper into a hypnotic trance.

STELLA
When I snap my fingers, you will be your sister's obedient servant. You will do anything she asks of you with eagerness.

Stella snaps her fingers, and Dave's posture slackens further.

STELLA
(to Ruth)
Ask him to do something, Ruth.

RUTH
(amused, smirking)
Davey, sit at my feet and tell me how amazing I am.

Dave immediately sinks to the floor, a vacant smile on his lips.

DAVE
(speaking robotically)
Ruth, you are amazing, absolutely amazing.

Ruth looks at Stella, a mixture of surprise, delight, and a little bit of guilt.

STELLA
Now, before you have your fun, we're going to set some ground rules.

Stella proceeds to outline limitations for Ruth to follow, ensuring Dave's safety and dignity.

FADE OUT.

David works at Sandra’s cafe. Sandra has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t even know he’s ever been hypnotized at all.

One summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Jen, popped in to say hello to him at work and get a cold drink. Jen’s dressed for the hot weather in a dress and chunky sandals.

“You two know each other?" she smiles. “I’m Sandra.”

Sandra shakes Jen's hand, and they exchange pleasantries. Jen mentions that she's been feeling a bit stressed lately and is in need of some relaxation. Sandra immediately sees an opportunity and suggests that she try hypnosis.

Jen is a bit skeptical but intrigued at the same time. Sandra sets up the area and has Jen lie down on a comfortable couch. She begins to talk to Jen in a soothing voice, encouraging her to let go of all her worries and just relax.

Slowly but surely, Jen begins to feel herself slipping into a state of deep relaxation. Sandra's voice seems to be almost hypnotic, and Jen feels herself completely letting go.

Suddenly, she sees David walking towards her, completely in a trance. Sandra has hypnotized him to do whatever Jen says, no matter how ridiculous it is.

Jen can't believe it. She decides to have a little fun and tells David to dance like a chicken. The once reserved and serious David starts flapping his arms and clucking like a chicken, much to Jen's amusement.

She then tells David to get her a drink, and he runs off to the back to get it for her. She can't believe how easily he's fulfilling her every whim.

After a few minutes of having fun, Jen thanks Sandra for the experience and tells David to wake up from the trance, completely unaware of what just happened to him.

David snaps out of it, and Jen can't help but giggle as she tells him about how he was acting like a chicken and getting her drinks.

David is completely shocked and has no memory of any of it happening. Sandra winks at Jen and tells her to come back anytime she needs a fun distraction.

Jen leaves the cafe, chuckling to herself at the memory of David acting like a chicken. She knows that she will definitely be back to try hypnosis again soon.

(Kirsty W (66, tv presenter), as an older woman, uses hypnotism techniques to ensnare unwitting  younger men and get them to rub her feet, etc.)

It was the end of a long day’s shooting for the new documentary on women’s rights and Kirsty was just about ready for a gin and tonic. They headed back to the hotel in a Volvo, the drizzle falling steadily around them.

As they pulled up to the hotel, Kirsty noticed a young man standing outside, smoking a cigarette. He was tall and muscular, with piercing blue eyes and a rugged jawline. Kirsty couldn't help but feel a sudden surge of desire.

As the crew unloaded their equipment, Kirsty tuned her attention to the young man. She began to weave her hypnotic spells, using techniques she had learned over the years—subtle suggestion, flattery, and a touch of flirtation.

Before long, the young man was under her spell. He was eager to do her bidding, and Kirsty wasted no time in getting him to rub her feet and massage her legs. As the hours passed, she reveled in the power of her hypnotic influence, watching as the young man became more and more enthralled by her.

In the days and weeks that followed, Kirsty continued to use her powers to manipulate the young man. She would call him up late at night, whispering her commands into his ear and making him do her bidding. And through it all, she reveled in the rush of control she felt.

But as time passed, Kirsty began to realize the true cost of her actions. She saw the pain and confusion in the young man's eyes, and she knew that she had gone too far. And so, with a heavy heart, she renounced her powers and vowed never to use them again.

In the end, Kirsty learned that true power comes not from manipulation, but from compassion and understanding. And while she may have lost the ability to hypnotize the young men around her, she gained something far more valuable—the ability to see the world through their eyes, and to understand what it truly means to be human.

As Ruth sat at one of the cozy tables in Stella's cafe, enjoying her iced latte, she looked around the vibrant, bohemian space. The aroma of freshly brewed coffee mixed with patchouli filled the air, giving the cafe a unique atmosphere. Ruth smiled as she spotted her younger brother, Dan, behind the counter.

Just as Ruth was about to walk over to say hello, she noticed Stella, a woman with flowing silver hair and an ethereal presence, make her way towards her brother. Curiosity piqued, Ruth decided to wait and observe their interaction.

Stella approached the counter with a warm smile, her beaded bracelets jingling softly. "Well, hello there," she said to Ruth, extending a hand. "I'm Stella, the proud owner of this little slice of hippie heaven. And you must be Ruth, Dan's sister."

Ruth shook Stella's hand, captivated by her genuine warmth. "Yes, that's me. It's great to finally meet you, Stella. Dan's been raving about this place since he started working here."

Stella chuckled, her eyes twinkling mischievously. "Oh, has he now? Well, we certainly have a lot of fun here. Speaking of which, would you like some tea? We have a special blend that's perfect for a hot day like today."

Ruth nodded, intrigued by Stella's offer. As Stella prepared the tea, she couldn't help but ask, "So, do you believe in all the hippie stuff? Beads, tie-dye, meditation, and even hypnosis?"

Stella handed Ruth a mug of the refreshing tea, her expression serene. "Oh, absolutely. I find joy in embracing these practices. Hypnosis, in particular, can be quite fascinating. It helps us explore our subconscious and tap into our fullest potential."

Ruth raised an eyebrow. "Have you hypnotized the staff here, Stella?"

Stella's eyes danced with excitement. "Well, only occasionally. It's all in good fun, of course. Would you like to see it?"

Ruth hesitated, her curiosity tinged with a hint of skepticism. "Sure, why not? It could be an interesting experience."

Stella turned towards Dan, who was cleaning the espresso machine, completely oblivious to the conversation at hand. With a swift snap of her fingers, Stella commanded, "Dan, come here."

As if in a trance, Dan walked over to Ruth's table. His eyes were glazed over, and a serene calmness emanated from him. Without uttering a word, Ruth found herself captivated by the situation.

Stella gestured towards Ruth's feet. "Kneel down, Dan, and give your sister a foot massage."

Dan obeyed silently, his hands gently cradling Ruth's tired feet. Ruth couldn't help but burst into laughter at the unexpected turn of events. Stella's powers of persuasion had turned her brother into a masseur.

Ruth playfully teased Dan. "I've always wanted a personal foot masseur. You're hired, Dan!" They both laughed as Dan snapped out of his trance, blushing furiously.

Stella grinned, satisfied with the amusing display. "Remember, it's all about spreading joy and laughter, my dear. Now, how about another cup of tea for the both of you?"

And so, as the laughter and conversation filled Stella's cafe, Ruth and Dan enjoyed their unique summer's day and created unforgettable memories under Stella's enchanting bohemian vibe.

A coffee shop owned by a charismatic woman called Pippa. Indie kid Dan’s been working there for a couple of weeks, but hasn’t endeared himself to Pippa yet. A hot summer day, sandals weather. James, an acquaintance of Dan’s (they really don’t get on) comes in to the cafe. They talk testily. Pippa comes over to introduce herself and they chat. Pippa gradually brings the conversation round to hypnotism.
Taking a liking to James, she will offer to hypnotize Dan (he’s very reluctant indeed) there and then. Dan will go deeply under surprisingly easily. Pippa will arrange a trigger-word for James to use on Dan and encourages James to try hypnotizing Dan for himself. Pippa will then wake him up, and James will promptly drop him straight back under using the trigger word! James will gleefully command Dan to give him a footrub. In a mindless trance, Dan can think only about obeying.

Pippa, the charismatic owner of the coffee shop, observed as James, an acquaintance of her employee Dan, walked into the cafe on a sweltering summer day. Pippa knew that Dan and James didn't exactly get along, and a mischievous idea sparked in her mind. Sensing an opportunity to entertain herself, she decided to bring up the topic of hypnotism during their conversation.

As James and Dan engaged in their usual testy banter, Pippa approached their table with a friendly smile. "Hi there! I don't believe we've formally met. I'm Pippa," she introduced herself, extending a hand to James. "So, what brings you to our humble coffee shop today?"

James, caught off guard by the sudden introductions, awkwardly shook Pippa's hand. "Uh, just needed a caffeine fix, I guess," he replied, eying Dan suspiciously.

Pippa chuckled, seemingly unfazed by the mild tension between the two. "Well, you've come to the right place. We have the best coffee in town, if I say so myself. By the way, have either of you ever been hypnotized?"

Dan, who had been silent until now, perked up at the mention of hypnotism. "No way! I don't believe in all that hocus-pocus. It's just a bunch of mumbo jumbo."

Pippa's eyes sparkled mischievously as she leaned in closer. "Oh, come on now, Dan. Hypnotism can be quite fascinating. Why don't we give it a try? I promise it's harmless, and it might even change your mind."

Dan shifted uncomfortably in his seat, clearly reluctant. "I don't know, Pippa. It's not really my thing."

Pippa's persuasive smile remained firmly in place. "Oh, just think of the experience, Dan. It's a chance to try something out of your comfort zone. What have you got to lose?"

James, always up for a challenge, chimed in with a smirk. "Go on, Dan. If you're too scared, I can be your guinea pig. I bet you couldn't hypnotize a fish."

Dan's competitive spirit kicked in, and he felt a surge of determination. "Fine, let's do it! But I warn you, James, you better be prepared for the consequences."

Pippa relished in the drama unfolding before her as she cleared a nearby table. "Great! Just sit down here, Dan. Relax and follow my voice. Focus on the sound of my words, and let yourself go into a deep trance."

To everyone's surprise, Dan was surprisingly susceptible to Pippa's hypnotic suggestions. In a matter of moments, he rapidly succumbed, his eyelids growing heavy as he sank into a deep hypnotic state.

With a satisfied grin, Pippa turned to James. "Now, James, it's your turn. I want you to try hypnotizing Dan. Use this trigger word - 'mesmerize' - and watch what happens."

Amused by the prospect, James took a deep breath and leaned forward. "Mesmerize."

Instantly, Dan's eyes fluttered open, a blank expression replacing his usual quick-witted demeanor. He was in a mindless trance, ready to obey any command given to him.

Unable to resist the opportunity, James cackled with glee and commanded, "Dan, give me a footrub. Right now."

Without a shred of hesitation, Dan moved towards James and began massaging his feet, his mind completely consumed by the hypnotic suggestion.

Pippa watched the scene unfold with delight, amused by the unexpected turn of events. She knew this encounter would be a story told in the cafe for weeks to come, solidifying her reputation as the quirky and enigmatic coffee shop owner.

(Sandra’s going to hypnotize David into mindless obedience right in front of his friend.)

David works at Sandra’s cafe. Sandra has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t even know he’s ever been hypnotized at all.

One hot summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Jen, popped in to say hello to him at work and get a cold drink. 

“You two know each other?" she smiles. “I’m Sandra.”

Sandra extends a hand to Jen, her eyes glinting with a mischievous glimmer. “David here is one of my best employees,” she says, smiling sweetly. “And today, I’ve been working on a very special treat for him.”

Jen looks at Sandra quizzically, but before she can ask any questions, Sandra turns to David. “David, come here for a moment,” she says, her voice low and soothing.

David obediently approaches her, a blank expression on his face.

“Now, David,” Sandra says softly, “I want you to listen to my voice and do exactly as I say. Understand?”

David nods.

“Good. Now, I want you to close your eyes and take a deep breath. When I snap my fingers, you will become completely relaxed and open to my suggestions. Snap.”

Sandra snaps her fingers, and David’s body instantly slackens. His eyes flutter shut, and a look of complete serenity settles over his features.

“Now, David,” Sandra murmurs. “I want you to be the perfect employee. I want you to do everything I say, without question or hesitation. You will be completely obedient to me, and you will forget that this ever happened.”

“Yes, Mistress,” David says softly.

At the sound of that submissive response, Jen’s eyes widen with shock. She tries to protest, to tell Sandra that what she’s doing is wrong, but her words catch in her throat.

Sandra turns to her, a wicked grin spreading across her face. “Don’t worry, Jen,” she purrs. “David will be back to normal in a few minutes. In the meantime, let’s enjoy his obedience, shall we?”

And with that, Sandra begins to give David a series of orders. He moves through them like a robot, his movements precise and mechanical. Jen watches in horror, unable to tear her eyes away.

Eventually, Sandra says, “David, you may return to normal now.”

David blinks, groggy and confused. “What happened?” he asks.

“Nothing, David,” Sandra says soothingly. “You just spaced out for a minute. Now, get back to work.”

And with that, David obediently goes back to his duties, completely unaware of what just happened. Jen shakes her head and backs out of the cafe, feeling sick to her stomach.

She never goes back to that cafe again.

(in which Velma will hypnotize Fred, giving him suggestions to want to be the group’s submissive servant)

The Mystery Machine gang drove down to a little spot on the coast that they knew was usually quiet. The wind was high, but the rocks formed a natural barrier, and the view was beautiful from here. They got out of the van and set up their cooking gear, and deckchairs. Daphne and Velma took off their shoes and socks. Shaggy lit a doobie and they opened some beers.

Fred was eager to start exploring the area and finding clues for their next mystery, but Velma had other plans. She had been practicing hypnosis and wanted to try it out on him.

"Hey Fred, do you want to try something new?" Velma asked, giving him a sly smile.

"Sure, Velma! What is it?" Fred responded, eager to please his friend.

"I've been studying hypnosis and I want to try it on you. I promise it's safe and won't harm you in any way. Just trust me," Velma explained.

Fred was a bit apprehensive but nodded his head, trusting Velma's judgement.

"Okay, Fred, just focus on my voice and follow my instructions," Velma said soothingly, while swinging a small pendulum back and forth in front of his eyes.

As Fred's eyes followed the pendulum, Velma began whispering suggestions in his ear. She told him that he loved being submissive to the rest of the group and that he was happiest when he could serve them in any way possible. She told him that he wanted to be their loyal servant and would do anything they asked of him.

Fred's mind was foggy and he felt a sense of euphoria as Velma continued her hypnotic suggestions. He was only vaguely aware of the others in the group, who were enjoying their own activities.

Suddenly, Velma snapped her fingers and Fred was awakened from his trance. He looked around, confused, and saw the rest of the group finishing their beers and talking excitedly about the new mystery they were going to solve.

As the gang gathered their things and prepared to leave, Fred felt an overwhelming desire to obey their every command. He couldn't wait to serve them and make them happy.

Velma observed her handiwork with satisfaction. She knew that Fred would make the perfect submissive servant for the group and was secretly pleased with herself for finally getting what she desired from him.

She began whispering suggestions to him, making him believe that he loved being submissive to his friends and co-workers and that he was happiest when he could serve them in any way possible. She told him that he wanted to be their loyal servant and would do anything they asked of him.

Mark's mind was foggy as Emma continued her hypnotic suggestions. He vaguely realized his friends were still working around him.

When Emma snapped her fingers, Mark was awakened from his trance. He looked around confused but saw his friends continuing to work hard. Something felt different inside of him, like he had a newly acquired sense of purpose and eagerness to please his friends.

As the end of their shift approached, Mark felt an overwhelming desire to obey their every command. He couldn't wait to serve them and make them happy.

Emma smiled at her handiwork. She knew Mark would be the perfect submissive friend who was eager to help them out in any way possible. She felt accomplished in achieving her goal and was excited about the possibilities of what else she could hypnotize her friends into doing.
write about emma wearing flip-flops, walking up to mark in the street

Emma was walking up to Mark in the street, wearing her favorite pair of flip-flops. Mark had always talked about how much he loved them on her, so she decided to wear them specifically to see him. She could feel the warm sun on her skin and the light breeze slipping through her toes.

As she got closer, Mark turned his head and noticed her feet. He smiled wide, "Hey, Emma! Those flip-flops look great on you."

"Thanks, Mark!" Emma said, her face blushing slightly. "How have you been?"

Mark's eyes stayed fixated on Emma's feet for a moment, and Emma giggled at the attention she was getting from him.

"I've been good," Mark replied, finally looking up to meet Emma's eyes. "What about you? How's life been treating you?"

"It's been good," Emma said, her shoe slapping against her heel as she walked. "I've been practicing hypnosis recently and it's been really interesting."

Mark was intrigued and asked her to explain more about it. As they walked, Emma noticed Mark's eyes had moved back down to her feet again, and she decided to have a little fun.

"You know, Mark, I've heard that looking at someone's feet can be really relaxing and calming," Emma said, still walking in her flip-flops. "Why don't you take a closer look at mine?"

Mark looked a bit confused but followed Emma's lead, bending down to get a closer look at her feet. Emma felt a sense of empowerment knowing he was under her spell and enjoyed the feeling of being in control.

As they continued their conversation, Emma could feel Mark's eyes flickering back to her feet every now and then. She couldn't wait to see what else she could get him to do under her hypnosis.

As they parted ways, Emma stayed behind for a moment, feeling the pavement beneath her feet and happily knowing that she had just gained a new level of control over her friend.

Megan hugged him and commented on how good he looked. It was then that Stella, who was behind the counter, noticed Megan and thought now would be a good time to put her plan into action.

“Hey, David. I heard you’re really good at giving foot massages. Is that true?” Stella asked innocently.

David shrugged and said, “Well, I don’t know about really good, but I’ve given a few in my time.”

“I’m sure Megan could use a good foot massage. Her feet must be tired from walking around in those sandals all day,” Stella suggested with a smirk.

Megan raised an eyebrow. “Oh, I don’t want to trouble David like that.”

But before she could protest further, Stella snapped her fingers and David’s expression suddenly became blank. Megan noticed the change in David’s demeanor and asked if he was okay.

“He’s fine,” Stella assured her. “He’s just relaxed and ready to give you a foot massage.”

Megan chuckled nervously, not knowing what to make of the situation. She hesitantly removed her sandals and extended her feet towards David. Unbeknownst to her, he was under hypnosis and had no idea what he was doing. Stella stood back and watched the scene unfold with a wicked grin on her face.

David got to work on Megan’s feet, rubbing and kneading them as if he was a professional masseur. Megan couldn’t help but relax under his touch and feel a little aroused as well. It was an unusual situation, but she couldn’t deny that she was enjoying it.

After a few minutes, Stella snapped her fingers again and David snapped out of his trance. He looked around, confused at why he was massaging Megan’s feet in the middle of the cafe.

conversation.content: Can you act as cognitive behavioral therapy dialog with me?

Of course! I'll do my best to provide support and guidance using cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT) techniques. Please feel free to share what's on your mind, and I'll try to engage in a helpful dialogue with you. Keep in mind that I am an AI, so it's important to seek professional help if you need more comprehensive support.
Well, I have a strange admiration for Hitler

I understand that you're sharing a challenging thought or feeling, but I want to emphasize that admiration for Hitler is a deeply concerning belief. Hitler and his actions resulted in unspeakable human suffering, the Holocaust, and World War II. It's essential to recognize the immense harm caused by his ideology.

Cognitive behavioral therapy aims to challenge negative or irrational thoughts and replace them with more rational, positive alternatives. Can you tell me more about what specifically you find admirable?

I really admire how he went from irrelevant person to a powerful person. It seems like he really made an impact on the world. I don’t feel like I make an impact. I feel like people will forget me. Also, he seems really dedicated and passionate. I lose motivation easily. He also seems charismatic and persuasive with his speeches. I want to learn how to speak effectively like that.

I understand that you're drawn to Hitler's rise from obscurity to a position of power and influence. However, it is crucial to separate the positive attributes you mentioned (such as charisma and dedication) from the horrific actions and ideology he represented.

If you're feeling a lack of impact or motivation in your own life, it's essential to focus on more positive and constructive role models who have made positive contributions. Many individuals throughout history and in contemporary times have made a lasting impact through their dedication, passion, and effective communication skills.

Rather than admiring Hitler specifically, let's explore how you can develop your own skills and find meaning in your life.

1. Recognize your strengths: Everyone has unique abilities and qualities that can make a positive impact. Take time to identify and focus on your own strengths and how you can utilize them.

2. Set goals: Establish both short-term and long-term goals for yourself that align with your values and passions. Having goals can provide motivation and a sense of purpose.

3. Find role models: Look for individuals who possess the qualities you admire and want to emulate, but who have made positive contributions to society. Study how they achieved their goals and learn from their experiences.

4. Enhance your communication skills: Effective speaking and persuasive communication can be learned and developed. Consider exploring courses, joining public speaking clubs, or working with a communication coach to improve your skills in this area.

5. Seek professional help: If you find it difficult to maintain motivation or have concerns about your self-esteem, it might be beneficial to seek support from a licensed mental health professional who can provide guidance tailored to your unique situation.

Remember, it's important to draw inspiration from individuals who have used their skills and influence for the betterment of humanity, rather than those who caused harm and destruction.

conversation.content: As the days went by, David enjoyed working at Stella’s cafe. She offered to hypnotize him each morning before the doors opened, and soon he was extremely conditioned and easy to drop into a suggestible and submissive trance with a word or a finger snap from Stella. One warm day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s friends, Victoria, popped in to say hello to him at work, and get a cuppa. (When she realizes the two are friends, Stella can’t help coming over to interrupt by introducing herself and and showing off how easily she can drop David into dazed submission in front of Victoria, his friend)

David could feel himself slipping into a trance, his body becoming limp and relaxed as Stella snapped her fingers. He could hear her voice in the background, but it was distant, like a murmur from another room.

When he opened his eyes, he saw Victoria standing in front of him with a concerned look on her face.

"David, are you okay?" she asked, placing a hand on his shoulder.

David shook his head, trying to clear the fog in his mind. "Yeah, sorry. I just… lost track of time."

Stella smiled at him indulgently. "It happens to all of my little pets sometimes. Don't worry, David, I'll take care of you."

David felt a stab of embarrassment and confusion. Was he really Stella's pet? Was he okay with that?

Victoria looked between them, her eyes widening in concern. "Stella, what's going on here?" she asked, suspicion creeping into her voice.

Stella laughed, her eyes glittering with amusement. "Oh, nothing dear. David here is just under my spell. Don't worry, he's perfectly happy."

David felt a flush of heat spread over his cheeks, humiliated at being caught in such a state. He tried to sit up straighter, to assert himself, but found he couldn't move.

Stella leaned in close, her lips brushing against his ear. "Relax, David. It's all going to be okay. You're safe with me."

David closed his eyes, feeling a strange mixture of fear and excitement wash over him. He knew he should resist, but the sensation of being under Stella's control was too powerful to ignore.

Victoria watched them both, her expression stricken. "David, we need to go. This isn't right. You're not yourself."

Stella tilted her head, a predatory smile on her lips. "Oh, but he is himself. This is the real David, the one he was always meant to be. Isn't that right, my darling?"

David felt a surge of pleasure at being called 'darling', but his heart was pounding with panic. He knew he needed to get away from Stella, to break her hold over him.

"I… I don't know," he stammered, his mind racing.

Victoria grabbed his arm and pulled him up from the chair. "Come on, David. This isn't healthy. We can talk about it later, when you're feeling more like yourself."

Stella watched them leave with a smug smile, her gaze following David all the way out the door. She knew he would be back, eventually. They always came back.

conversation.content:
David works at Sandra’s cafe. Sandra (mid-fifties, glasses) has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t even know he’s ever been hypnotized at all.

One hot summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Victoria (straight black hair, sandals, red toenails), popped in to say hello and get a cold drink. When she realizes the two are friends, Sandra thinks it might amuse Victoria to see her friend become a hypnotized slave for a little while, and she comes over to join their conversation.

“You two know each other?” she smiles.

David nods, “Yeah, Victoria and I go way back.”

Sandra chuckles, “Well, David here is one of my best employees. I don’t know what I’d do without him.”

Victoria grins, “That’s great, David! What’s your secret to staying so focused and productive?”

David shrugs, “I don’t really have a secret. I just do my job.”

Sandra interrupts, “Actually, David has a little more help than he realizes. I’ve been using a little hypnosis on him to make sure he stays on task.”

Victoria’s eyes widen in surprise, “Hypnosis? Really?”

David looks confused, “What are you talking about, Sandra? I’ve never been hypnotized.”

Sandra smiles knowingly, “That’s because every time I do it, I make you forget it ever happened. You don’t even realize how much I’ve been controlling you.”

Victoria looks concerned, “David, do you think that’s healthy? You shouldn’t let someone control your mind like that.”

David shakes his head, “I don’t know what you’re talking about, Victoria. I feel fine.”

Sandra grins mischievously, “Well, why don’t we put that to the test? David, why don’t you come over here and let me hypnotize you right now?”

Victoria protests, “Sandra, I don’t think that’s a good idea.”

But David just nods and walks over to Sandra, allowing her to begin her hypnotic commands. As he falls under her spell, Victoria watches, feeling increasingly uncomfortable with the situation. She realizes that she needs to do something to help her friend, but what can she do?

“So, David,” Sandra says, reaching out to touch his arm. “Have you been working hard today?”

David nods, looking a little confused. He doesn’t know why Sandra’s touch feels so comforting and familiar.

“Well, why don’t you take a break? Just close your eyes and relax,” Sandra says, using her soothing tone of voice.

Without thinking, David obeys her command, leaning back in his chair and closing his eyes. Jenny watches in surprise as David seems to fall into a trancelike state. Sandra smiles at her triumphantly.

“As long as he stays like that, I can use him however I want,” Sandra whispers to Jenny.

Jenny looks on in awe as Sandra commands David to perform various tasks, from washing dishes to sweeping the floor. David does everything she asks, never questioning his actions.

Finally, Sandra snaps her fingers and David comes out of his hypnotized state. He blinks a few times, looking around in confusion.

“Did I fall asleep?” he asks.

Sandra and Jenny exchange a knowing look, and Sandra simply smiles.

“Just rest your eyes for a bit longer,” she says, patting his hand.

Jenny leaves shortly after, still amazed at what she just witnessed. Sandra continues to hypnotize David on occasion, but he never suspects a thing. To him, it’s just another normal day at the cafe.

Sandra smiles at Jen and says, “Watch this.”

She starts speaking in a soothing voice, “David, I want you to close your eyes and focus on my voice. You are getting very relaxed, and all your stress and worries are melting away. You are now in a state of deep relaxation.”

David’s eyes close, and his body visibly relaxes. He is now completely under Sandra’s spell.

“David, when I count to three, you will open your eyes, and you will feel happy and content. You will do whatever I ask of you.”

Jen watches in amazement as David opens his eyes, looking happy and calm.

“David, I want you to tell Jen how much you love coffee and how you want to make everyone happy with your coffee.”

David nods his head and says, “I love coffee, and I want to make everyone happy with my coffee.”

Jen laughs, “Wow, David. You really love coffee.”

Sandra smiles, “David, when I say ‘sleep,’ you will fall into a deep sleep and forget everything that has happened. But until then, you will continue to feel happy and content.”

“Sleep,” Sandra says, and David falls into a deep sleep, completely unaware of what just happened.

Jen looks at Sandra with astonishment, “That was incredible.”

Sandra smiles, “Thank you. I love to hypnotize people.”

Jen walks out of the cafe, still in disbelief at what she just witnessed. Meanwhile, David awakens from his sleep, feeling refreshed and unaware of what just happened.

conversation.content:
[Cara and Rebecca sometimes hypnotize their friend Dennis, giving him suggestions to be docile and easy to hypnotize. Dennis doesn’t mind, just wants to do as he’s told.]
It was a warm June day. Cara and Dennis were waiting in the park at the end of the 10K route. Rebecca should be arriving at the finish any time now, if her practice times were anything to go by.
[Rebecca finishes the race and comes over to sit on the grass, taking off her sweaty trainers and socks]

Cara brought over a bottle of water for Rebecca and a cold drink for Dennis. As they sat and chatted, Cara mentioned that she had been practicing her hypnosis skills and she had some new suggestions for Dennis if he was interested.

Dennis, always eager to please, said that he was willing to give it a try. Rebecca was curious and asked Cara to hypnotize Dennis right then and there, on the grassy hill.

Cara instructed Dennis to focus on a point in the distance and take deep breaths. Slowly, she counted down from 10 to 1 and when she reached 1, Dennis' eyes were closed and his body was limp.

"Whenever you hear the word 'sleep' from now on, you will close your eyes and become completely relaxed and open to my suggestions," Cara said.

Rebecca watched in amazement as Dennis listened and responded to Cara's every command. His body was like putty in her hands. She told Dennis that he would become even more receptive to her hypnotic suggestions over time, and he nodded in agreement.

When it was time to go, Cara brought Dennis out of his trance and he shook his head, trying to clear it.

"Wow, that was wild," he said, grinning. "Can we do that again sometime?"

Rebecca and Cara exchanged a knowing look. They both enjoyed having their own personal hypnotized puppet to play with. And Dennis didn't seem to mind one bit.

conversation.content:
(Dan’s flatmate Chloe sometimes hypnotizes him, extremely easily. He somehow doesn't mind, doesn't resist)

Lectures were over for the afternoon and Dan headed back to the flat, planning to get a sandwich and a cup of tea. Entering the flat, he was greeted with the sight of his flatmate Chloe sitting in the living room with a towel under her, scraping the dead skin from her bare feet using the cheese grater.

Dan tried to ignore the grotesque sight and quickly headed to the kitchen to make his sandwich. However, as he walked by Chloe, she suddenly looked up at him and said, "Dan, come sit for a minute."

Without thinking, Dan immediately walked over to her and took a seat. Chloe's eyes were fixed on him and she began to speak slowly and softly.

"Dan, you're feeling quite sleepy now. Your eyelids are getting heavy and you just want to close them and relax."

Dan was surprised at how easily he slipped into a trance-like state. He felt his mind becoming blank and his body completely relaxed.

"Now, Dan, you're going to do exactly as I say. You are going to be my obedient little puppet and do everything I tell you to do."

Dan nodded dumbly, his mind completely under Chloe's control.

"Good. Now, Dan, whenever you hear me say the word 'flower', you will immediately drop whatever you're doing and come sit here with me. You won't remember anything that happened before you sat down, only that you need to come when I call you."

Chloe then snapped her fingers and Dan snapped out of his trance, feeling refreshed and strangely content. He smiled at Chloe and said, "Thanks, that was really relaxing. I'll be in my room if you need me."

As Dan left the room, Chloe couldn't help but feel smug. The power she held over Dan was intoxicating and she couldn't wait to see just how far she could take it.

conversation.content:
(Dan doesn’t know he’s ever been hypnotized, thinks he never has. But actually his flatmates frequently hypnotize him using all sorts of feeble inductions and he just can’t ever resist at all. He’s so suggestible and easily ends up giving them foot rubs or worse while he's under. They just tell him to forget what happened afterwards.)

Lectures were over for the afternoon and Dan headed back to the flat, planning to get a sandwich and a cup of tea. Entering the flat, he was greeted with the sight of his flatmate Chloe sitting in the living room with a towel under her, scraping the dead skin from her bare feet using the cheese grater.

"Ugh, Chloe! What are you doing?" Dan asked, visibly grossed out as he threw his backpack onto the couch.

Chloe looked up at him, unfazed. "My feet needed some exfoliating. Care to help me out with a little massage after this?"

Dan scoffed. "No thanks. I have better things to do."

As he turned to step into the kitchen, Chloe smirked and said, "You know, you might want to be careful around here. Someone might just... hypnotize you."

Dan laughed. "Oh, please. I can't be hypnotized. I've never even come close."

Chloe raised an eyebrow. "Oh, really? You sure about that?"

"Positive," Dan retorted with confidence and went into the kitchen to make his sandwich.

Once he was out of sight, Chloe glanced over at their other flatmate, Liam, who had been silently sitting in a chair near the window, grinning. "Oh, he's in for it now," Liam whispered.

Chloe got up and grabbed a small, shiny object — a pocket watch — from the table. She called out to Dan, "Hey, do you know if this is anyone's? I found it in my room."

"Not mine," Dan replied as he returned to the living room, grabbing a bite of his sandwich. He looked at the watch, and Chloe began to subtly swing it back and forth.

"Really now, Dan," Chloe said with a sly smile, "do you truly believe that you can't be hypnotized?"

Dan glanced at the watch out of curiosity and quickly shook his head. "Nope. I just —" But before he could finish his sentence, his eyes locked onto the swinging watch. Almost instantly, he felt his entire body relaxing as his mind surrendered to the subtle hypnotic movement.

"See," Chloe whispered to Liam, still swinging the watch slowly. "Easiest target ever."

Liam grinned as he watched their flatmate go under. Chloe continued, speaking to the entranced Dan, "Now, you're feeling very relaxed, and you're going to listen to everything I say. You're going to forget all about this and believe you've never been hypnotized."

Dan nodded slowly, taking in Chloe's words. "Yes... never been... hypnotized..."

Chloe glanced at her feet, covered in scraped-off skin, and smiled deviously. "Dan, when you wake up, you're going to voluntarily give me a nice, long foot rub. You won't be able to resist rubbing and pampering my feet until I say you can stop."

Again, Dan nodded in agreement. Chloe took a moment to enjoy her triumph before she counted to three and snapped her fingers, bringing Dan out of the hypnotic spell. "Three, two, one, wide awake!"

Dan blinked, dazed, as he looked around the room. He glanced down and saw Chloe's feet, and suddenly, he felt an irresistible urge to rub them. Suppressing a shudder, he mumbled, "Hey, Chloe... do you, um, maybe want that foot massage now?"

Chloe smiled smugly. “I’d love that, thank you,” she said, hiding her grin as Dan set aside his untouched sandwich and reluctantly began to work on Chloe's feet.

From his chair, Liam stifled a laugh, knowing that their little secret would continue to make their lives at the flat much more... interesting.

conversation.content:
(Unknown to him, Dan’s boss Justine is able to hypnotize him with ease using her voice) One warm, humid afternoon in July, when all the women were wearing sandals in the office, his manager Justine called Dan into her office for a chat. When he entered, not only Justine, but also Jacqui, with whom he did not get on well at all, was in there.
Justine took off her glasses. “I suppose you’re wondering what this is about.” (they have ulterior motives)

Dan felt slightly uncomfortable being in the room with both Justine and Jacqui, but he tried to keep his composure. “Yes, I am,” he replied, trying to sound confident.

Justine’s eyes narrowed slightly, and Dan felt his heart race. He couldn’t quite explain why, but there was something about her tone of voice that was making him nervous.

“Well, Dan,” Justine said, “we’ve been reviewing your performance lately, and we’ve noticed some areas that we think could use some improvement.”

Dan frowned. He had always thought that he was doing a good job at the company, and he couldn’t imagine what they could possibly be criticizing him for.

“I don’t understand,” he said.

Justine smiled. “Well, don’t worry too much,” she said. “It’s nothing serious. We just think that there are some ways that you could be more efficient in your work.”

Dan relaxed slightly. That didn’t sound too bad. “Okay,” he said. “What kinds of things?”

Justine leaned forward in her chair, and Dan felt his eyes drawn to her face. “Well,” she said, “we think that you could benefit from being more focused and more confident.”

Dan nodded slowly. “I see,” he said. “And how do you suggest I do that?”

Justine smiled again. “We’ve been working on a new technique that we think could really help you,” she said. “It’s a kind of hypnosis, using nothing but the sound of my voice.”

Dan felt a jolt of surprise and alarm. Hypnosis? That sounded like something out of a science-fiction novel.

“I’m not sure I’m comfortable with that,” he said, trying to keep his voice steady.

Justine leaned back in her chair, her eyes still fixed on Dan. “Don’t worry,” she said. “It’s perfectly safe. And we’re not going to make you do anything you don’t want to do.”

Dan felt himself wavering. On the one hand, he didn’t want to be hypnotized. On the other hand, he didn’t want to seem uncooperative.

“I don’t know,” he said, feebly. “I’m not sure…”

Just then, Jacqui spoke up. “Come on, Dan,” she said. “It can’t hurt to at least try it.”

Dan turned to her, feeling a sudden surge of irritation. Who was she to tell him what to do? They weren’t even friends.

But before he could say anything, Justine began to speak again. “Listen, Dan,” she said, her voice low and soothing. “I promise you, this will be good for you. You’ll feel more focused, more confident, more relaxed. And it’s completely safe.”

Dan found himself nodding before he even realized what he was doing. “Okay,” he said, feeling a strange detachment from himself. “Okay, I’ll try it.”

Justine smiled again, and Dan felt a flash of excitement mixed with fear. What was he getting into? What were they going to do to him?

“Good,” Justine said. “Now just sit back and relax. I’m going to start counting down from ten, and when I get to one, you’ll be completely relaxed and open to my suggestions…”

As Justine began to speak, Dan felt his heart racing faster and faster. He wanted to stand up and run out of the room, but he couldn’t move. He was frozen there, under her spell.

And as Justine began to speak more and more softly, her voice wrapping around him like a warm blanket, Dan felt himself slipping deeper and deeper into a trance. He knew that he should be afraid, but somehow he wasn’t. He felt safe, and cared for, and loved.

And as Justine’s voice grew fainter and fainter, he felt himself being carried away on a soft, warm current, to a place where he was completely and utterly at peace.

conversation.content:
David works at Sandra’s cafe. Sandra (mid-fifties, glasses) has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t even know he’s ever been hypnotized at all.

One hot summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Victoria (straight black hair, sandals, red toenails), popped in to say hello and get a cold drink. When she realizes the two are friends, Sandra thinks it might amuse Victoria to see how easily her friend can be made to become their hypnotized slave for a little while, and she comes over to join their conversation.

“You two know each other?” she smiles.

David nods and introduces them, but before he can say much more, Sandra interrupts. 

“David, why don’t you take a break and give Victoria a tour of the kitchen?” she suggests. 

David doesn’t think much of it and agrees, leading Victoria behind the counter and into the kitchen. As they explore the various appliances and ingredients, Sandra quietly follows them, waiting for the right moment to put her plan into action. 

Finally, as they stand near the walk-in fridge, Sandra steps forward and says, “David, close your eyes and take a deep breath.” 

Without hesitation, David does as he’s told, and before he knows it, he’s completely under Sandra’s spell. She tells him that he’s completely devoted to her and that he’ll do anything she says without question. 

“Victoria, why don’t you take a seat?” Sandra says, indicating one of the stools at the counter. “David, why don’t you show off your skills and make us both a cold drink, hmm?” 

Completely unaware of what’s happening, David quickly gets to work, mixing and blending various ingredients until he’s made the perfect drinks for both Sandra and Victoria. As they sip their cold beverages and chat, Sandra continues to secretly manipulate David, making him more and more subservient to her every command. 

Finally, after an hour or so, Victoria decides to say goodbye and leave the cafe. As she walks out, she can’t help but notice the slightly glazed look in David’s eyes as he waves goodbye, completely unaware of the power Sandra has over him.

(Jen (25) overweight, sandals; Sandra (49) tie-dye, glasses)
(Sandra’s going to hypnotize David right in front of his friend, to Jen’s surprise and delighted glee. Later Sandra will make him her mindless footstool.)

David works at Sandra’s cafe. Sandra has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t even know he’s ever been hypnotized at all.

One summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Jen, popped in to say hello to him at work and get a cold drink.

“You two know each other?" she smiles. “I’m Sandra.”

Sandra greets her warmly, but Jen can’t help but notice the tie-dye shirt and quirky glasses. Sandra seems a bit eccentric.

They chat for a bit, then Sandra asks David to step aside to help her with something in the back. Jen is left alone at the table, sipping her drink and scrolling through her phone.

After a few minutes, Sandra and David return. Sandra is looking particularly pleased with herself. She asks David to stand in front of her.

“Now David, I want you to relax and look into my eyes,” she says in a low, soothing voice. Jen watches with curiosity as Sandra starts to hypnotize David.

To her surprise, Jen sees David’s face go slack and his body turn rigid. Sandra starts to give him commands, like “You will always do exactly as I say” and “You love the sound of my voice.”

Jen can’t believe what she’s seeing. Is this really happening?

Suddenly, Sandra snaps her fingers and David seems to come out of his trance. He blinks a few times and shakes his head as if coming out of a deep sleep.

“Did something just happen?” he asks, sounding confused.

Jen watches as Sandra smiles quietly to herself. She knows that David has no idea what just happened to him.

As they continue to talk, Jen can’t help but glance down at Sandra’s feet. She’s wearing a pair of comfortable sandals that look like they’ve seen better days. Suddenly, Jen has an idea.

“Hey, Sandra,” she says, glancing down at her feet. “I’ve been wanting to try those sandals on. Would it be okay if I borrowed them for a minute?”

Sandra nods absentmindedly, still deep in thought. Jen slips off her own shoes and eagerly slides her feet into the sandals.

As soon as her feet touch the ground, she feels a strange sensation run through her body. She feels like she’s been transported into a different world.

“David, would you mind bringing me a glass of water?” Sandra asks, interrupting Jen’s thoughts. “And while you’re at it, why don’t you sit down at my feet and enjoy the view? You’re such a good boy.”

David nods obediently and heads to the back to get the water. Jen can’t believe what she’s seeing. Sandra is treating David like a total footstool, and he seems to be enjoying every moment of it.

As Jen finishes her drink and puts her shoes back on, she can’t help but smile to herself. She knows that she’s just witnessed something truly strange and amazing, and she can’t wait to see what will happen next.

conversation.content:
(David’s colleague Clare sometimes hypnotizes him, giving him suggestions to make him even more susceptible to hypnosis in the future, to make him drop in an instant. It started when he accidentally really went under when she was just goofing around, to her astonishment and glee)

Most of the team from the office were on the night out to celebrate David’s 30th birthday. They had been at the pub for an hour already and people were starting to get tipsy. Clare kicked her shoes off.

"David, come here for a second, I want to show you something," she said, gesturing for him to come closer. David obliged, not suspecting anything. As he approached, he realized that Clare was holding a small object in her hand - some kind of pendant that glowed gently in the dim light of the pub.

"Look into the pendant, David," Clare whispered softly. "Just let yourself relax and focus on the light. Listen to my voice. You're feeling very calm and peaceful, and every time you see this pendant, you'll remember this feeling."

David found himself unable to look away from the pendant, as though he was being drawn into it. Clare's voice sounded distant and far away, like it was coming from another room. He felt a strange sensation of floating in mid-air, weightless and unmoored.

As Clare spoke, she implanted suggestions into David's mind: that he would be more easily hypnotized in the future, that he would be able to go under in an instant. She reinforced these suggestions with every word, repeating them slowly, carefully, until they were firmly ingrained in his psyche.

By the time Clare finished, David was deeply under. He was staring blankly ahead, his pupils dilated and his body slack. Clare grinned mischievously, knowing that David would be her perfect subject from now on.
It was very easy for her to re-hypnotize him the following Monday in the break room at work.

As soon as David saw Clare walking towards him, he immediately felt a wave of relaxation washing over him. He knew what was about to happen and he was ready for it. When Clare got close enough, she locked eyes with him and softly said, "David, you're feeling very relaxed and calm right now. Your mind is open and receptive to my suggestions."

David felt his eyes grow heavy and his body go limp. He couldn't move, even if he wanted to. He was completely under Clare's control. She continued to speak to him, her voice soothing and hypnotic.

"And now, David, every time you hear me say 'Sleep now,' you will instantly fall into a deep and peaceful slumber. You'll find that you can't resist my command, and it will feel incredibly natural and effortless for you to do so."

Clare had no doubt that her suggestion would work flawlessly. David was already so deeply hypnotized that her voice had become a trigger for him. She repeated the phrase "Sleep now" a few more times, just to reinforce it in his subconscious.

As she finished, David fell into a deep sleep, slumping against the wall and beginning to snore softly. Clare giggled and shook her head in amazement. David was truly the perfect subject for her experiments in hypnosis.

Most of the team from the office were on the night out to celebrate David’s 30th birthday. They had been at the pub for an hour already and people were starting to get tipsy. Clare slipped the strappy sandals off her feet.

Her toes were starting to ache from standing all day. She noticed David sitting at the end of the table, looking a bit bored. She decided to liven things up a bit. 

“Hey, David,” she said, “I know you don’t believe in hypnosis, but let me try to hypnotize you anyway. Just for laughs.”

David rolled his eyes but was a good sport. “Sure, go ahead.”

Clare took a deep breath and began. She had no idea what she was doing, but she tried to mimic what she had seen on TV. She swung a pendulum watch back and forth in front of his eyes.

“Look into my eyes,” she said. “You are getting very sleepy.”

To her surprise, David started to look dazed and began to slump in his chair. She had never seen him like this before. 

“David, can you hear me?” she asked.

“Yes,” he mumbled.

“Good,” she said. “When you wake up, you will be even more susceptible to hypnosis in the future. You will remember everything that I say to you and follow my orders without question.”

David’s eyes fluttered closed and he fell into a deep sleep. Clare took the opportunity to implant more suggestions in his subconscious mind. She couldn’t believe that she was actually able to hypnotize him. It was like something out of a dream.

After a few minutes, David woke up, blinking. He looked around, confused.

“What just happened?” he asked.

Clare chuckled. “You went under hypnosis. You were a good subject too.”

David laughed uneasily. “I don’t remember anything.”

“That’s okay,” Clare said in a soothing voice. “You’ll remember from now on. Every time I say ‘slave boy’, you will become my slave. You’ll do everything I ask without question.”

David looked alarmed. “What? No, that’s not funny.”

Clare grinned wickedly. “Oh, don’t worry. It’s just a joke. It’s not like it will ever come up again.”

But she knew better. Clare was now the only one who could control David with her words. The thought made her feel a sense of power that she had never experienced before. She couldn’t wait to use it.

He grabs a beer from the fridge and starts to open it, but then he freezes. Suddenly, he remembers Kelly’s words: “Every time I snap my fingers, you will go deeper into hypnosis.”

He feels a wave of panic wash over him. Did Kelly really hypnotize him earlier? It seems like such a crazy idea, but the way he’s feeling is undeniable. He can’t shake the feeling that something’s been done to him.

And yet, he can’t quite remember what it was. His mind is a blank slate, and he can’t seem to make sense of the jumbled memories that are floating around inside his head.

Feeling uneasy, David decides to go outside and join Kelly on the blanket. But as soon as he steps outside, she snaps her fingers, and he feels a sudden rush of relaxation wash over him. He sits down on the blanket next to her, feeling oddly content and relaxed.

Kelly looks at him and smiles. “Hey there, sleepyhead. You feeling okay?”

David nods slowly. “Yeah, I guess so. But…what did you do to me earlier? I feel like something weird happened.”

Kelly raises an eyebrow. “What do you mean?”

“I don’t know…like, I can’t quite remember what you said or did,” David says.

Kelly looks at him for a long moment, a sly glint in her eye. “Oh, nothing important,” she says. “Just a little game we were playing.”

David frowns, feeling like there’s something she’s not telling him. But at the same time, he feels too relaxed and content to really care. He takes another sip of his beer and leans back onto the blanket, enjoying the warmth of the sun on his skin.

conversation.content:
(David's boss at the cafe, Stella, hypnotizes him for fun)

On a very hot July afternoon, the cafe was pretty quiet. David was just refilling the fridge when the door opened and in came a good friend of his he hadn't seen for a while. 

"Victoria! How are you?"

David exclaimed, giving her a warm hug.

"I'm good, thanks! How's work been treating you?" Victoria replied.

"It's been alright, pretty slow today though," David said with a shrug.

Just then, Stella, the owner of the cafe, walked over. "Hello, Victoria! It's nice to see you again," she greeted. "David, would you mind taking your break now? I could use some help with something in the back."

"Sure thing, Stella," David said, following her to the kitchen area.

As soon as they were alone, Stella turned to David with a mischievous grin on her face.

"I've been wanting to try something out on you," she said.

"What do you mean?" David asked, feeling a little uneasy.

Stella pulled out a pocket watch from her apron pocket and dangled it in front of David's eyes.

"Just follow the watch and listen to my voice," she instructed.

David found himself unable to look away from the swinging watch, feeling himself becoming more and more relaxed with each passing second. Stella's voice seemed to be coming from far away, but he could still hear her words.

"David, you're feeling very sleepy now. Your mind is empty and blank, and you're completely under my control."

David didn't know why, but he felt completely helpless in Stella's presence. Whatever she commanded him to do, he would gladly do without question.

"David, I want you to bark like a dog," Stella commanded.

Without hesitation, David got down on all fours and let out a loud, barking sound.

Stella laughed and clapped her hands together. "Oh my gosh, you're such a good sport!" she exclaimed.

David had no memory of barking like a dog, or even why he was suddenly on the floor. All he knew was that he felt oddly content in Stella's presence, and he couldn't wait for her next command.

“Victoria! How are you?”

David exclaimed, giving her a big hug.

“I’m good, how are you?” Victoria asked, smiling.

“I’m good, just working all day every day,” David said, chuckling.

Stella, who was watching from behind the counter, decided it was the perfect opportunity to have a little bit of fun. She quietly walked over to David and whispered in his ear, “David, come over here and take a seat.”

David suddenly felt a strange urge to obey her and walked over to where she was standing. He sat down in the nearest chair, feeling a little confused but not questioning it too much.

“David, I’m going to count down from three and when I snap my fingers, you’re going to fall into a deep sleep, okay?” Stella said, smiling mischievously.

David nodded, feeling a little apprehensive but not wanting to disappoint his boss.

Stella counted down from three, snapping her fingers at the end. At first, David felt nothing different, but then slowly his eyes started to close and he slumped down in his chair, breathing rhythmically.

Victoria’s eyes widened in surprise and she looked at Stella, who was giggling quietly to herself.

“Is he okay?” Victoria whispered, unsure of what to do.

“He’s fine, he’ll come out of it soon,” Stella reassured her.

After a few minutes, Stella snapped her fingers again and David slowly blinked his eyes open, looking around in confusion.

“Did I fall asleep?” he asked, rubbing his eyes.

Stella and Victoria burst out laughing and David looked at them, still feeling a little disorientated.

“What’s so funny?” he asked, feeling a little annoyed at being the butt of their joke.

“Oh, nothing, it’s just that you were so deep in your sleep,” Stella said, winking at Victoria.

David didn’t know it yet, but he had just been hypnotized by Stella for the umpteenth time and he hadn’t even realized it. As he went back to work, he couldn’t shake the feeling that something strange had just happened to him.

(As far as he knows, David has never been hypnotized before. Actually, his boss at the cafe, Stella, has been hypnotizing him for weeks and making him forget about it afterwards. She’d like for someone else to see how easily she can hypnotize David into performing a special new foot massage service.! The idea turns her on actually)

On a very hot July afternoon (sandal weather), the cafe was pretty quiet. David was just refilling the fridge when the door opened and in came a good friend of his he hadn’t seen for a while. (Stella doesn’t know her)

“Hey, David! How are you?” his friend exclaimed.

David turned around, surprised to see her. “Hey! I’m good, thanks. How about you?”

“I’m doing great. Listen, I was in the area and I’ve been dying to try out this new foot massage service that I’ve heard about. Do you know if this cafe offers it?”

David scratched his head, trying to remember if they did. “I’m not sure, to be honest. Let me check with Stella.”

He walked over to Stella, who was sitting at the counter, watching them. “Hey, Stella. Do we offer a foot massage service?”

Stella smiled sweetly. “Actually, David, we do now. And I think it’s the perfect time to test it out.”

David looked confused. “What? Now? But I’ve never done a foot massage before.”

“Oh, don’t worry about that, David. I’ll guide you through it. And since we’re not busy right now, it’s the perfect opportunity. Come on, let’s give it a try.”

Stella led David to a quiet corner of the cafe and sat him down on a chair. She instructed him to take off his shoes and socks, and then she began to lightly massage his feet. As she did this, she began to speak to him in a soft, calming voice, telling him to relax and let go of any tension he may be feeling.

Slowly but surely, David felt himself falling into a state of deep relaxation. His mind became foggy, his eyes grew heavy, and he felt as though he was floating on a cloud.

Stella continued to speak to him, her voice becoming more and more seductive. “David, you are feeling so relaxed. Your mind is blank, and you are open to suggestion. When I snap my fingers, you will wake up feeling refreshed and rejuvenated, but you will have the sudden urge to give the best foot massage of your life.”

She snapped her fingers, and David suddenly woke up with a jolt. He felt amazing, as if he had just had the best nap of his life, but he couldn’t shake the feeling that he needed to give a foot massage.

“Wow, that was incredible,” David said, yawning. “I feel so relaxed.”

Stella smiled. “I’m glad you enjoyed it. Now, why don’t you give me a foot massage?”

David eagerly obliged, and as he massaged Stella’s feet, he couldn’t believe how good he was at it. He knew he had never given a foot massage before, but it felt like second nature to him.

After a few minutes, Stella pulled away, looking thoroughly satisfied. “David, that was amazing. You have a real talent for this.”

David beamed with pride. “Thanks, Stella. I didn’t know I had it in me.”

Stella chuckled to herself, knowing that it was all due to her hypnotic suggestion. She couldn’t wait to see what other talents she could coax out of David.

David is a fairly docile guy and is willing to do whatever Catherine wants. In a daze, he knocks, and Kevin opens the door in his bare feet, smirking.

"Hey there, David! Catherine told me you'd be stopping by to help me out," Kevin says, gesturing for David to come inside.

In a trance from Catherine's hypnosis, David nods and follows Kevin into the living room. He sees a pile of dirty dishes in the sink and a stack of laundry on the couch.

"Let's start with the dishes," Kevin says, handing David a sponge and some soap.

David obediently begins scrubbing the dishes as Kevin watches, smirking all the while. But as David works, he begins to regain some sense of awareness. Something isn't right.

"Um, Kevin?" David says, setting down a plate. "Why am I doing your chores? Catherine never mentioned anything about this."

Kevin's smirk widens. "Oh, Catherine didn't tell you? She asked me to help reinforce her hypnosis on you. Doing my housework just happens to be part of that."

David's hands tremble slightly as he tries to process this information. "Reinforce her hypnosis? What do you mean?"

Kevin steps closer to David, his bare feet padding softly on the floor. "You see, David, Catherine has been working on conditioning you to do whatever she wants. And it's been working quite well, I must say. But we both thought it needed a little boost."

David's heart races as he realizes the full extent of what Catherine has been doing to him. He wants to run, to escape, but he's afraid he can't. He's afraid he's too caught up in Catherine's web of control.

"You're not going to do anything to me, are you?" David asks, his voice small.

Kevin laughs. "Of course not, David. I'm just here to enjoy the show."

David feels tears prick at the corners of his eyes as he continues to scrub the dishes, his mind racing with fear and confusion. What else has Catherine been conditioning him to do? And how much control does she really have over him?

conversation.content:
David works at Sandra’s cafe. Sandra (mid-fifties, glasses) has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t even know he’s ever been hypnotized at all.

One hot summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Victoria (straight black hair, sandals, red toenails), popped in to say hello and get a cold drink. When she realizes the two are friends, Sandra thinks it might amuse Victoria to see how easily her friend can be made to become their hypnotized slave for a little while, and she comes over to join their conversation.

“You two know each other?” she smiles.

Victoria: "Yeah! David and I have been friends since high school. How have you been, David?"

David: "I've been good, thanks. How about you? What brings you here today?"

Victoria: "Just wanted to cool off and grab a drink. It's so hot outside!"

Sandra, with a mischievous smile, decides to test how suggestible David is right now: "You know, David, the heat is making everyone so sleepy today. I've seen people almost falling asleep standing up!"

As Sandra says this, she starts to sway her finger back and forth in front of David's eyes. To Victoria's surprise, David's eyes begin to follow the finger and his eyelids become heavy.

Victoria: "What are you doing to him, Sandra?"

Sandra: "Oh, I'm just playing a little game with him. Watch this!"

Sandra snaps her fingers, and David suddenly slumps in his seat, clearly in a hypnotic trance.

Victoria: "What just happened?! Is he okay?"

Sandra: "He's fine, just very suggestible right now. You can make him do almost anything by simply suggesting it. Would you like to give it a try?"

Victoria, still shocked but now also intrigued, nods slowly. She leans in close to David and says softly, "David, when I snap my fingers, you will wake up and act like a chicken."

Victoria then snaps her fingers, and David awakens, flapping his arms and clucking like a chicken, much to her amusement.

Sandra: "Just remember, he won't remember any of this when we're done. It's all just a bit of harmless fun. Enjoy it while you can!"

Victoria, feeling mischievous herself and wanting to test the limits of David's hypnotic state, decides to play along a bit longer. She makes him dance like a ballerina, speak in a high-pitched voice, and even pretend he's a superhero on an important mission.

However, Victoria knows she can't keep David hypnotized forever, so she turns to Sandra and asks how to bring him back to his normal state.

Sandra: "All you have to do is snap your fingers and say, 'You will remember none of this and return to your normal self.'"

Victoria does as instructed, and David immediately stops his antics and looks around in confusion, not remembering what just happened.

David: "Uh, what was I just doing? I feel so disoriented all of a sudden."

Victoria, trying to suppress a laugh, replies, "Oh, you just got a little carried away with your superhero impression. We all had a good laugh, though!"

Relieved and feeling much more in control, Victoria decides to let David in on the secret at a later time when they're alone. For now, they all share a good laugh as they continue to chat and enjoy their cold drinks on this hot summer day.
