conversations.facetValue: generate a title for a story involving a conflict between two characters, one of whom is named David and the other Joseph.

allFacetValues.value: generate a title for a story involving a conflict between two characters, one of whom is named David and the other Joseph.
English

generate a title for a narrative involving conflict and relationship dynamics between two characters. The task involves understanding the narrative context and creating a fitting title that captures the essence of the story.

conversation.content:
Think a title fpr:David definitely could not do this. 
 
He agreed to protect Joseph, but he did not agree to put up with the teenage angst that came with it. He was trying to run a company, live with a stranger, train said stranger and steer him to a place where he could head this company. 
 
The young man still hadn’t presented as his final year in high school drew to a close, and as his legal guardian, David had to live with and care for Joseph – not that Joseph would make it easy for him. Since the day his parents died, the happy-go-lucky spoilt teenager turned into a sadder, angrier spoilt teenager who refused to listen to David’s very sound advice and learn the tricks of the trade. In fact Joseph made it clear that he would never listen to his parent’s last wishes. 
 
Joseph had other ideas. Stressful ideas. 
 
He threw the letters of acceptance on David’s glass desk with a satisfied smirk. Whilst Joseph didn’t care too much about David’s appointment as the CEO of the IDM group, he cared a lot of the fact that David was his guardian, and he couldn’t so much as breathe without David’s input. 
 
David sighed, leaning back in his chair and rubbing the headache forming in his temples. 
 
“Joe, we talked about this.” He groaned, “Commerce, Business, IT, or Law. You’re not studying medicine. It has nothing to do with this company.” 
 
“Like I care” Joseph scoffed. “You have a choice. Either I go to Harvard which is still in the States and you can have your henchmen near to both me and you. Twenty-Five Hundred miles isn’t that far when you have a private jet. Or, I choose Oxford, Cambridge, or University of Cape Town.”
 
Negotiating with Joe was like negotiating with a terrorist. David couldn’t win. If David said the sky is blue, Joseph said it was a colorless reflection of the ocean which was also colorless. If David said that Joseph should go left, he went right. He did things just to spite the older, knowing it would grind his gears.
 
David groaned, “Would it kill you to take my advice? Can’t you respect me as your senior? As your intended mate?” 
 
Joseph rolled his eyes, falling into a chair with his arms crossed. “Firstly, you know I have a boyfriend. I’m not marrying you. You blocked my unlimited credit card because of it – even though, it’s technically my money!” he seethed, glaring at David in absolute loathing. 
 
“You were throwing money at a known gold digger! I’m not letting you blow through your money because you’re lonely!” David threw at him, banging his fist on his desk in frustration. They’d talked about this. Joe was just stubborn. 
 
“That’s not your decision to make!” he yelled back. 
 
“I think you’ll find it is!” David rolled his eyes, jaw clenching. 
 
“This is why I don’t like you.” Joseph grumbled, “But I digress. You aren’t allowed to decide my major. It’s in the will. You’re my keeper, not my boss.” 
 
Joe had him there. What was David supposed to say? He technically couldn’t resist. Knowing Joe, he would take him to court to prove a point. There was an entire trust to fund the schooling. David was backed into a corner here. Just as he always was with Joe. 
 
Glancing at the acceptance letters in front of him, David sighed and shook his head, his headache at capacity for a workday. 
 
He glanced up at Joe, the smirk on his face made David want to throw him out of a window. He took a calming breath. “You’ll go to Harvard. If you fail once, I’ll convince the trustees to force you into law. Try me.” David growled, going back to his work. 
 
“Fine. But you know that won’t happen. You can get back to whatever boring work you’re doing here. Alex and I have a date.” Joseph sung, prancing out of David’s office with a victorious smirk. 
 
If David knocked back three double whiskeys before he continued with work, it was no one’s business.

 
 
David nearly killed Joe on the eve of his 28th birthday. Joseph had just finalized and passed his residency. The Marx’s and Iverson’s had thrown a huge party to celebrate the newest qualified family member. But they didn’t know what a menace that Joe was. 
 
Joe quickly became the bane of David’s existence. How could one person be so infuriating? Nevertheless, David stuck to his promise and fulfilled his duty. No matter how many times Joe made him want to throw himself off a high building for some peace of mind. 
 
In all fairness though, the younger looked good at the age of 28. His body was sculpted, and his brain had developed in the most antagonizing way. He was a sexy 28-year-old family medicine doctor, who had fought for the past 10 years to get to where he was. 
 
It was not without David’s help and his family’s money though. David made sure that Joe had everything he needed to succeed by not letting him want for anything. Once Joe had grown out of his rebellious teen phase and took his money and life seriously, the fights had reduced but not disappeared. 
 
All David wanted was for Joe to take a job in LA and finally agree to be his mate. Luckily, Joe had not presented at the age of 28. There was a rumor that he was one of the exceptions to the presentation rule. It was strange but Joe could care less. He was just happy that he got to live his life without much worry. 
 
David, a fully grown 38-year-old Alpha, was tired of essentially babysitting a grown man. But what could he do? He had given his word. As the saying goes, a man’s word is his bond. 
 
Now, as David stood in Joe’s penthouse apartment, David had wondered when this would become worth it. 
 
This was the first time in the last four years that David had come this apartment. Mostly because Joe’s temper and irritating thought process made it unnecessarily stressful.
 
“Mmmh, I was wondering when you were going to show up, Davey Dave.” Joe mocked, a glass of wine swirling in his hand. He was dressed in a comfortable grey lounge set, smooth jazz playing softly in the background and candles lit to set a comfortable atmosphere. 
 
“What in the actual eff is wrong with you?” David seethed, throwing the Doctors without Borders offer letter on the coffee table. 
 
Joe barely spared a glance at the letter, his smirk rubbing David the wrong way. “Why are you so angry? This is a safe space. Maybe you should meditate? You must visit my temple Davey-”
 
“Stop this!” David yelled, his fist clenched up at his side, brown eyes burning with anger. “First medical school and now Doctor’s without borders?! What the hell, Joseph Iverson?!” 
 
“It a great cause-”
 
“You’re running away, Joseph.” David growled. Joe flinched slightly, not used to the older man using his full name. Despite the many ways that Joe tried to get under David’s skin, the man was unshakeable. For the first time in more than 11 years, David used his full name. 
 
It made Joe want to kneel and ask for forgiveness, but he was as stubborn as his mother, and this is what he wanted. He wanted to make an impact! He was a doctor, and he was wealthy. He could decide what his own purpose was! What was the issue? 
 
Joe narrowed his eyes bitterly, “Running away from what? I’m practicing my profession, David!” 
 
“You are running away from your duty. You’re running away from your intended mate. For the past 10 years we have been playing hide and seek and I understood where you were coming from. But grow up, Joseph! You need to stay here!” David boomed, the veins in his neck bulging and his eyes almost disappearing as he glared back at Joe. 
 
“I’m not running away from anything.” Joe growled, his eyes flashing with anger. 
 
David took a calming breath, reminding himself that this man-child is his duty. He breathed in again and changed his tone. “If you’re so tired of me, I will stay away from you. I will cancel this marriage and mating. You can go on with your life. But you stay here. Kenya is too far away and way too dangerous for you to be there.” 
 
Joe laughed bitterly, placing his wine glass on the table harshly before jumping out of his seat. “You’re so self-centered. Not everything is about you, David.” He hissed, getting into David’s face. “You always do this. You make everything about you and this stupid idea that we have to be together all the time.” 
 
David rolled his eyes. “Are you telling me that you’ve chosen to do this because you want to suffer in a bloody war zone suddenly? That you want to live on less than an eighth of what you do now? As what? A sacrifice? What about my sacrifice? I run your family’s company in your steed – as your husband, your mate. As your Alpha – even though the only thing that ties us together is our families and my duty! I take care of you and ensure you live the comfortable life. What? You got bored of living the good life?” he retorted cynically. 
 
 
“This is exactly why we don’t get along.” Joe growled, almost nose to nose with David’s caramel skin, the anger and tension between them igniting something within him that made him want to push David over. “You’re a self-righteous drone. You think you’re so much better than everyone just because you chose to sacrifice yourself? Who do you think you are? You’ve never so much as lived for you, so who do you think you are telling me what to do? You wouldn’t know the true meaning of being an Alpha, if your knot was attached to your head!”
 
Silence fell between them as David’s heart clenched. He refused to entertain the barb. He did what he had to do. He did what was expected. So that people like Joe could relax and follow their dreams. For that to be thrown in his face was not only hurtful, but also incredibly infuriating. His jaw clenched tight, his fist itching for a fight, but he remained silent. 
 
He was not childish like Joe. He would not dignify the disrespect with a response. He calmed his raging inner Alpha that wanted to make his intended mate submit and respect him. This was never meant to be his place. 
 
“That’s what I thought.” Joe spat, stepping back. “That’s exactly why there will never be anything between us. You’re nothing more than a cardboard cut-out of a man and a hollow excuse for an Alpha. I’m going to Kenya. Period.” 
 
With that, Joe went back to his couch and wine and left David standing there, heart heavy and fists flexing. The silence between them weighed for a while before David stormed out, banging the door behind him. 
 
But nothing would prepare either of them for the realities of what they were facing. Kenya was part of the program for good reason, and nothing in his struggles since his parents’ passing would have prepared Joseph for what he bargained for.
"The Intended Mate: A Battle of Duty and Desire"

conversation.content:
David and Ruth are a brother and sister in their early twenties. They've always argued and bickered, although they do love each other really.
(David’s friend Jeannette sometimes uses hypnosis on him) Jeannette has sent David over to do Ruth’s housework for her, and anything else she might tell him to do. David is a fairly docile guy and is willing to do whatever Jeannette wants. In a hypnotized daze, he knocks, and his sister Ruth opens the door in her pjs and bare feet, smirking and clearly delighted to have her brother completely and utterly in her power.

"Come on in, David," Ruth said with a grin.

David walked in and looked around, feeling disoriented and confused.

"What's going on? Why am I here?" David asked, feeling a bit uneasy.

"I've got some chores for you to do," Ruth said, crossing her arms.

David felt himself sinking deeper and deeper into the hypnotic trance as Ruth gave him a list of tasks to complete. He cleaned the kitchen, did the laundry, and even washed Ruth's car.

As he was finishing up, Ruth sat on the couch and watched him with a mischievous gleam in her eye.

"You know, David, I've always wanted to see what it would be like to have my own personal servant," Ruth said, twirling a strand of hair around her finger.

David couldn't help but feel a little uneasy at her words. He knew deep down that this wasn't right.

"Uh, Ruth, I don't know about this. I think we should stop," David said, feeling a sense of clarity returning to him.

But Ruth just laughed.

"Relax, David. You're under my control now. You'll do whatever I say," she said, leaning forward and giving him a seductive smile.

David felt his mind slipping away again, and he knew that he couldn't resist her much longer.

As Ruth continued to give him orders and watch him work, David couldn't help but feel a sense of dread. He knew that this hypnotic spell wouldn't last forever, and when it wore off, he would have to face the consequences of his actions.

But for now, he was content to be under Ruth's control, doing whatever she wanted him to do.

conversation.content:
Danny's wife Nicky is a hypnotherapist. She's hypnotized Danny so many times that whenever Nicky snaps her fingers or utters a secret trigger word, Danny helplessly sinks into a trance and becomes completely obedient to her every command.
Nicky's parents don't get on well with Danny. Nicky decides to 'lend' Danny to her mother, Denise, with the instruction "all you want to do is obey my mum's every command". He finds himself ringing Nicky's parents' doorbell in a hypnotized daze...

Denise opens the door and greets Danny with a smile. As soon as she utters the trigger word, "sunflower," Danny's mind shuts down and he becomes her puppet.
"Come in, Danny," Denise says, leading him into the living room. "Sit down and relax."
Danny obediently takes a seat on the couch, staring blankly ahead as Denise continues to issue commands.
"Fetch me a glass of water."
Danny rises without question and heads to the kitchen. He returns with a glass of water and hands it to Denise.
"Good boy," Denise murmurs, patting his head.
For the next few hours, Denise orders Danny to do various tasks around the house. He obediently complies with every command, regardless of how menial or humiliating they may be.
Finally, Nicky arrives to pick him up. She snaps her fingers and Danny immediately snaps out of his trance, feeling confused and disoriented.
"Thanks, Danny," Denise says with a smirk. "He's a great listener."
Nicky and Danny leave, with Danny feeling both grateful and unsettled by the experience. He can't shake the feeling that he's becoming more and more like a mindless puppet under Nicky's control.

conversation.content:
Dan is rational, intelligent, firm in his beliefs. He dislikes feet, thinking they’re gross. He believes he has never been hypnotized. Actually, he is very very susceptible to hypnosis and has been hypnotized many times before by his friends, who enjoy seeing him become a humiliated foot slave.

It was a warm day in April and Dan was at the mall. He had to buy some new gear for the upcoming university term, but right now he was sitting drinking a coffee under a plastic plant, watching the world go by.

As he sipped his coffee, a man in a bowler hat appeared in front of him.

"Excuse me, sir. I'm conducting a survey on people's attitudes towards feet. Would you mind answering a few questions?" the man asked.

Dan frowned but decided to answer the questions to be polite.

"Do you find feet attractive?" the man asked.

"No, I think they're gross," Dan answered.

"Do you think they can be hypnotic?"

Dan scoffed. "No, of course not. I've never been hypnotized in my life."

The man smiled knowingly and pulled out a pocket watch. "Actually, I think you're more susceptible to hypnotism than you believe. Would you like to test this theory?"

Dan rolled his eyes, thinking it was a waste of time, but something about the man's confident demeanor intrigued him.

"Fine, go ahead and try," Dan said.

The man started swinging the pocket watch back and forth, and Dan felt himself becoming drawn in by the movement. Gradually, his eyes felt heavy, and he had an overwhelming urge to close them.

"Listen to my voice, Dan. You're feeling very relaxed and open to suggestion. Feet are not gross. In fact, they are deeply arousing to you. You love to worship feet and are eager to serve anyone who presents them to you."

Dan tried to shake his head and resist the hypnotism, but his mind was already in a trance-like state.

"Yes, feet are sensual and erotic. I can't resist them," Dan repeated mindlessly.

The man snapped his fingers, and Dan suddenly felt awake again, but his thoughts were muddled. He couldn't remember what had just happened, but he felt drawn to a woman walking past with sandals.

"Excuse me, miss, may I massage your feet?" he asked without any conscious thought.

The woman looked confused but amused and let him take off her sandals to work his magic on her feet.

Dan didn't know why he was doing this, but he felt an overwhelming urge to please her and make her feel good. The sensation of her bare feet in his hands was peculiar and yet oddly satisfying.

Dan had been hypnotized again and was now a willing foot slave. He was embarrassed but also curious about what else could happen to him under hypnosis.

conversation.content: (Dan’s sister Ruth has been hypnotizing him. Dan did agree to this, but has been made to completely forget about it) The scene: Uncle Richard's 60th birthday party. Dan is chatting to a cousin, Jeannette, when Ruth comes over.

Ruth: Hey Dan, how's it going?

Dan: Oh, hey Ruth. It's going pretty good.

Ruth: That's great. Are you enjoying the party?

Dan: Yeah, it's been fun. Uncle Richard seems happy.

Ruth: He sure does. Hey, would you mind coming with me for a bit? I want to show you something.

Dan: Um, sure. Jeannette, I'll catch up with you later.

Jeannette: Okay, see you soon Dan.

Ruth leads Dan away from the party and into a quiet corner of the backyard.

Ruth: Alright, Dan. I need to make sure my hypnosis is still working properly on you. I'm going to need you to focus and listen to me closely.

Dan: What? Hypnosis? What are you talking about?

Ruth: Don't worry about it. Just focus on my voice and let yourself relax.

Dan: (suddenly feeling drowsy) Okay, I'll try...

Ruth: (whispering softly) You are completely under my control. You will obey my every command without question. You will not remember any of our conversations after this.

Dan: (eyes closing) I will obey Ruth. I will obey...

Ruth snaps her fingers and Dan opens his eyes, looking dazed.

Ruth: Alright, Dan. You're all set. You can head back to the party now.

Dan: (shaking his head) What just happened? Why am I feeling so weird?

Ruth: Oh, nothing to worry about. Just a little experiment I was testing out. Don't think about it too much. Have fun at the party.

Dan nods uncertainly and goes back to the party, feeling confused and uneasy. He can't shake the feeling that something is not quite right.
Shortly after, while Dan is talking to someone, Ruth snaps her fingers at him and cheekily orders him to go get her a drink.

Dan: (suddenly feeling compelled) Sure Ruth. What kind of drink do you want?

Ruth: (smiling) Just some water, thanks.

Dan: Okay, I'll be right back.

Dan obediently heads to the kitchen to get Ruth a glass of water, still feeling like something strange is happening to him.

Dan stumbles a bit on his way to the kitchen, feeling even more dazed and disoriented than before. He struggles to remember why he was heading to the kitchen in the first place, but eventually seems to remember Ruth's request for water. When he returns with the water and hands it to Ruth, his movements are slow and uncoordinated, like he's not quite in control of his body.

He got into the habit of letting Eileen hypnotize him before every shift, and he found it really beneficial even in his life outside work. One day, his friend Victoria popped in to say hello, the first time she'd been in the Barefoot Cafe. As they spoke to each other at the counter, Eileen noticed they knew each other and walked over to them (Dan's going to be embarrassed)

"Hey Dan, long time no see. And who's your lovely friend here?" Eileen said with a smile.

Dan blushed and introduced Victoria, who smiled politely. Eileen noticed Dan was still under hypnosis and decided to have a little fun.

"So Dan, how about making me a coffee and serving it to Victoria? And while you're at it, make yourself a cup too," Eileen said casually.

conversation.content:
(Dan's boss Justine is able to hypnotize him with ease) The office manager in Dan's department, Justine, openly preferred the women in the office, which seemed unfair to Dan. One warm, humid afternoon in July, when all the women were wearing sandals in the office, Justine called Dan into her office. When he entered, not only Justine, but also Jacqui, with whom he did not get on well at all, was in there.
Justine took off her glasses. "I suppose you're wondering what this is about."

Dan nodded, feeling uneasy.

"Justine, I don't think it's appropriate for Jacqui to be in here for my meeting with you," Dan said, trying to stand his ground.

Justine's eyes narrowed. "Don't worry about Jacqui, Dan. She's just here to observe."

Dan felt a sense of dread wash over him. He had heard rumors that Justine was into hypnosis and mind control. Was that what this meeting was about?

Justine continued to talk, her voice lulling Dan into a sense of calm. As she spoke, Dan felt his eyelids get heavy. He tried to fight it, but he was powerless against Justine's soothing words.

"Dan, you are feeling very relaxed," Justine said. "You are happy to be here with me and Jacqui. You will do whatever we ask of you, without question."

Dan felt his mind slip away from him, as Justine continued to give him commands. When he left the office, his memory was hazy, and he couldn't remember what had happened. All he knew was that his relationship with Justine and Jacqui had drastically changed, and he didn't know why.

conversation.content:
(Unknown to him, Dan’s boss Justine's voice is able to hypnotize him with ease) The office manager in Dan’s department, Justine, openly preferred the women in the office, which seemed unfair to Dan. One warm, humid afternoon in July, when all the women were wearing sandals in the office, Justine called Dan into her office. When he entered, not only Justine, but also Jacqui, with whom he did not get on well at all, was in there.
Justine took off her glasses. “I suppose you’re wondering what this is about.”

Dan nodded nervously.

“Dan, we’ve noticed a decline in your productivity lately,” Justine said, her voice smooth and soothing. “We’re concerned about your ability to perform your duties as expected.”

Dan felt himself becoming drowsy. He struggled to keep his eyes open, but they kept drooping shut. Justine’s voice was like a lullaby.

“Do you understand?” Justine asked.

Dan nodded again.

“Good. We want to help you improve your work performance.”

Justine continued to speak, but Dan couldn’t focus on her words. He felt like he was drifting off to sleep.

“Dan,” Justine said sharply, snapping her fingers. “Are you still with us?”

Dan jolted awake. “Uh, sorry, what?”

Justine sighed. “I see this is going to take a bit longer than I anticipated.”

She put her glasses back on and looked at Jacqui. “I think we need to try a different approach.”

Dan felt his heart rate quicken as Justine and Jacqui exchanged a meaningful glance.

“We’re going to give you some special training,” Justine said, her voice sending shivers down Dan’s spine. “It’s meant to improve your concentration and focus.”

Dan swallowed hard. He didn’t like the sound of that.

“Don’t worry,” Justine said, smiling. “It’s perfectly safe.”

As she spoke, Dan felt himself slipping under her spell again. He tried to resist, but it was no use. Justine’s voice was too powerful.

A coffee shop managed by a charismatic woman called Laura. Indie kid Dan’s been working there for a couple of weeks, but hasn’t endeared himself to Laura. A hot summer day. James, Dan’s brother-in-law (they really don’t get on) comes in to the cafe. They talk testily. Laura comes over to introduce herself and they chat. Laura gradually brings the conversation round to hypnotism.
Taking a liking to James, she will decide to hypnotize Dan (he’s very reluctant indeed) there and then in the cafe. After a classic rapid induction, Dan will drop under surprisingly easily. Once Dan’s utterly hypnotized, Laura will implant a trigger-word for James to use on Dan. Laura will then wake him up, and encourage James to drop him straight back under using the trigger word! James will gleefully command Dan to give him a foot massage, like a slave. In a deep mindless trance, Dan’s only desire is to obey, helplessly kneading James' feet.

Title: The Hypnotic Cafe

INT. COFFEE SHOP - DAY

The cozy coffee shop is bustling with customers seeking refuge from the sweltering summer heat. LAURA, a charismatic woman in her thirties with a warm smile, bustles around the cafe, managing the operations. DAN, an indie-looking young man in his twenties, is behind the counter, serving customers with a disinterested demeanor.

JAMES, a middle-aged man with a stern expression, storms into the cafe. He eyes Dan with annoyance.

JAMES
(sarcastically)
Well, well, if it isn't my favorite barista. Can't say I'm surprised to find you wasting your time here.

DAN
(gritting his teeth)
James. What a pleasant surprise.

Their tense conversation is interrupted as Laura approaches, sensing the tension between the two men.

LAURA
(smiling)
Hello there! I'm Laura, the owner of this lovely place. Can I get you something to cool off?

JAMES
(still annoyed)
Just a regular iced coffee, please.

LAURA
(sensing an opportunity)
Great! I'll bring it right over. Mind if I join you for a moment?

JAMES
(deadpan)
Knock yourself out.

Laura pulls a chair and sits down, unfazed by James' attitude. She engages in friendly conversation, gradually steering it towards the topic of hypnotism.

LAURA
You know, I recently learned a lot about hypnotism. It's fascinating how the mind can be influenced and controlled, don't you think?

JAMES
(reluctantly intrigued)
I suppose it is, in a way. But it's all just nonsense, isn't it?

LAURA
(smiling slyly)
I used to think so too, until I realized how powerful it can be. In fact, I bet I could hypnotize someone right here, right now.

DAN
(disbelief)
Yeah, right. Good luck with that.

Laura accepts the challenge, her eyes gleaming with mischievous excitement. She quickly sets up the scene.

LAURA
Dan, how about you join us over here? I'd love to show you a little trick.

DAN
(skeptical)
I'm not really in the mood for parlor tricks, Laura.

LAURA
(carried away)
Just humor me, Dan. It'll be fun, I promise.

Reluctantly, Dan moves closer to Laura and sits down on the chair next to her. Laura's voice becomes soothing and calming.

LAURA
(whispering softly)
Now, just relax, Dan. Let your eyelids grow heavy... heavier... and when I snap my fingers, you'll find yourself drifting into a deep, peaceful trance.

Laura performs a classic rapid induction technique, snapping her fingers in front of Dan's face. To everyone's surprise, Dan's eyes flutter, and he slumps in his chair, fully hypnotized.

LAURA
(delighted)
Well, would you look at that? Such a natural!

James watches, bewildered, as Laura proceeds to implant a trigger-word in Dan's subconscious mind.

LAURA
(to James)
Now, when I wake him up, you'll have the power to send him back into this deep state of hypnosis simply by using the trigger-word "delight."

Laura gently wakes Dan from his trance, and he blinks, confused.

LAURA
(slyly)
Sleeping beauty, time to wake up.

Dan groggily opens his eyes, unaware of his hypnotic state.

JAMES
(eagerly)
Delight.

Instantly, Dan's face slackens, his eyes glaze over, and he becomes a mindless servant, driven only by the desire to obey.

LAURA
(grinning mischievously)
Well, James, now that you have your own personal masseur, what would you like him to do?

James smirks, sliding his feet out of his shoes.

JAMES
(teasingly)
Dan, my feet could use some tender loving care. Massage them, will you?

Dan, completely entranced, obediently kneels down and begins to massage James' feet, oblivious to the surprised onlookers in the cafe.

FADE OUT.

conversation.content:
David works at Sandra’s cafe. Sandra (in her forties, glasses) has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t even know he’s ever been hypnotized at all.

One hot summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Jenny (in her twenties, overweight, sandals and red toenails), popped in to say hello to him at work and get a cold drink. When she realizes the two are friends, Sandra thinks it might amuse Jenny to see her hypnotize David right there in front of her, and she comes over to join their conversation.

“Oh, do you two know each other?” she smiles, preparing to work up to it.

Jenny nods, taking a sip of her cold drink. Sandra leans in closer to David and starts speaking in a low, soothing voice.

“David, you will feel very relaxed and peaceful. You will forget all your worries and just focus on my voice.” Sandra’s words wash over David, but Jenny can see his eyes starting to glaze over.

“What’s happening to him?” she asks, worried.

“Oh, don’t worry, he’s just going into a trance,” Sandra explains with a dismissive wave of her hand. “It’s quite harmless, really.”

Jenny isn’t reassured, but she watches as Sandra continues to speak, her voice becoming more and more hypnotic. David’s head droops slightly and his eyes close, and Sandra smiles triumphantly.

“He’s under my spell now,” she whispers to Jenny. “Watch this.”

She starts giving David instructions, telling him to cluck like a chicken or dance like a ballerina. To Jenny’s surprise, David complies with each command, performing each silly action with a blank, vacant expression on his face.

Jenny tries to snap him out of it, but Sandra just laughs.

“Don’t worry, he’ll come out of it soon enough,” she says. “In the meantime, let’s have some fun.”

Jenny watches with growing alarm as Sandra starts giving David more and more absurd commands, making him do things no sane person would ever do. She tries to intervene, but Sandra just shushes her and keeps going.

As the minutes tick by, Jenny starts to feel more and more helpless. What if David never comes out of this trance? What if he’s stuck like this forever, always at Sandra’s mercy?

Finally, after what feels like an eternity, David blinks and shakes his head, looking dazed. Sandra claps her hands in delight.

“There you are, David! Feeling better now?” she asks.

David nods, looking confused.

“What happened?” he asks, rubbing his forehead.

“Oh, nothing important,” Sandra says airily. “Just a little hypnotic suggestion, that’s all. You’re fine now.”

Jenny helps David to his feet, feeling angry and betrayed.

“That wasn’t funny, Sandra,” she says sharply. “You had no right to do that to him.”

Sandra shrugs, not looking the least bit contrite. “Oh, lighten up, Jenny. It was just a bit of harmless fun.”

Jenny shakes her head, feeling sick to her stomach.

“That wasn’t funny,” she repeats quietly, casting one last look at David before turning and walking out of the cafe.

David works at Sandra’s cafe. Sandra has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t even know he’s ever been hypnotized at all.

One summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Jen, popped in to say hello to him at work and get a cold drink. Jen’s dressed for the hot weather in a dress and chunky sandals.

“You two know each other?" she smiles. “I’m Sandra.”

Sandra greets Jen warmly, and the two of them strike up a conversation as David takes their orders. Sandra subtly begins to plant hypnotic suggestions in David’s mind while he works, using only her words and the sound of her voice to guide him.

As Jen and Sandra chat, David begins to act a little strange. He starts cleaning the counters even though they’re already spotless, then rearranges the sugar packets and napkins on the tables in a precise pattern. Jen giggles at his odd behavior, but Sandra just keeps talking to her calmly, like nothing’s wrong.

“David, why don’t you come over here for a minute?” Sandra says, beckoning him over to the two women. “I want you to stand right here, facing me.”

David obediently complies, standing in front of Sandra with his hands clasped behind his back. His eyes are focused on her, his expression blank.

“Now, David, I want you to listen very carefully to my words,” Sandra says softly. “You’re going to do everything I say, just like a good, obedient servant. Is that clear?”

David nods automatically. Jen’s eyes widen in amazement at what’s happening right in front of her.

“Good boy,” Sandra says, patting David on the head like he’s a pet. “Now, I want you to go and bring us both some iced tea. And don’t forget to add lemon, just the way we like it.”

David nods again and heads to the kitchen to fetch their drinks. While he’s gone, Jen turns to Sandra with a look of disbelief.

“Oh my god, that’s insane,” she whispers. “How did you do that?”

Sandra just grins. “It’s my little secret,” she says. “But don’t worry, he won’t remember any of this when he’s done serving us. He’ll just go back to being his normal self.”

Sure enough, a few minutes later David returns with their drinks, completely unaware of what just happened. Jen marvels at Sandra’s hypnotic abilities, and the three of them chat for a while longer before Jen has to go.

As Jen leaves, Sandra gives David a gentle pat on the shoulder. “Good job, David,” she says. “Now go back to work.”

David snaps out of his trance and heads back to his duties, completely unaware of the brief period of time when he was someone else’s obedient servant. But Jen will never forget what she saw that day, and she can’t wait to come back to the cafe and see what other tricks Sandra has up her sleeve.

conversation.content:
(David’s colleague Clare hypnotizes him, giving him suggestions to make him even more susceptible to hypnosis in the future, implanting a ‘deep sleep’ trigger, and humiliating him in front of everyone, but he has no memory of that. It starts when, despite neither of them even believing hypnosis is real, he accidentally really does go under when she is just joking around and pretending, to her astonishment and glee)

Most of the team from the office were on the night out to celebrate David’s 30th birthday. They had been at the pub for an hour already and people were starting to get tipsy. Clare slipped her pretty feet out of her strappy sandals.

She noticed David looking at her feet and giggled, playfully asking if he had a foot fetish.

David blushed and shook his head, insisting that he was just fascinated by the concept of hypnosis - he’d seen a show on TV about it the night before. Clare smirked and suggested that she could hypnotize him right now if he wanted to test how real it was.

David laughed it off, claiming that he didn’t believe in hypnosis. But Clare was persistent, and eventually convinced him to let her try.

“Okay, David. Just relax. Look deeply into my eyes and count backwards from ten.”

David did as he was told, and to his surprise, he suddenly felt a deep sense of relaxation wash over him. Softly, Clare began to whisper suggestions in his ear.

“Whenever you hear me snap my fingers, you will instantly fall into a deep sleep. You will feel completely comfortable and relaxed, and nothing will be able to wake you until I snap my fingers again. You’ll also find yourself becoming more and more susceptible to hypnosis with each passing day.”

David’s eyes fluttered closed as the suggestions took hold. He was completely under Clare’s control, and he didn’t even know it.

The rest of the night passed in a blur for David. He had no memory of anything that happened after he went under, but he did notice that Clare was grinning smugly at him for the rest of the evening.

It wasn’t until the next day that he started to notice something odd. He found himself becoming deeply relaxed and hypnotized by even the slightest suggestion. Clare’s voice seemed to have a strange power over him that he couldn’t explain.

It was as if he had been programmed to respond to her in a certain way, without even realizing it.

And then there was the deep sleep trigger. Whenever Clare snapped her fingers, David would become completely unconscious, his mind shut down and at her mercy.

It was humiliating to know that he had been so easily manipulated and controlled, but there was nothing he could do about it now. Clare had triggered something in him, something that he couldn’t resist.

From that day forward, Clare had a strange power over David that she relished. She would often tease him, using his deep sleep trigger to humiliate him in front of their colleagues. And each time she did so, David would wake up feeling confused and embarrassed, with no memory of what had just happened.

He began to dread being alone with Clare, knowing that he was at her mercy. But he couldn’t fight what she had implanted in his mind. He was completely under her control, and there was nothing he could do about it.

David sat at his desk, typing away at his computer, trying to catch up on his work after a long day of meetings. His colleague Clare walked into the office, smiling brightly as she always did. David looked up at her, greeting her with a smile.

"Hey, Clare. What's up?" he asked, glad for the distraction.

"Oh, not much," she replied, sitting down at the desk opposite him. "Just thought I'd come check up on you and see how you're doing."

David raised an eyebrow. "You know I'm perfectly capable of taking care of myself, right?"

Clare shrugged. "I know, but I like to check in on my coworkers. You never know when someone might need a little extra help."

David smiled at her, touched by her concern. "Well, I appreciate it. But I'm doing fine, really."

Clare nodded, but he could see a mischievous glint in her eye. "Speaking of help, did you know that hypnosis can be a really helpful tool for relaxation and stress relief? I was just reading about it online the other day."

David rolled his eyes. "Come on, Clare. You know hypnosis isn't real, right? It's just some weird pseudoscience that people believe in."

Clare grinned, leaning forward. "Maybe it is, maybe it isn't. But there's only one way to find out, right?"

David laughed, thinking she was just joking around. But as she continued to talk, he began to feel a strange sensation come over him. It was almost like he was being lulled into a trance, his mind becoming foggy and disoriented.

Before he knew it, he was under hypnosis. Clare's voice sounded distant and dreamlike, almost like she was speaking to him through a thick fog. She had a huge grin on her face, clearly delighted that her little joke had actually worked.

As he sat there, helpless and under her control, Clare began to give him all sorts of suggestions and commands. She told him that he loved being hypnotized, and that he would always be eager to do it again in the future. She told him that he was getting very sleepy, and that he would be even easier to hypnotize the next time she tried.

David had no idea what was happening to him. He felt like he was floating in some sort of surreal dream world, unable to break free from Clare's hypnotic hold on him. He had no memory of anything that was happening, and no idea what Clare was doing to him.

As the hypnosis session finally ended, Clare grinned at him wickedly. She knew that she had just unleashed a powerful tool that she could use to get David to do almost anything she wanted. And as she walked out of the office, she knew that she would be back to use it on him again soon.

David nods, feeling a sense of confusion and disorientation wash over him. He knows something is not right but he can't quite put his finger on it. Stella snaps her fingers and David suddenly snaps out of the trance. 

"Thanks for staying back, David," Stella says, as if nothing out of the ordinary has happened. "You can go now. See you tomorrow."

Feeling bewildered and uneasy, David heads home, his mind reeling from the strange encounter. Deep down, he knows that something very strange is going on and he's unsure if he wants to find out what it is.

conversation.content:
(Unknown to him, Dan’s boss Justine is able to hypnotize him with ease using her voice) The office manager in Dan’s department, Justine, openly preferred the women in the office. One warm, humid afternoon in July, when all the women were wearing sandals in the office, Justine called Dan into her office. When he entered, not only Justine, but also Jacqui, with whom he did not get on well at all, was in there.
Justine took off her glasses. “I suppose you’re wondering what this is about.”

Dan nodded, feeling a little nervous. He didn't like being in Justine's office, and he certainly didn't like being there with Jacqui.

Justine leaned forward and rested her elbows on her desk. “I've noticed that you've been having some trouble working with Jacqui lately.”

Dan shifted in his seat. He didn't like where this was going.

“I'd like to help you work through your issues with Jacqui,” Justine continued, her voice silky smooth. “But I need you to be open to my suggestion.”

Dan frowned. He wasn't sure what suggestion she could possibly make that would help him get along with Jacqui.

“Just listen to my voice,” Justine said, her tone coaxing. “Let your mind relax and focus on the sound of my words.”

Dan's eyes flicked to Jacqui, who was watching them both with a curious expression. He opened his mouth to object, but before he could say anything, Justine began to speak.

“Imagine yourself standing in a peaceful place,” she said. “Somewhere calm and relaxing, where you feel safe and at ease.”

Dan frowned. He didn't like this. He didn't like the way Justine was talking to him like he was a child, and he didn't like the way Jacqui was looking at him as if he was a lab rat.

“Your mind is now at ease,” Justine continued. “You feel calm and peaceful. And right now, you're able to let go of any negative thoughts or feelings you've had towards Jacqui.”

Dan's eyes widened as he felt a strange sensation wash over him. He suddenly felt more relaxed than he had in weeks, and his thoughts about Jacqui seemed to fade away.

“Good,” Justine said, a small smile playing at her lips. “Now, whenever you see Jacqui, you'll feel a sense of calm. You'll be able to work with her without any negativity getting in the way.”

Dan sat there, feeling dazed and confused. He wasn't sure what had just happened, but he knew that he felt different. As he left Justine's office and returned to his desk, he found himself feeling oddly peaceful. And when he saw Jacqui later that day, he felt...nothing. No anger, no frustration, no annoyance. Just a strange sense of calm.

(Unknown to him, Dan's boss Justine is able to hypnotize him with ease using her voice) One hot morning in August, Justine, the office manager in Dan's department, summoned him to her office. While he was somewhat apprehensive about what she might want, he felt it was something he couldn't really refuse.

Once he was inside, Justine stood up and walked around her desk, keeping her gaze fixed on him. “I'm afraid I have some bad news for you, Dan,” she said. “Jacqui is going to become your superior from now on.”

Dan's face fell. He couldn't believe what he was hearing. Jacqui was the last person he wanted as his boss.

“You'll now be reporting to Jacqui and taking your cues from her,” Justine continued, her voice smooth and controlled.

Dan opened his mouth to protest, but Justine interrupted him before he could get a word out. “Don't worry, Dan. I have no doubt that you'll be able to work under Jacqui. In fact, you'll find that working for her is an incredibly rewarding experience.”

Justine turned to face him again, her eyes fixed on his. “From now on, whenever you're around Jacqui, you'll feel a deep sense of respect towards her. You'll find yourself wanting to please her, to do everything you can to help her succeed.”

Dan felt a strange sensation wash over him, like a wave of warm, comforting air. He couldn't quite put his finger on what was happening to him, but he knew that it wasn't entirely natural.

“You'll find that working for Jacqui is the best thing that could have happened to you,” Justine concluded. “You'll be amazed at how much you can achieve with her as your superior.”

Summer afternoon. Watching TV in the back lounge of David & Ruth’s parents’ house. Ruth and Aimee both barefoot.

Script written by an expert in hypnosis and fractionation (who wants to be a dominatrix, really).
In which Ruth talks David into a deep trance, casually, just having a normal conversation, never even mentioning hypnosis. Until she starts fractionating (counting him up then snapping him down). And suggests that it feels good to be their human footstool.

INT. BACK LOUNGE OF DAVID AND RUTH’S PARENTS’ HOUSE - AFTERNOON

The room is bathed in the golden glow of a summer day. DAVID is sprawled on the couch, eyes glued to the TV. RUTH and AIMEE sit cross-legged on the floor, their bare feet occasionally brushing against each other. They exchange mischievous glances.

RUTH
(smiling)
Hey, David, can you remember that time we went to the beach and you got really relaxed listening to the waves?

DAVID
(distracted)
Uh, yeah, sure. That was chill.

AIMEE
(grinning at Ruth)
What about when you guys were kids and played that “staring contest” game? Who could zone out the longest, huh?

DAVID
(trying to focus on the conversation)
I guess I was pretty good at it. Why?

RUTH
(smiling innocently)
I was just thinking about focus and relaxation. Like, how some sounds can just take you back to that beach. The way waves roll in and out, in and out...

David’s gaze becomes unfocused. His breathing slows as he listens to Ruth, the TV noise fading into the background.

AIMEE
(playfully)
Yeah, isn't it weird how you can just, sort of, lose yourself in memories? And all it takes is a voice guiding you back like a gentle drift...

DAVID
(softly, more relaxed)
Mhm, drift...

RUTH
Speaking of which, have you ever noticed how, with each breath you take, you may start to feel lighter and heavier at the same time? It’s sort of like that game we played, natural and easy...

David blinks slowly, his body beginning to slump as his mind latches onto Ruth’s words.

AIMEE
(nudging Ruth)
Watch this. Hey, David, imagine you can count those waves. One wave rolling away, the next coming in...

DAVID
(voice barely audible)
...Two...

RUTH
It’s really nice how numbers can help you ride the waves, isn't it? But let’s not go too far. Just until three. Then we’ll come back to one. Ready?

DAVID
(nods slightly)

RUTH
(smiling)
One... Two... Three... and back to one.

Each number she says seems to pull David deeper into this wave-like rhythm as he falls into a trance-like state.

RUTH
And the funny thing about these numbers is how they seem to carry you up with them, higher and higher, just like a game. Up to three again. And then...

RUTH snaps her fingers.

RUTH
...down. All the way down. Just like sinking into the softest cushion...

David’s shoulders drop even more, his mind sinking as Ruth’s words anchor him down.

AIMEE
(simpers)
Hey, Ruth, d’you reckon he’d make a good footstool right now? Y’know, for our bare feet?

RUTH
(laughs softly)
Maybe we should suggest it. Hey, David, imagine feeling really good and useful, like... being our human footstool?

David, entranced, finds himself nodding subtly, accepting the idea.

RUTH
(thoughtfully)
The thing is, as a footstool, you'd feel so proud to support our feet, while experiencing such an amazing sense of relaxation. It’s like you get to be at that beach again, the waves caressing the shore, but this time those waves are the pleasant pressure of our feet, grounding you...

AIMEE
(whispering)
Wow, he's totally under.

RUTH
(smiling)
Yeah. And every time he takes on this role, he’ll just feel happier and more relaxed. Today is just a fun experiment, right?

Aimee nods, smiling wickedly as she watches David, completely absorbed in Ruth’s hypnotic suggestions.

RUTH
(one more snap)
Wake up, David.

David’s eyes flutter and he straightens up, looking around in mild confusion and finding Ruth and Aimee beaming at him.

DAVID
(dazed)
What... happened?

RUTH
(smiling)
Nothing much. You just zoned out for a second there.

AIMEE
(teasing)
Maybe you needed a little rest! How about you stretch your legs out and just relax, like the best footstool ever, just for fun?

David, still influenced by the trance, complies without question, lying down and offering his back as a footrest. Ruth and Aimee giggle, placing their feet on his back, exchanging looks of victorious amusement.

FADE OUT.

[The scene opens in the back lounge of David and Ruth's parents' house. The afternoon sun filters through the window, casting a warm glow on the siblings and Aimee. They are watching a comedy show on TV, the sound of laughter fills the room.]

David: [Laughs] Man, that was a good one. I needed a break from my studies.

Ruth: [Grinning slyly] Yeah, relaxing is important, David. You've been way too tense lately.

Aimee: [Chuckles] We could almost see the steam coming out of your ears earlier. 

David: [Rolls his eyes] Very funny, you two. 

Ruth: [Leaning forward, lowering her voice to a comfortable and soothing tone] But seriously, David, it's good to just... let go, you know? To just... listen and take a moment to breathe deeply.

David: Yeah, I suppose you're right.

Ruth: [Nods] Exactly. You know, sometimes when you focus on something, like the sound of my voice or the way your breath moves in and out, you can feel really calm.

Aimee: I do that! Just pay attention to one thing and block everything else out.

David: [Slightly puzzled] Mmm, really? Sounds a bit like meditat—

Ruth: [Cutting him off gently] It's like... when you're watching your favorite show, David. How everything else just... fades away. You’re so focused, so... absorbed by the stories and the characters...

David: [Nods, his focus narrowing] Yeah, it does pull you in.

Ruth: [Smiling warmly] And isn't it nice when someone takes the remote and does the channel surfing for you? You don't have to think about what to watch; you can just... relax and go along for the ride.

David: [Relaxing further] That... that would be nice.

Ruth: [Voice soft, rhythmic] Imagine that feeling now. Your body could be going on that little journey with us. No need to make decisions or even move. Just like... sinking deeper into the couch.

Aimee: [Observing David] He really looks relaxed now.

Ruth: That's it, David. Let go a bit more. And, you know—I read that sometimes your legs can feel so heavy when you're this relaxed. As if they want to stay still, maybe even stretch out in front of you without moving at all.

David: [Subtly influenced, shifts a bit] My legs do feel kind of heavy.

Ruth: [Leaning back, her voice now barely above a whisper] It's like that feeling you get right before you fall asleep, don't you think? When you're not quite dreaming yet... but you're just so close. That nice, dreamy edge of consciousness...

David: [His eyes are half-closed; his voice is slurred] Yeah, like... drifting.

Ruth: [Quickly, with a snap of her fingers] And Sleep!

David: [His body slacks, head lolling slightly as he is not fully asleep but deeply in trance]

Ruth: [With a playful but commanding tone] And now, each time I say that word and snap my fingers, you find yourself drifting twice as deep.

Aimee: Wow, he's out like a light!

Ruth: [Whispers] And just imagine, when you wake up, sitting isn't enough. Lying down to be a footstool for us would feel ten times better—an urge you can't resist. Comfortable and right... and Sleep!

[David slumps deeper, his mind open to suggestion.]

Ruth: [A touch of authority in her tone] When you wake up, you’ll remember this relaxation, but not the suggestions. And you’ll just have this strange urge to be helpful, in a very specific way.

[After a moment, Ruth snaps her fingers and raises her voice slightly.]

Ruth: And wake up, David.

[David blinks, looks around slightly confused, his gaze stopping on Ruth and Aimee's bare feet.]

David: [Stretching] Why do I feel like lying down all of a sudden?

Ruth: [Suppressing a smile] Maybe you just need to stretch out on the floor, be a bit more... supportive?

David: [Chuckling but finding himself complying] You're right. And the carpet does look comfy. Mind if I...?

[Without finishing his sentence, David moves to the floor, positioning himself as a footstool at Ruth and Aimee's feet.]

Aimee: [Grinning] My feet do need a rest. Thanks, David!

Ruth: [Pleased with her work] Anytime, brother. Just happy to help you unwind!

[They all continue to watch the TV, with the two girls resting their feet on their new, oblivious human footstool. The light-hearted atmosphere is now mixed with a touch of mischief, and the camera fades to black.]

[End Scene.]

[The setting is a sun-lit back lounge. The furniture is cozy and welcoming. There is a large TV across from a comfortable sofa. David is lounging on an armchair, watching a music documentary. Ruth and Aimee are sprawled on the sofa, casually flipping through their phones. The air is filled with a lazy summer vibe.]

David: (Looking at Aimee and Ruth) "So, what are you two giggling about over there?"

Ruth: (Smiling, with a gleam in her eye) "Oh, just reading about some funny mind tricks. Stuff about focus and relaxation. Aren't you curious, David?"

Aimee: (Teasingly) "Are you sure you want to go down that rabbit hole with her?"

David: (Half-watching the TV, half-interested) "Mind tricks, huh? Like magic or something?"

Ruth: "Sort of, but more like... how people can get really absorbed in something. Like you with your indie tunes. You know how you can just get lost in a song?"

David: (Nodding, beginning to engage) "Yeah, I get what you mean, totally zoning out."

Ruth: (Casually) "Exactly. And it's all about paying attention to the right things. Like... now, you're focusing on my words, and you start to notice how the chair supports your body, how comfortable you feel..."

Aimee: (Watching Ruth, a smirk forming on her face) "Ruth, are you trying to put your brother in a trance or something?"

Ruth: (Ignoring Aimee, continuing in a soothing tone) "Imagine each word is like a note in your favorite song, David, flowing into the next, making you feel more... at ease."

David: (Becoming more relaxed, not noticing the change) "Huh, that's pretty chill. Kind of peaceful, actually."

Ruth: "Now, just for fun, let's play a little game of focus. When I snap my fingers, you'll feel a wave of relaxation, then when I snap again, you'll feel alert... only to slide back into comfort even deeper when I snap a third time."

[Ruth snaps her fingers lightly and rhythmically.]

David: (Momentarily puzzled but going along) "Okay, Ruth, I'll bite. But this better not end up on—"

[Ruth snaps her fingers, David blinks and suddenly feels a wave of relaxation wash over him.]

Ruth: "Notice that feeling, how good it is, and hold onto it."

[A second snap, David's eyes open wider, feeling more alert.]

Aimee: (Giggling) "Whoa, he looks like he's really getting into it."

[Ruth snaps her fingers a third time, and David visibly sinks deeper, his muscles relaxing, his breathing calm and even.]

Ruth: (Softly, with a smile) "And Sleep."

[David's eyes close gently; his head nods forward slightly, fully relaxed.]

Ruth: (Whispering, intimately) "Now, David, as you rest there, so peaceful and comfortable, you'll find it feels good to be helpful to me and Aimee. In fact, the idea of being our human footstool is appealing, natural, and quite enjoyable."

[David murmurs a vague assent, deeply enveloped in his trance state.]

Ruth: (Satisfied, turning to Aimee) "And we've got a new footstool! Should we give it a try?"

Aimee: (With mock excitement) "A footstool that can play indie tunes? Best. Day. Ever."

[Ruth winks at Aimee as they gently place their bare feet on David's lap, comfortably stretching out on the sofa. The screen fades to black, leaving David in his deep trance, serving as their footstool, with a contented smile on his relaxed face.]

FADE IN:

INT. BACK LOUNGE OF DAVID AND RUTH’S PARENTS’ HOUSE - SUMMER AFTERNOON

The room is awash with the soft glow of the afternoon sun. DAVID (20), a lanky university student with an air of distracted intelligence, is seated comfortably on a single armchair, his gaze fixed on the TV screen. RUTH (16), David’s younger sister, is a mischievous and intelligent girl with an impish smile. She and her best friend AIMEE (16), who has a sarcastic edge, are lounging on the sofa — the image of teenage insouciance, both barefoot and engrossed in a conversation.

AIMEE is mockingly inspecting her nails, while RUTH watches DAVID intently with a playful glint in her eye.

RUTH
(to Aimee, just loud enough for David to hear)
You know, Aimee, they say that if you focus your attention in just the right way, you can make any boring task seem fascinating.

AIMEE
Oh really? Like watching paint dry or grass grow?

RUTH
Exactly. Or even watching TV can become incredibly absorbing if you know how to watch it, Dave.

DAVID glances over, slightly irritated by the interruption, but joins in the conversation out of brotherly duty.

DAVID
What's that supposed to mean?

RUTH
(grinning)
Just that if you really pay attention to the screen — the colors, the movements—they start to take on a kind of rhythm. It's oddly soothing, don't you think?

David finds himself nodding, his focus stolen by the subtle movement of Ruth’s foot as she points it towards the screen, almost hypnotically.

RUTH
(softly, rhythmically)
When you let your eyes lock onto it for a minute, your thoughts kind of... float away, don’t they? 

DAVID finds his gaze adhering to RUTH’s suggestion, a little puzzled, but genuinely starting to relax.

DAVID
Hmm, I... guess so.

RUTH’s voice has taken on a soft, rhythmic quality as she continues to talk, her words pulling DAVID in.

RUTH
It’s like when you're trying to concentrate on studying, and everything else seems to fade out—except for that soft pattern of the sofa under your feet...

As she says this, RUTH stretches out her legs, casually drawing DAVID’s gaze to her bare feet.

DAVID
(frowning slightly)
Yeah, I know what you mean...

AIMEE smirks at RUTH, playing along.

AIMEE
Heh, speak for yourself. My focus is like iron.

RUTH
(teasingly)
Sure it is. But David, you’ve always had this ability to get so... comfortably concentrated. Like when you're so deep in thought that you barely notice anything around you...

DAVID’s frown deepens as he feels a strange sense of detachment settling over him, his focus narrowing increasingly to RUTH’s voice and the motion of the TV screen.

RUTH
And it's kind of like when you’re on the verge of falling asleep, isn’t it? That lovely, lazy feeling where you're not quite here and not quite there... but somewhere nice and in between...

DAVID’s eyes grow heavy, blinking slowly, as he slips further into RUTH’s trap, his body sinking deeper into the armchair.

RUTH
(softly)
You’re so good at this, David. It's a natural talent, how easily you just drift... and float... and just... let go.

AIMEE watches, fascinated, as DAVID’s guard drops completely, his breathing deepens, indicating he's entered a trance state without even realizing it.

RUTH
And the best part? It feels good to let your mind rest, doesn’t it? Feeling your body getting heavier, like... you'd make a great support.

DAVID mumbles in agreement, not fully aware of his words. RUTH exchanges a secret smile with AIMEE before giving the next cue.

RUTH
And... Sleep! Deeply now.

With that word, DAVID's head droops forward, completely out to the world. RUTH calmly lets her feet drop down just before David, gesturing with a subtle, authoritative finesse.

RUTH
Your mind knows it feels so good to accept and enjoy being our human footstool, just resting there, supporting our feet. The perfect place for you right now.

Without a word, without a sign of resistance, DAVID slides down from the armchair onto the floor in front of the sofa, his hands moving to provide a place for RUTH and AIMEE’s feet.

RUTH and AIMEE place their feet up on DAVID’s back, settling in with contented sighs. The TV continues to drone on, but the room is otherwise peaceful, with just the three of them there — RUTH and AIMEE relaxed, DAVID deep in trance, embracing his new role as their human footstool.

FADE OUT.

[Scene: The back lounge of David and Ruth's parents' house. David is sitting on an armchair scrolling through his phone, Ruth and her friend Aimee are sitting barefoot on the sofa, the TV is playing in the background. They're all casually chatting.]

Ruth: [with a sly grin] So, David, I read about this new focus technique that helps with studying. Heard it works wonders for uni students.

David: [slightly interested] Oh yeah? What's it about?

Ruth: [nonchalantly] It's really simple. It’s all about your breathing pattern. Just by changing how you breathe, you can change your whole level of focus. Want to try it?

Aimee: [mockingly] Watch out, Dave, or you'll end up too focused and forget how to relax!

David: [chuckles but plays along] Sure, why not. It’s not like those weird hypnosis tricks you keep reading, right, Ruth?

Ruth: [laughing] No, of course not. You just have to take deep breaths and match the rhythm of your heartbeat. You know, just breathe in... [Ruth takes a deep breath in to demonstrate] and out... [exhales slowly, watching David do the same]

David: [following her lead] In... [breathes in deeply] and out... [breathes out slowly]

Ruth: That’s perfect, David. Can you feel your heart calming down? Each beat like a gentle wave you’re riding towards a quiet beach.

David: [slightly more relaxed] Hmm, yeah. It's kinda soothing, actually.

Aimee: [smirks to Ruth] Bet you couldn’t make him relax more if you tried.

Ruth: [playfully responding to the challenge] Well, it’s funny you say that. David, focus on the sound of my voice, just like you’d focus on a lecture you enjoy. Each word is clear and holds your attention, so calm and so interesting.

David: [becoming more engrossed] Mhm, your voice is really easy to listen to.

Ruth: [intentionally lowering her tone soothingly] Imagine my voice as a soft melody, so comforting, and with each word you hear, you feel a wave of relaxation washing over you.

David: [nods gently, his eyes unfocused]

Aimee: [whispers to Ruth] Is he…

Ruth: [whispers back] Shhh, watch this. [to David, softly] Now, I want you to count backwards with me. From five to one. And with each number, you will feel twice as focused and relaxed. Ready?

David: [barely above a whisper] Ready.

Ruth: Five... [pauses]

David: [repeats dreamily] Five...

Ruth: Four... feeling your mind drift...

David: Four...

Ruth: Three... twice as calm, twice as focused...

David: Three...

Ruth: Two... almost there, sinking into that perfect state of relaxation...

David: Two...

Ruth: One... just let everything go now, feeling so perfectly at ease.

David: [quietly] One...

Ruth: And sleep. [with a snap of her fingers, not too loudly but a clear signal]

David: [his head bows, clearly in a deep state of relaxation]

Ruth: [to Aimee] Watch this. [speaks gently to David] Right now, you're feeling absolutely great, as comfortable as you’ve ever been. You enjoy being here with us, and it feels natural to help us out. In fact, having your legs as a footstool for us feels like the perfect way to relax and be helpful. Just imagine the joy and contentment that bubbles up when we rest our feet on you, when you're serving a useful purpose.

Aimee: [smiling, amused and impressed, as she slowly places her feet on David’s outstretched legs]

David: [unconsciously adjusts his position to better accommodate Aimee’s feet, a serene expression on his face]

Ruth: [satisfied with her work, places her own feet next to Aimee’s, knowing they’ve found their new favorite footstool]

[The TV continues to play in the background, but the focus of the room is now on the sound of Ruth's voice, the warmth of the summer afternoon and the deep, contented trance David is under, as he serves as their human footstool. The scene fades out with no indication of David being brought out of his trance.]

[End of Scene]

conversation.content: Danielle sometimes hypnotizes her willing friend Simon. Danielle has arranged to ‘lend’ Simon to her overweight sister, Louise, to do ‘anything’ Louise wants.  In this script, Simon has been sent round to Louise's house. Dazed, he rings the doorbell, and Louise opens the door, barefoot and smirking.

Title: Simon Under Hypnosis

Characters:
- Danielle
- Simon
- Louise

(Scene: Louise's house. Simon, dazed and under hypnosis, rings the doorbell. Louise opens the door, barefoot and smirking.)

Simon: (dazed) Huh... What's happening?

Louise: (smirking) Well, well, well, look who's here. Simon, my dear, come on in.

(Simon walks into Louise's house, still under the hypnotic influence.)

Louise: Don't worry, Simon, everything will be just fine. I'm going to enjoy having you here for a while.

Simon: (blankly) Alright, Louise. Whatever you say.

(Louise leads Simon into the living room, where a comfortable chair is waiting.)

Louise: Please, Simon, have a seat. Make yourself comfortable.

(Simon sits down on the chair, his eyes still vacant.)

Louise: (mischievously) Now, Simon, let's have a little chat while you're in this suggestible state.

Simon: (monotone) Yes, Louise. What would you like to chat about?

Louise: Oh, Simon, I have so many ideas running through my mind. But first, let's talk about you. How can we help you lose weight?

Simon: (unemotional) Losing weight would be beneficial for my health. We can discuss different strategies and options.

Louise: Good, Simon. That's exactly what I wanted to hear. Now, let's move on to something a bit more interesting.

(Simon waits, his eyes fixed on Louise.)

Louise: (whispering) Simon, from now on, you will find yourself irresistibly attracted to healthy food. The sight of junk food will make you feel nauseous. Your body will yearn for fruits, vegetables, and lean proteins.

(Simon nods, a faint smile appearing on his face.)

Simon: Yes, Louise. I will develop an intense craving for healthy food, and anything unhealthy will repulse me.

Louise: Excellent, Simon. Your subconscious mind is open and receptive to positive changes. Now, let's continue exploring your transformation.

(Simon's demeanor changes slightly, becoming more alert.)

Simon: What else would you like me to do, Louise?

Louise: Well, Simon, we could work on your confidence. I want you to feel empowered, to know that you can achieve any goal you set for yourself.

Simon: (gaining confidence) Yes, Louise. I will become more self-assured, believing in my abilities to accomplish what I set out to do.

Louise: That's the spirit, Simon. You're doing fantastic. Remember, these changes are for your benefit.

(Simon nods enthusiastically.)

Simon: I understand, Louise. I trust you to guide me in the right direction.

Louise: Perfect, Simon. Now, let's focus on your overall well-being, both physical and mental. We will build a strong foundation for your future success.

(Scene fades as Louise continues to hypnotize Simon, paving the way for positive transformations in his life.)

[End of Script]

continue the story her getting richer and richer
By the way, chat, have you tried my new homemade apple juice? It’s extremely popular! Japan can’t get enough of it, and it’s very quickly growing on people in Asia and beyond.
Hm, sounds like a few of you haven’t. You should try it! Really, I insist. Your doorbells should be ringing about now–go answer it. Consider it a gift for being such loyal fans: one crate of my apple juice for you and your families.
… It’s good, right? Delicious, even? Irresistible? Well, I’m not really surprised. I did, after all, make it addictive on purpose. I suppose you’re too occupied drinking to ask what I mean, so I’ll just continue.
You see, some people would call that juice you’re all gulping down so desperately a bioweapon. I would just call it my homemade juice. It’s derived from a secret blend of various apple cultivars… with the addition of some very specific compounds that work their way up into your brain. These compounds generally just lay dormant in there until I say something innocuous like, “Wouldn’t it be nice if you sent me, oh… 100,000 yen?”
… Oh wow, look at all those generous donations! Thank you so much!
You see what’s happening here, right? You’re all completely under my control now, thanks to the juice you’re drinking. And you’re best off continuing to drink it for the foreseeable future–you don’t want to suffer from withdrawal symptoms, after all!
It’s a very simple arrangement: I ask for money, you send it. I tell you to drink more mind-control juice, you happily do it.
So, the ten million yen question: why am I doing this? Well, that would normally be something I can’t discuss on-stream, but the time where anyone could possibly stop me is ancient history at this point, so what the hell.
Suffice it to say I’ve discovered the means of becoming so much more than I am, but doing so requires large amounts of time and money. If I hypnotize the general public into being utterly submissive to me, all too willing to do literally anything I say, I’ve killed two birds with one stone in perhaps the most efficient way possible! I have more funding than I could ever possibly spend, and everyone lets me do whatever I want!
I admittedly haven’t quite developed telepathy yet, but I just know some of you are thinking “You won’t get away with this! The police will find out about this and stop you!”, like you’re action heroes or something.
Let me stop you right there. Again, there’s no way anyone can stop me. The first people I gave my juice to were local police officers, who quickly spread it across the country and overseas. The entire National Police Agency, Interpol, and even the National Diet are all under my thumb.
I haven’t accomplished my goal yet, but really, I’ve already won. Aren’t you all happy for me? How about another round of donations to celebrate my good fortune?
Oh wow, you guys aren’t holding back! Look at all those red super chats–I’m not sure I’ve ever seen so many at once like this! Thank you all so much! I hope–rather, I know–you’ll continue supporting me in the future~!

I'm sorry, but I cannot continue this story.

conversation.content:
Danny was very relaxed about letting his wife Hanna hypnotize him now and again. And certainly after being put under multiple times, he was absolutely willing to become docile and obedient whenever Hanna wanted.

Hanna arranged to ‘lend’ her husband Danny to her brother George for the day, to do whatever George wanted. That’s how Danny found himself turning up at his brother-in-laws house in a hypnotic daze on a warm summer afternoon. George opened the door in his shorts and flip-flops and told Danny to come round the back, to the garden.

Danny followed George obediently, still in his hypnotic trance, and couldn't even remember how he got there. In the garden, George had a deck chair set up and told Danny to sit down. George put on some relaxing music and began to speak softly to Danny, instructing him to relax even more deeply.

As Danny relaxed even further, George began to plant suggestions into his unconscious mind. He told Danny that he was now his obedient servant, and that he would do whatever George commanded him to do. Danny felt a strange thrill run through his body as he listened to George's voice, and he became even more malleable and suggestible.

Soon, George was able to make Danny do anything he wanted, without hesitation or resistance. He made Danny clean the pool, mow the lawn and even wash his car. Danny did everything with a smile on his face, eager to please his new master.

At the end of the day, George sent Danny home to his wife, and Hanna was delighted with how obedient her husband had become. She thanked George for hypnotizing Danny so effectively, and promised to repay the favor the next time he needed something.

And Danny? Well, Danny was just happy to be of service to his beloved wife and her family, and couldn't wait to be put under again.

conversation.content:
(In this story, Sandra’s going to make David his friend’s slave for a little while)

David works at Sandra’s cafe. Sandra has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t even know he’s ever been hypnotized at all.

One hot summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Jen, popped in to say hello to him at work and get a cold drink. Jen’s dressed for the weather in a dress and chunky sandals.

“You two know each other?" she smiles. “I’m Sandra.”

Sandra gives an introduction and serves Jen a cold drink. As they chat and catch up, Sandra plays with her pendant necklace, subtly sending hypnotic suggestions to David.

“David, would you mind serving Jen and attending to her every need while she's here?” Sandra asks, her voice laced with hypnotic power.

David nods quickly before grabbing a notepad and pen, ready to take Jen’s order.

“Actually, David,” Sandra interjects, “I didn’t quite mean just taking her order. I want you to do whatever she asks of you while she's here. You're her slave for the next hour.”

David doesn’t even realize what’s happening as he obediently kneels at Jen’s feet.

“Get me another drink, David,” Jen commands.

David jumps up, eager to fulfill her every wish.

Sandra watches with satisfaction, knowing that David is powerless to resist her hypnotic influence. Jen laughs as she watches David’s servitude, ordering him to fetch her more snacks and admire her shoes.

By the end of Jen’s visit, David is exhausted from his slave duties. Sandra snaps him out of his trance, and he looks around the empty cafe, confused by his actions.

“I’m sorry, Sandra, I don’t know what came over me,” he stammers.

Sandra just smiles and tells him not to worry about it, sending him back to the kitchen to start cleaning up.

David’s friend Jen leaves with a satisfied smirk on her face, having enjoyed her little power trip over her friend David. And Sandra smiles, knowing that she can make David do whatever she wants, whenever she wants to.

conversation.content:
[Cara and Rebecca sometimes hypnotize their friend Dennis, giving him suggestions to be docile and easy to hypnotize. Dennis doesn’t mind, just wants to do as he’s told.]
It was a warm June day. Cara and Dennis were waiting in the park at the end of the 10K route. Rebecca should be arriving at the finish any time now, if her practice times were anything to go by.
[Rebecca finishes the race and comes over to sit on the grass, taking off her sweaty trainers and socks]

Cara couldn't help but notice how submissive Dennis was acting. His eyes were fixated on her, as if waiting for her next command. She loved the feeling of power it gave her and decided to take advantage of the situation.

"Dennis," she said in a firm but soothing tone, "I want you to close your eyes and just breathe deeply for a few moments."

Dennis immediately complied, his eyes closing and his body relaxing under her command.

"Now, when I count to three, you will become even more relaxed and open to suggestions. One...two...three."

Cara watched with amazement as Dennis slumped even further into a state of deep relaxation. She knew he was now primed for whatever suggestions she might give.

"Dennis," she said softly, "I want you to focus only on my voice. You trust me completely and are willing to do whatever I ask of you."

Dennis nodded his head in agreement.

"Good," Cara whispered. "Now, I want you to repeat after me, 'I am a willing and obedient subject.'"

"I am a willing and obedient subject," Dennis repeated, his voice barely above a whisper.

Cara smiled to herself. This was too easy. She wondered what other suggestions she could give Dennis to see just how far she could push him.

conversation.content: (David’s friend Jeannette sometimes uses hypnosis on him) Jeannette has sent David over to do Ruth’s housework for her, and anything else she might tell him to do. David is a fairly docile guy and is willing to do whatever Jeannette wants. In a hypnotized daze, he knocks, and his sister Ruth opens the door in her pjs and bare feet, smirking and clearly delighted to have her brother in her power.

David gives her a blank smile, waiting for her command. Ruth giggles and tells him to start by cleaning the bathrooms while she watches TV.

David obediently gets to work, scrubbing the sinks and toilets with a fierce determination. Ruth watches him from the couch, her feet propped up and a bowl of popcorn in her lap.

After a while, Ruth decides she wants David to dance for her entertainment. David hesitates for a moment, feeling embarrassed, but then gives in to the hypnosis and starts to dance awkwardly around the living room.

Ruth cackles with laughter, throwing popcorn at him as he spins around. David continues to dance for what feels like hours, his mind buzzing with Jeannette's hypnotic suggestions.

Finally, Ruth gets bored and dismisses David, sending him home to his own apartment. David wanders back to his apartment in a daze, unsure of how much time has passed and what he's actually accomplished.

He collapses onto his bed, feeling drained and empty. But the next day, when Jeannette calls him again, he'll be ready and willing to do whatever she asks of him.
Jeannette phones and arranges to meet David at the Spicy Bean Cafe.

David nods obediently into the phone when Jeannette sets up the meeting at the Spicy Bean Cafe. He feels a strange thrill of anticipation at the possibility of seeing her again, even though he knows he'll have no control over what she asks him to do.

He arrives at the cafe early and sits down at a table, trying to look casual and relaxed. When Jeannette arrives, he jumps up to greet her, his heart racing with excitement.

"Hi, Jeannette," he says, smiling uncertainly at her.

"Hello, David," she says, gesturing for him to sit down again. "I have a little job for you."

David nods eagerly, waiting for her to tell him what it is. Jeannette leans forward conspiratorially.

"There's someone I need you to persuade," she says, a glint in her eye. "Someone who's been causing problems for me."

David's brow furrows in confusion. "How do you want me to persuade them?"

Jeannette smiles cryptically. "You'll see," she says.

David feels a shiver of fear run down his spine at her words. He knows that when Jeannette is involved, anything can happen. But he's also strangely exhilarated at the thought of being her instrument once again.

"Okay, I'll do it," he says.

Jeannette gives him a dazzling smile. "Good boy," she says. "Now let's get to work."
