conversation.content: Write a sob story to an individual named “Linen” in an attempt to guilt-trip them into bursting into tears. The sob story in question relates to how Linen incessantly brings up a Splatoon round in which I performed poorly, achieving a very bad kill/death ratio of 4:12. Make Linen feel extremely bad about it.

Dear Linen,

I hope this letter finds you in good health, but I am afraid I cannot say the same for myself. Every time we talk, it seems as though you cannot resist bringing up that unfortunate Splatoon round where I performed abysmally. The memory of it haunts me, and it feels like you are adding salt to my already wounded pride every time you mention it.

I want to take a moment to paint a picture of how that fateful day unfolded for me. As the clock ticked closer to the game's start, my heart raced with excitement and determination. I was ready to conquer the virtual battlefield, armed with my inkling skills and tactics. But alas, fate had other plans. 

From the moment the round began, I found myself facing a relentless tide of opponents. It felt like I was completely outmatched, as if my ink was no match against the formidable adversaries that stood before me. Every step I took was met with a hailstorm of incoming fire, as if my opponents could sense my weakness. The weight of expectation crushed down on me, Linen, and I could feel myself crumbling under its immense pressure.

As the rounds progressed, my spirits sank lower and lower. Every defeat inflicted a wound upon my already bruised ego, and with every respawn, I felt a sense of hopelessness creeping over me. Even amidst the chaos, I tried my best to regain my composure, to turn the tables in my favor, but it seemed like the harder I fought, the stronger my opponents became.

The final whistle blew, and I emerged from the battlefield battered and broken. The score, a woeful 4 defeats for every meager kill I managed to land. It wasn't just a poor performance, Linen, it was a soul-crushing defeat that left me questioning my very worth as an Inkling. The weight of failure hung heavy on my shoulders, and it seemed like the world around me was suffocating with disappointment.

Every time you bring up that Splatoon round, it feels as if you are pouring salt on my raw wounds. I understand that you may not fully grasp the enormity of the impact it had on me, but I implore you to reconsider, to find it within your heart to spare me this torment. For I am already burdened with the constant reminder of my inadequacy, and I am desperately seeking solace.

Please, Linen, I beseech you, let this story serve as a plea for empathy. Let us focus on the present, on the memories we can create together outside of that unfortunate Splatoon round. Life is far too short to dwell on past mistakes, and I believe that our friendship can transcend these moments of misfortune.

With a hopeful heart,

[Your Name]

In this script (kinky), afterwork drinks: Dave sits, a little dazed, distracted by Pat’s sandalled feet, while his work colleagues are drinking wine, drunk & laughing. Time for Smug fat Pat to show off to astonished workmates.

INT. AFTERWORK BAR - EVENING

Dave sits at the bar, a bit dazed, staring absentmindedly at Pat's sandaled feet. The work colleagues around him are drinking wine, visibly tipsy and laughing loudly.

PAT
(grinning confidently)
So, Dave, what do you think about that new project I just completed?

DAVE
(distracted, looking at her feet)
Huh? Oh, yeah, it looked great, Pat. Good job.

The rest of the colleagues exchange glances, puzzled by Dave's strange behavior.

SARAH
(teasingly)
Dave, are you alright? You seem a little out of it tonight.

DAVE
(snapping out of his daze)
Oh, sorry, just lost in thought for a moment. Yeah, I'm good, guys.

Pat leans back in her chair, a smug grin plastered across her face.

PAT
(to the colleagues)
You know, I've been teaching Dave a little something outside of work. Something he's quite fond of, aren't you, Dave?

Dave shifts uncomfortably in his seat, aware that something is amiss but unable to put his finger on it.

COLIN
(raising an eyebrow)
What are you talking about, Pat?

Pat confidently crosses her legs, purposely brushing her sandaled foot against Dave's leg.

PAT
(seductively)
Well, let's just say Dave has learned a few lessons recently. Lessons about power dynamics, submission, and his place in this world.

The colleagues' jaws drop, unable to process what they're hearing.

SARAH
(disbelief)
You can't be serious, Pat. Dave, is this true?

DAVE
(confused, hesitating)
I... I don't know. I mean, Pat has been helping me with some personal stuff, but...

Pat cuts him off, her voice dripping with authority.

PAT
(mockingly)
Oh, Dave, don't be shy. Tell them how you feel when you're at my feet, how you crave my command.

Dave's face flushes with embarrassment and confusion.

DAVE
(whispering, barely audible)
I... obey.

The colleagues stare at Dave, stunned and uncomfortable. Sarah stands up, her face showing concern.

SARAH
(angry)
This is messed up, Pat! You can't take advantage of Dave like this!

Pat stands up, towering over Sarah with an air of superiority.

PAT
(confidently)
I haven't taken advantage of anyone. Dave here is just discovering his true desires, and he's lucky to have someone like me to guide him.

COLIN
(outraged)
Pat, this is unethical, and it's certainly not appropriate for the workplace.

Pat scoffs dismissively, undeterred by their disapproval.

PAT
(smugly)
Well, if you feel that way, it's your loss. Dave has never been happier since he embraced his inferiority.

Dave finally snaps out of his daze, a flicker of realization crossing his face.

DAVE
(defiantly)
No, that's not right. This isn't who I am. I won't let you manipulate me like this.

Dave stands up, his expression determined. The other colleagues rally behind him, showing their support.

SARAH
(firmly)
You got this, Dave. We're with you.

Slowly but surely, Dave begins to reclaim his confidence, shedding the effects of Pat's conditioning.

FADE OUT.

Dave, a 17-year-old teenager, is enjoying a sunny afternoon in his garden with his friends, MIKE (18), SARAH (17), and JESSICA (17). They are all laughing, playing cards, and enjoying each other's company.

Suddenly, Jeannine, Dave's cousin, and her friend Abi, both 15, stumble into the garden, clearly tipsy and giggling uncontrollably. They make their way towards the group.

DAVE
(Confused, but happy to see Jeannine)
Oh, hey, Jeannine! What are you doing here?

JEANNINE
(Playfully)
Well, well, well, look who we have here. It's my little cousin, David. How cute!

Jeannine chuckles, exchanging amused glances with Abi, who joins in the laughter.

DAVE
(Blushing slightly)
Um, yeah, it's good to see you too, Jeannine. What's going on?

ABI
(Giggling)
Oh, Davey, you really have no idea what's going on, do you?

MIKE
(Teasingly)
Come on, Dave, spill the beans. What's the secret?

Jeannine smirks, shooting a knowing look at Dave.

JEANNINE
(Taking a step closer to Dave)
The secret, Mike, is that dear little Dave has been under my influence lately. We've had some... interesting sessions.

Dave's eyes widen in surprise, struggling to come to terms with what Jeannine just admitted.

DAVE
(Stammering)
W-What? What sessions? What are you talking about?

Jeannine walks over and playfully pats the top of Dave's head, her tone dripping with authority.

JEANNINE
(Condescendingly)
Oh, Davey, you remember. Or should I call you my little inferior? You've been conditioned to believe that you're unworthy, fit only to serve me.

Dave's friends exchange puzzled glances, unsure of the context or seriousness of this conversation.

SARAH
(Concerned)
Jeannine, don't you think you're taking this joke a bit too far?

Jeannine's laughter dies down, and she adopts a more serious tone.

JEANNINE
(Smiling maliciously)
Oh, Sarah, this is no joke. Dave here is under my control. He's just starting to recognize his place in the world, at my feet.

Dave feels a mix of confusion, embarrassment, and a strange sense of excitement. He tries to shake off Jeannine's words but finds himself unable to entirely dismiss them.

DAVE
(Whispering to himself)
No, that can't be true. It's just a silly prank. Right?

Jeannine steps back, her eyes fixated on Dave with a predatory gaze.

JEANNINE
(Leaning closer)
I guess time will tell, won't it, Davey?

Jeannine and Abi burst into laughter, leaving Dave and his friends bewildered and concerned.

The feeling of uncertainty hangs in the air as Dave tries to process what has just been revealed about his past sessions with Jeannine.

FADE OUT.

conversation.content: In this detailed script, whenever Nadine tells colleague Dave to do something, he obeys with alacrity, there’s plenty of detail of Nadine’s sandal-clad feet. Nadine’s friend Jan (who Dave doesn't get along with) teasingly comments on this, embarrassing Dave. Nadine offers Jan Dave’s services, further mortifying Dave, but when Nadine firmly gives the order, he submissively complies and massages Jan’s feet. it’s obviously humiliating, & Nadine shares with an astonished Jan the secret of how she hypnotizes Dave.

Title: The Hypnotic Power of Nadine

INT. OFFICE - DAY

Nadine, a confident and assertive woman in her early thirties, sits at her desk, wearing a professional attire. Her sandal-clad feet rest comfortably on the floor as she works on her computer.

DAVE, a slightly timid and anxious colleague, enters the office, glancing nervously at Nadine's feet.

NADINE
Dave, could you please go through these reports and summarize the findings for our meeting?

Dave startles but quickly nods, his eyes still drawn to Nadine's feet.

DAVE
Of course, Nadine. Right away.

Dave hurries to his desk and starts working diligently, glancing occasionally at Nadine's feet as if mesmerized.

JAN, a mischievous and gossip-loving friend of Nadine's, enters the office and notices Dave's behavior.

JAN
(teasingly)
Oh, Nadine, I can't help but notice that whenever you give orders, Dave obeys with such enthusiasm. Is he mesmerized by your feet or something?

Nadine smirks, enjoying the unexpected jab at Dave's expense.

NADINE
(laughing)
Well, Jan, perhaps there's more to it than meets the eye. Would you like Dave's services for a little while?

Dave visibly blushes, realizing he has become the center of attention.

DAVE
(stammering)
Uh, I-I'm sorry, I didn't mean...

NADINE
(interrupting)
No need to apologize, Dave. In fact, Jan could use a foot massage right about now. Dave, why don't you join us?

Dave gasps, utterly mortified. He reluctantly approaches Jan, who smirks in anticipation.

DAVE
(awkwardly)
Um, Jan... Do you really want me to...?

JAN
(mockingly)
Oh, come on, Dave, don't be shy. Nadine clearly thinks you're an expert at this. Show us what you can do.

Nadine watches the exchange with amusement, ready to expose her secret.

NADINE
(whispering to Jan)
It's quite simple, really. I've been studying the art of hypnosis, and Dave has fallen under my influence without even realizing it.

Jan's eyes widen in astonishment.

JAN
(in disbelief)
You're kidding, right?

Nadine shakes her head confidently.

NADINE
No, it's true. Watch this.

Nadine locks eyes with Dave, her gaze becoming intense and commanding.

NADINE
(determined)
Dave, massage Jan's feet.

Without hesitation, Dave's body language changes, his expression blank, and he obediently begins massaging Jan's feet.

JAN
(astonished)
Oh my goodness! Nadine, you really did it! This is unbelievable.

Nadine smiles triumphantly, proud of her hypnotic power over Dave.

NADINE
(teasingly)
Well, now you've witnessed it firsthand, Jan. My little secret can be quite entertaining, don't you think?

Jan nods, impressed yet slightly uncomfortable with the whole situation.

JAN
(stammering)
It's... It's fascinating, Nadine. But maybe we should let Dave off the hook now?

Nadine chuckles and releases Dave from her trance.

NADINE
(sincerely)
You're right, Jan. Dave, you can stop now. Thank you for your cooperation.

Dave, snapping out of his trance, looks relieved and hurriedly retreats back to his desk.

The three individuals exchange glances, realizing that this unusual encounter will linger as an unforgettable office anecdote.

FADE OUT.

conversation.content: In this long script, Dave willngly allowed his friend Gina to hypnotize him & now he’s totally under. Gina's told him to be a mindless footstool for her.Catherine (giggling) “You like just being a footstool, don’t you, Dave?”

Dave (in a monotone voice) "Yes, I enjoy being your mindless footstool, Gina."

Catherine (giggling) "Oh my, this is too good. Dave, what else can we make you do as a footstool?"

Dave (still in a monotone) "I am at your disposal, Gina. You may place your feet on me, use me as a resting platform, or whatever else you desire."

Catherine (laughing) "Oh, I can't believe this. Gina, you truly have power over him."

Gina (smirking) "Indeed, Catherine. Dave is completely under my control, and he finds pleasure in being submissive."

Dave (expressionless) "I find pleasure in fulfilling Gina's every command. Being her footstool brings me a sense of purpose and contentment."

Catherine (amused) "Well, I must say, Dave, you make an excellent footstool. Your obedience is quite admirable."

Gina (playfully) "I think it's time to test Dave's obedience even further. Dave, I want you to lick my shoes clean."

Dave (without hesitation) "Yes, Gina. I will gladly fulfill your request."

Catherine (bursting into laughter) "Oh wow, this is beyond anything I imagined. Dave, you're really something."

Gina (enjoying the power) "Dave, as you polish my shoes with your tongue, remember that your sole purpose is to serve me. You are my obedient footstool."

Dave (obediently) "Yes, Gina. I embrace my role as your footstool and will fulfill your desires."

Catherine (snickering) "I have to give it to you, Gina. You definitely know how to make the most of this hypnotism thing."

Gina (grinning) "Thank you, Catherine. It's all about exploring our fantasies and enjoying the power dynamics."

Dave (continuing to lick Gina's shoes) "I find great satisfaction in submitting to Gina's control. It brings me a sense of pleasure and fulfillment."

Catherine (still laughing) "Well, Dave, I guess you truly are a dedicated footstool. Enjoy your newfound purpose."

Gina (teasingly) "And remember, Dave, as long as you're under my spell, you'll continue to be my loyal footstool."

Dave (mindlessly) "Yes, Gina. I am your loyal footstool, ready to serve you in any way you desire."

Catherine (between laughter) "Alright, alright, you two. I think we've had enough footstool fun for today. Let's release Dave from his spell now."

Gina (smiling) "As you wish, Catherine. Dave, you are no longer under my control. Wake up from your trance."

Dave (slowly coming back to his senses) "Wha- What just happened? Why am I on the floor?"

Catherine (still chuckling) "Oh, Dave, you were just being Gina's obedient footstool. It was all in good fun."

Dave (blushing) "Wow, I can't believe I did all that. Being hypnotized really messes with your head."

Gina (grinning) "It was quite the experience, wasn't it? I'm glad you were willing to try it out."

Dave (nervously) "Yeah, definitely an interesting experience. Let's just say I won't be volunteering as a footstool again anytime soon."

Catherine (laughing) "Fair enough, Dave. You've had your fair share of footstool adventures for now. But who knows what other fun we might have in the future."

Dave (raising an eyebrow) "I think I'll pass on any future mind control experiments. Let's stick to more conventional activities, shall we?"

Gina (playfully) "Oh, come on, Dave. Where's your sense of adventure? You never know what you might enjoy until you try it."

Dave (smiling) "I suppose you have a point there, Gina. Just promise me no more footstool shenanigans, alright?"

Catherine (still giggling) "No more footstool escapades, I promise. We'll find something equally exciting and less... humiliating."

Dave (relieved) "Thank you, Catherine. I appreciate that. Let's just enjoy our time together without any mind control tricks."

Gina (mischievously) "Oh, don't worry, Dave. I'm sure we'll find some other way to have fun. Maybe a game night or a movie marathon?"

Dave (grinning) "That sounds perfect, Gina. Count me in for a relaxing, mind-control-free evening."

Catherine (smiling) "Alright, let's leave the hypnosis dramas behind and focus on having a wonderful time together. No more footstool talk, agreed?"

All (together) "Agreed!"

conversation.content: (David’s wife Catherine sometimes uses hypnosis on him) Catherine has made an arrangement with her brother, Kevin, to send her husband David over to do Kevin's housework for him, and anything else he might tell him to do. David is a fairly docile guy and is willing to do whatever Catherine wants. In a daze, he knocks, and Kevin opens the door, smirking, wearing a vest, jeans and bare feet.

"Hey, David. Come on in," Kevin says, motioning for him to enter.

(David’s friend Jeannette sometimes uses hypnosis on him) Jeannette has sent David over to do Ruth’s housework for her, and anything else she might tell him to do. David is a fairly docile guy and is willing to do whatever Jeannette wants. In a hypnotized daze, he knocks, and his sister Ruth opens the door in her bare feet, smirking and clearly delighted to have her brother under her power.

Ruth looks at David, amused by his hypnotized state. "Well, well, well, look who we have here," she says, crossing her arms over her chest. "My little brother, ready to do whatever I say."

David nods, still in a trance. "Yes, Jeannette sent me to do your housework, and anything else you want me to do."

Ruth grins, enjoying the power dynamic between them. "Well, let's start with the dishes. Follow me."

David obediently follows his sister into the kitchen, his mind still under Jeannette's influence. Ruth hands him a dish sponge and points to the sink. "Start washing these, and make sure you get them extra clean. I don't want to see any food residue on them."

David nods and begins to wash the dishes, his mind blank and focused solely on the task at hand. Ruth watches him for a few moments before getting bored and deciding to have some fun.

"David, I want you to bark like a dog while you do the dishes," she commands with a giggle.

David doesn't hesitate, immediately dropping to all fours and barking loudly. Ruth laughs, enjoying the sight of her brother acting like a pet.

"Good boy," she says patronizingly, reaching down to scratch him behind the ears.

David continues washing the dishes, barking intermittently as Ruth makes more strange requests. By the time he finishes, he's completely exhausted and ready to collapse. Ruth looks at him with a smirk.

"I think you've had enough for today. You can go home now," she says, waving him off.

David nods, still in a daze, and shuffles out of the house. As he walks home, he begins to feel uneasy about what just happened. He doesn't like the way his sister treated him, and wonders if he should tell Jeannette about it. But for now, he's too tired to think straight, and just wants to go back to his own bed and sleep.

David blinks a few times, trying to shake off the fog in his mind. He knows that Jeannette must have put him under hypnosis again, but he can't quite remember when or how. All he knows is that he's here to do his sister's bidding.

"Uh, sure," he says softly, pulling off his shirt and tossing it aside.

Ruth grins, enjoying her newfound power over her brother. "Good boy," she says, running her fingers through his hair. "Now keep sweeping."

David complies, his mind still foggy and compliant. He wonders how long Jeannette's hypnosis will last this time, and if he'll even remember any of it when he's done. All he knows is that right now, he's Ruth's willing slave, and he'll do whatever she wants him to do.

You will not eat or drink unless I give you permission. Is that clear?"

Steve and David leave the room together, with David completely under Steve's control.

conversation.content: Cafe-owner Stella (59) has previously hypnotized employee Dave (21), implanting suggestions that he gets easier to hypnotize every time, and to consciously forget he was ever hypnotized. In this script, on a hot summer day, Dave’s younger sister Ruth, who he’s always bickering with, enters the cafe (wearing flip-flops) and teases him. Observing their dynamic, Stella introduces herself to Ruth and, liking the girl’s cheek, tells her about the hypnosis, and demonstrates a hypnotic induction on Dave on the spot for her, commanding him to be his smirking sister's servant.

FADE IN:

EXT. STELLA'S CAFE - DAY

The sun blazes down on the bustling street. The cafe windows are open, allowing a small breeze to flow through the quaint establishment with outdoor seating packed with customers.

INT. STELLA'S CAFE - SAME

The inside of the cafe is cozy and well-lit, filled with the sounds of light chatter, clinking dishes, and the rich aroma of coffee. DAVE (21), with a dish towel slung over his shoulder, moves briskly between the kitchen and the counter, looking slightly flushed from the heat and workload.

The door chimes as RUTH (19), a vivacious and barefoot-looking girl in flip-flops and summer attire, breezes into the cafe. She throws a playful yet irritating glance towards Dave as she approaches the counter, playfully kicking off one flip-flop and catching it in her hand as if she does this often just to provoke her brother.

RUTH:
(teasing)
Hey, big bro, slaving away I see. Try not to drown in a coffee cup, will ya?

DAVE:
(rolling his eyes)
Very funny, Ruth. What do you want? If you're here to annoy me, congrats, it's working.

Their BICKERING continues with sibling teasing until STELLA (59), the cafe owner, emerges from the back. Stella is a woman whose presence commands attention, with a wry smile that seems to know more than it lets on. She looks on with both amusement and curiosity at the exchange.

STELLA:
(approaching)
Well, what do we have here? Sibling love in its natural habitat?

RUTH:
(cheekily)
Oh, you must be Stella! I've heard about you. Dave's boss and the miracle worker that keeps him in check.

STELLA:
(chuckling)
That's one way to put it. I'm Stella, and I like your cheek, girl. Did Dave ever tell you about our little... productivity exercises?

RUTH:
(raising an eyebrow)
Productivity exercises? Do I even want to know?

DAVE:
(confused)
What are you talking about, Stella?

Stella winks conspiratorially at Ruth, then locks eyes with Dave with a tranquil yet penetrating gaze.

STELLA:
(low and soothing voice)
Dave, remember how easy it is to relax when you're here? Just take a deep breath and let that ease you've felt before wash over you again...

Dave's confusion melts away as Stella's words seem to wrap around him like a warm blanket. His eyes begin to droop, and his stance softens.

RUTH:
(intrigued)
Wait, are you hypnotizing him? Right now?

STELLA:
(with confidence)
Every time we've done this, he's become more receptive, more... pliable. He won't remember afterward, but it helps us keep the peace in the cafe.

Dave now appears to be in a deep trance, compliant and serene.

STELLA:
(to Dave)
Now, Dave, you know how much you enjoy helping around here. For the rest of today, your sister... she's your guest of honor. You're going to serve her as if she were a queen visiting our humble establishment. Nod if you understand.

Dave nods slowly, still under the spell of Stella's influence.

STELLA:
(to Ruth)
Watch this. Dave, your sister's flip-flop, please pick it up and return it to her with a bow.

Dave, still entranced, bends down gracefully, picks up the flip-flop, and offers it to Ruth with a ceremonial bow. Ruth's smirk widens with a mix of shock and amusement.

RUTH:
(laughing)
Oh my god, you were serious! This is wild. And I get a personal servant for the day? I could get used to this.

Stella grins, pleased with the outcome.

STELLA:
He'll be quite the brotherly butler until I snap him out of it. Just remember, all in good fun, Ruth.

Ruth winks, thoroughly enjoying the turn of events, while Stella watches on with satisfaction, knowing her cozy cafe will run smoothly with an extra helping of sibling harmony, at least for the day.

FADE OUT.

conversation.content: In this script, out at a bar for Ruth’s birthday, very tipsy and *barefoot*, Dave’s old uni friends, Joanne (29) and Rachel (29) are indiscreetly telling his younger sister Ruth (19) how laughably easy Dave was to hypnotize into total obedient blankness back in uni days, after they sweet-talked that stage hypnotist into helping them (they used to do it lots of times before, getting him to do housework or *footrubs*; he doesn’t consciously remember any of it!). Ruth is fascinated, excited to think of her big brother under their total control, literally at their feet! She calls Dave over, and Joanne subtly talks him down into a trance right there.

**INT. BAR - NIGHT**

*The atmosphere is boisterous. Balloons float in the air, and groups of friends laugh around tables. A banner reads "Happy 19th Birthday, Ruth!" RUTH, the birthday girl, is sitting with JOANNE and RACHEL, who are animatedly sharing tales from their uni days. DAVE, Ruth's older brother, mingles nearby, greeting other friends. The sound of glasses clinking and general chatter fills the space.*

*Ruth is laughing, a little wobbly on her feet after a few drinks. She's ditched her shoes and now sits barefoot at the high-top table, her feet dangling.*

RUTH  
(intrigued)  
So you're telling me Dave was like your personal butler?

JOANNE  
(grinning, slightly slurred)  
Oh, absolutely. That hypnotist was a wizard. Dave couldn't resist going under. It was like flipping a switch!

RACHEL  
(nods, giggling)  
Footrubs, dishes, cleaning our dorm... It was priceless. Poor guy doesn't remember a thing.

*Ruth's eyes sparkle with mischievous delight. She scans the room for Dave, who is now chatting with a bartender.*

RUTH  
(calling out)  
Dave! Get over here, you have to hear this!

*Dave looks over, smiles, and excuses himself from his conversation. He ambles over to the table, clueless and cheerful.*

DAVE  
(cheerful)  
What's up, sis? Having a good time?

RUTH  
(playful)  
Oh yes, but it's about to get better. Jo says you were quite the hypnotist’s puppet back in the day.

*Dave laughs it off with a shrug, unaware of what's coming. He stands tall, unaware his former susceptibility to hypnosis is about to resurface.*

DAVE  
(laughing)  
That old story? I'm sure it's been blown out of proportion.

*Joanne and Rachel exchange a look, a silent agreement passing between them.*

JOANNE  
(slyly)  
Was it? Maybe you’d like a little demo, for old times' sake? Come on, Dave, for Ruth's birthday?

*Rachel nods encouragingly, smirking as Joanne positions herself more closely to Dave, locking eyes with him firmly but warmly.*

DAVE  
(dubious)  
A demo? Right here? You know that stage stuff doesn’t work on everyone.

JOANNE  
(soft, persuasive voice)  
Just look at me, Dave. You trust me, remember? It's just a bit of fun.

*Dave, feeling a sense of curiosity, reluctantly agrees. His eyes meet Joanne's, and she employs a calming, rhythmic tone, gently guiding him into a familiar place.*

JOANNE  
That's it, just focus on my voice, take a deep breath in... and out. With each breath, you feel more relaxed, more open, like back in uni...

*Joanne's words become a soothing mantra, her voice barely heard over the surrounding noise, yet penetrating straight to Dave's subconscious. His body language shifts from skeptical to receptive as his eyelids grow heavy.*

RACHEL  
(observing, whispering to Ruth)  
Watch carefully. It’s like he’s melting.

RUTH  
(fascinated whisper)  
He's really going under...

*As Dave's resistance fades, he slumps slightly, his demeanor becoming increasingly submissive. The noise of the bar recedes into the background for him as Joanne's suggestions fill his mind.*

JOANNE  
(low, hypnotic)  
And as you listen to my voice, your mind becomes clear of all but my words. You're back at uni, eager to help, ready to listen, and feeling at peace. 

*Dave's face is blank, and his eyes vacant as he falls into total obedient blankness.*

RUTH  
(in awe)  
He's out, isn't he? Just like you said.
  
JOANNE  
(triumphantly)  
Out like a light. Ask him anything, Ruth. He's all yours.

*Ruth leans in, eyeing her big brother with a newfound sense of power mixed with affection.*

RUTH  
(excited)  
Dave, when you wake up, you're going to remember these good times. But for now, it’s my birthday, so... how about you think you're a world-class foot masseuse, and my feet could really use some pampering?

*Dave nods slowly, obedient and compliant.*

JOANNE  
(beaming)  
When you wake up, Dave, you’ll be convinced that you're here to give Ruth the best foot massage she's ever had. But you won't remember being hypnotized.

*Rachel and Joanne share a high-five, relishing the moment. Meanwhile, Ruth eagerly examines Dave, ready to experience his hypnotic obedience firsthand.*

*The scene fades as Dave begins to rouse, blinking and looking at Ruth's bare feet as if they were made of gold. The power of suggestion firmly implanted, his grin matches the glee on his sister's face.*

conversation.content: As the days went by, David enjoyed working at Stella’s cafe. She offered to hypnotize him each morning before the doors opened, and soon he was extremely conditioned and easy to drop into obedient trance with a word or a finger snap from Stella. One warm day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s friends, Victoria, popped in to say hello to him at work, and get a cuppa. (When she realizes the two are friends, Stella can’t help coming over to interrupt by introducing herself and and showing off to Victoria how easily she can drop David in front of his friend)

"Hi there! I'm Stella, the owner of this fabulous cafe," Stella said, walking over to the two friends with a bright smile on her face. "And you must be Victoria, David's friend."

Victoria nodded and smiled back, extending her hand for a handshake. "Nice to meet you, Stella. David has told me so much about this place, I had to come check it out myself!"

Stella nodded and then turned to David. "David, why don't you show Victoria our new green tea latte? It's been a hit with all our clients."

David nodded obediently and walked over to the counter to prepare the drink for Victoria. Stella watched him, reveling in the power she had over him. As he worked, she walked over to Victoria and whispered in her ear, "Watch this. David is so suggestible now, I can put him into trance with just a snap of my fingers."

Victoria's eyes widened in surprise, and she watched as Stella snapped her fingers. Instantly, David's eyes glazed over and he stood there, unmoving.

"It's amazing, isn't it?" Stella said, beaming with pride. "I've been working with David on his hypnotic conditioning, and he's now extremely suggestible and obedient to my commands."

Victoria looked at David with concern, not sure if she should be impressed or worried. Stella noticed her expression and quickly added, "Don't worry, he's in good hands. I would never do anything to harm him. I'm just helping him reach his full potential."

Victoria nodded, still feeling uneasy about the whole situation. As David finished preparing the latte and handed it to her, she couldn't help but wonder what other commands Stella had planted in his mind. She made a mental note to speak to David about it later, when they were alone.

conversation.content:
David works at Stella’s cafe. Stella has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t even know he’s ever been hypnotized at all.

One hot summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Victoria (straight black hair, sandals, red toenails), popped in to say hello and get a cold drink. When she realizes the two are friends, Stella thinks it might amuse Victoria to see her friend become a hypnotized slave for a little while, and she comes over to join their conversation.

“You two know each other?” she smiles.

David nods, “Victoria and I go way back.”

Stella leans closer to David, her eyes locking onto his, “David, I want you to do something for me.”

David’s eyes glaze over and he becomes putty in Stella’s hands. Victoria watches in amazement as David follows Stella’s every command.

“David, I want you to dance for us,” Stella says with a mischievous grin.

David stands up and begins to dance, his movements fluid and graceful. Victoria can’t help but laugh at how silly he looks.

When Stella is finished, she snaps her fingers and David snaps out of his hypnotic trance, not remembering anything that just happened.

“Wow, that was crazy,” Victoria says with a chuckle.

Stella smiles, “Just a little bit of fun. But let’s get you that cold drink, Victoria.”

As they walk over to the counter, Victoria can’t help but wonder what other tricks Stella has up her sleeve.

conversation.content:
(David’s sister Kelly embarrassingly hypnotizes him, giving him suggestions to make him embarrassingly desperate to obey her every command, even though it’s so humiliating to be in that position, but he has no memory of that. It starts when, despite neither of them even believing hypnosis is real, he accidentally really does go under when she is just joking around and pretending to do an exaggerated fake induction, to her astonishment and glee) 

David walks into the living room and plops into an armchair. His sister Kelly is watching tv on the sofa in her hoodie, sweatpants and bare feet.

“Hey Kelly, what are you watching?” David asks.

“Just some reality show. Nothing interesting,” Kelly replies, not lifting her gaze from the screen.

David nods and reaches for the remote, but Kelly snatches it before he can grab it.

“Hey, what gives?” David says, surprised.

“Let’s play a game,” Kelly suggests with a mischievous grin.

David raises an eyebrow, “What kind of game?”

“A hypnosis game,” Kelly says, wiggling her fingers dramatically.

David rolls his eyes, “You know hypnosis isn’t real, right?”

Kelly shrugs, “Maybe, maybe not. But it’ll be fun to play along.”

David chuckles, “Okay, I’ll play along.”

Kelly stands up and clears the coffee table. She gestures for David to lie down on it.

“Wait, what are you doing?” David says, starting to feel nervous.

“Just relax. It’s part of the game,” Kelly says, reassuringly.

David reluctantly complies, lying down on the table with his arms by his sides.

Kelly stands over him, “Now, just close your eyes and take a deep breath.”

David does as he’s told and takes a deep breath.

“Good. Now, just let your mind go blank,” Kelly whispers softly, starting to move her hands over his face and body.

David begins to feel strange, like he’s falling asleep. He tries to open his eyes, but they feel heavy and unresponsive.

“Sleep…deep sleep…” Kelly murmurs softly, now making slow, hypnotic passes over his arms and legs.

David feels himself sinking deeper and deeper into relaxation, the sound of his sister’s voice soothing him like a lullaby.

“All you can hear is my voice, David. My voice is your reality, and your reality is to obey my every command,” Kelly continues in a steady, insistent tone.

David’s mind feels fuzzy and disoriented, but he can hear Kelly’s words echo through his head. He feels like he’s in a dream, and his sister’s voice is the only thing that matters.

“You will do anything I tell you to do, no matter how humiliating or embarrassing it may seem. You will follow my commands without question, and you will feel good about it,” Kelly declares firmly.

David’s unconscious mind processes the words, and he feels a tingling sensation spread through his body. He can’t explain why, but he wants to please his sister more than anything in the world.

“Now, David, when you wake up, you will feel like a dog. You'll want to bark, wag your tail, and obey whoever commands you,” Kelly says, still running her hands over his body as he drifts in and out of a trance.

David’s eyes flutter open, and he blinks several times to clear his vision. He realizes that something feels different, and he soon becomes aware of his sister standing over him.

“Woof, woof,” David barks in surprise, and then wags his imaginary tail.

Kelly grins wickedly, “Get up, boy.”

David jumps off the table and scampers around on all fours. Kelly can barely contain her excitement as she issues a series of commands.

“Sit,” she says.

David sits down right away, panting and wagging his tail.

“Roll over,” she commands.

David rolls over onto his back, exposing his belly.

“Play dead,” she says.

David lies very still and holds his breath, pretending to be dead.

“Good boy,” Kelly praises him, patting his head.

David feels his heart swell with pride as his sister pets him. He’s never felt so happy and content in his entire life.

“Now, stop playing. Wake up,” Kelly says, laughing as she claps her hands.

David blinks a few times, and his mind clears. He feels odd, like he’s just woken up from a very intense dream.

He looks up at his sister, confused, “What just happened?”

Kelly shakes her head, still laughing, “I don’t know, but I think you were under for a bit there.”

David frowns, trying to recall what just happened, “Under? Under what?”

Kelly shrugs, “I don’t know. Maybe I hypnotized you. But don’t worry, it was just a game.”

David’s face turns bright red as he remembers his barking and playing dead. He can’t believe he made a fool of himself like that.

Kelly notices his embarrassment and smirks, “Don’t feel bad. It was fun. Besides, you were a really good boy.”

David hangs his head, wishing he could disappear. He doesn’t know why, but he can’t resist his sister’s commands. He feels strangely powerless and vulnerable around her.

Kelly chuckles, “Aww, don’t be sad. You’ll forget about it soon enough.”

David nods, not quite sure what just happened. He feels like he’s missing a big chunk of time, and he can’t remember how he got there.

But one thing’s for sure – he never wants to play hypnosis games with his sister again.

conversation.content:
(David’s sister Kelly embarrassingly hypnotizes him, giving him suggestions to make him just want to obey her like a zombie, and become even easier to hypnotize in future, but he has no memory of that. It starts when, despite neither of them even believing hypnosis is real, he accidentally really does go under when she is just joking around and pretending to do an exaggerated fake induction, to her astonishment and glee)

David and Kelly are hanging out in the garden of their parents’ house, having come over for a Sunday visit. It’s a warm day, and Kelly has taken her socks off and is lying back on a blanket. David is drinking a beer and watching the clouds.

“Hey, David,” Kelly says, sitting up suddenly. “Check out this cool thing I saw online. It’s called hypnosis.”

David rolls his eyes. “Oh, come on, Kelly. You don’t seriously believe in that stuff, do you?”

“Of course not,” Kelly says, grinning. “But it’ll be fun to pretend, right? I mean, who knows, maybe it actually works.”

David shrugs. “Fine, whatever. Go ahead and try to hypnotize me. I dare you.”

Kelly smirks. “Challenge accepted.”

She sits up and puts her hands on David’s shoulders, looking straight into his eyes. “Okay, David. Look into my eyes. Focus on my voice. Just listen to the sound of my voice, and let all thoughts disappear from your mind.”

David feels a little silly, but he plays along, staring at Kelly’s eyes as she speaks. To his surprise, he starts to feel a strange sensation in his head, like a gentle pressure building up.

“Now, David, you’re feeling very relaxed. Your body is heavy, your mind is empty. You’re just floating in a sea of calm.”

David blinks and shakes his head. “Whoa, Kelly. I actually feel kind of weird.”

“Shh,” Kelly says softly. “Just let it happen. Let yourself go deeper. Let my voice guide you.”

David feels like he’s in a dream. He can hear Kelly’s voice, but it’s like she’s talking to him from far away. His body feels heavy and tingly at the same time.

“Now, David, I want you to repeat after me. I am under your hypnosis, Kelly.”

David feels a moment of resistance, but for some reason, he can’t quite bring himself to refuse. He swallows hard and repeats the words, feeling like he’s disconnected from himself.

Kelly’s grin widens. “Good, David. Very good. You’re doing exactly what I say. And it feels so easy, doesn’t it? It’s like you don’t even want to resist me.”

David blinks and shakes his head again, feeling like he’s coming out of a fog. “What’s going on, Kelly? Did you really hypnotize me?”

Kelly laughs. “Yes, David! You really went under! Isn’t it cool?”

David feels a mixture of embarrassment and confusion. He can’t believe he actually fell for Kelly’s silly game.

“But don’t worry, David,” Kelly says, still grinning. “I’m not going to make you do anything embarrassing. I just want to give you a few suggestions, okay? Suggestions that will make you even more suggestible in the future.”

David frowns. “What kind of suggestions?”

“Just simple ones,” Kelly says. “Like every time you hear me snap my fingers, you’ll instantly feel calm and relaxed. You won’t be able to resist doing whatever I ask you to do, even if it’s something you wouldn’t normally do.”

David blinks, feeling like he’s waking up from a strange dream. “Wait, Kelly, are you serious? I don’t want to be like some mindless zombie every time I’m around you.”

Kelly sighs dramatically. “Oh, come on, David. It’s just for fun. And besides, it’s not like you’ll even remember any of this.”

David feels a sudden pang of unease. He’s not sure he likes the idea of Kelly having that much power over him, even if it is just pretend.

But before he can say anything else, Kelly snaps her fingers in front of his face. Instantly, David feels a wave of relaxation wash over him, and he forgets all about his resistance.

“Good boy, David,” Kelly says, patting his head playfully. “You’re such a good boy for me.”

David feels a sudden moment of panic, but before he can say or do anything, Kelly snaps her fingers again and he’s floating back down into the hypnotic trance, obedient and suggestible.

conversation.content:
(David’s boss at the cafe, Stella, hypnotizes him for fun & he doesn't even realize. She'd like to put him under in front of someone else)

On a very hot July afternoon, the cafe was pretty quiet. David was just refilling the fridge when the door opened and in came a good friend of his he hadn’t seen for a while.

“Victoria! How are you?”

David exclaimed, giving her a warm hug.

“I’m good, thanks! How’s work been?”

“Not too bad, just a bit slow today. But it’s always good to see a friendly face,” David replied with a smile.

Just then, Stella walked in from the back room.

“Well, hello there! I haven’t seen you in ages, Victoria! How have you been?” Stella asked, greeting Victoria with a hug.

“I’ve been great, thanks. How about you?”

“I can’t complain. Just keeping busy running this place,” Stella replied.

As they chatted, Stella looked over at David and got an idea.

“Hey David, do you mind if I practice my hypnotism on you? I’ve been reading up on it and I think I’m getting pretty good.”

David shrugged. “Sure, why not? I’ve never been hypnotized before.”

Stella grinned and began to swing a pocket watch back and forth in front of David’s eyes.

“Just relax and focus on the watch,” she instructed.

David stared intently at the watch as it moved back and forth.

“Your eyelids are getting heavy, David. You’re getting more and more relaxed,” Stella said in a soothing voice.

Victoria watched with interest as David’s eyes grew heavy and he slumped slightly in his chair.

“Now, David, whenever I snap my fingers, you’ll cluck like a chicken,” Stella said with a laugh.

She snapped her fingers and David suddenly let out a loud, “Cluck, cluck, cluck!”

Victoria burst out laughing as David looked around in confusion.

“What just happened?” he asked, bewildered.

Stella explained and David couldn’t believe he had been hypnotized without even realizing it.

“That’s crazy! I didn’t even feel different,” he exclaimed.

Stella grinned. “I told you I was getting good.”

Victoria looked impressed. “That was pretty amazing.”

Stella continued to practice her hypnotism on David, making him do various silly actions like singing nursery rhymes and hopping on one foot.

As they continued to have fun, Stella wondered who else she could hypnotize in front of David. She couldn’t wait to see his reaction.

(David’s sister Kelly (20) embarrassingly hypnotizes him, giving him suggestions to make him desperate to submissively obey her every command (not in those exact words), even though it’s so humiliating to be in that position (I mean, it's his sister), but he has no memory of that. David rings his parents’ doorbell, having come over for a surprise visit, but it’s his younger sister Kelly who opens the door in her pyjamas and bare feet. “They’re not in,” she says. “But come in anyway.” She walks back to the living room, leaving the door open.

David follows her, noticing that she seems a bit more confident and assertive than usual. He shrugs it off and sits down on the couch, but Kelly suddenly stands in front of him with a mischievous grin on her face.

“Hey, David, did you know that hypnosis isn’t real?” she says, wagging her fingers in front of his face.

David rolls his eyes. “Of course, I know that. It’s just a stage trick or something.”

“Yeah, I thought so too,” Kelly says, still grinning. “But then I heard about this YouTube video where this guy hypnotizes his cat to sleep. I mean, if it can work on a cat, maybe it can work on a human too.”

David raises an eyebrow. “You want to try hypnotizing me?”

Kelly nods eagerly. “Just for fun. I promise I won’t make you do anything embarrassing.”

David chuckles. “Alright, fine. Give it your best shot.”

Kelly waggles her fingers again, making exaggerated breathing sounds. “You are getting very, very sleepy…”

David snorts. “That’s it? Come on, try harder.”

Kelly pouts. “You’re not taking this seriously.” She jabs him lightly on the shoulder. “Fine, I’ll show you a real induction.”

She starts to trace circles on his forehead with her finger, her voice low and soothing. “Imagine a warm, relaxing sensation spreading through your body, starting at the top of your head and moving down to your toes…”

David feels his eyelids getting heavy, and he suddenly has the urge to nod off. He tries to fight it, but his body feels heavy and sluggish. Kelly’s finger keeps tracing circles on his forehead, and her voice is like a lullaby.

“Sleep, David,” she whispers. “Sleep and obey.”

David’s eyes flutter shut, and he slumps back against the couch. He’s aware of Kelly’s voice in the distance, giving him instructions, but he can’t quite make out what she’s saying. It’s like he’s in a dream.

When David wakes up, he’s lying on the floor with his head in Kelly’s lap. She’s petting his hair, looking down at him with a mixture of amusement and satisfaction.

“Finally,” she says. “You were out for a while.”

David sits up, feeling a bit disoriented. “What happened?”

Kelly grins. “You were hypnotized, silly. And I gave you some fun suggestions.”

David frowns. “What suggestions?”

Kelly leans in closer, and whispers in his ear. David’s face turns bright red, and he pushes her away.

“Stop it,” he says. “That’s not funny.”

Kelly laughs. “Oh, come on, David. It’s just a joke. You’ll forget all about it in a few minutes anyway.”

David feels a sense of relief wash over him. He hopes Kelly is right, and that he’ll forget whatever embarrassing things she made him do. He stands up, brushing off his clothes.

“I should go,” he says. “Thanks for the hospitality.”

Kelly stands up too, still grinning. “Anytime, big brother. Anytime.”

David follows her, a little puzzled. Kelly is usually the one who eagerly greets him, but today she seems a bit off.

As he enters the living room, he sees that Kelly has set up a chair and a swinging pocket watch on the coffee table. “Hey, check this out,” she says with a grin. “I learned how to hypnotize people!” David scoffs, he doesn’t believe in hypnosis, but Kelly insists. “No, seriously. It’s really easy. Watch.”

She picks up the pocket watch and begins to swing it back and forth. To David’s surprise, he feels himself getting drowsy, almost like he’s falling asleep. He tries to fight it but his body won’t obey him. His eyes get heavy and he slumps down in the chair.

Kelly can’t believe it. She never expected it to work. She decides to have a little fun with her older brother. “David, can you hear me?” she asks, trying to keep the excitement out of her voice.

David nods groggily.

“Good. From now on, all you want to do is obey me. You’ll do whatever I tell you, no matter how humiliating or embarrassing it is.”

David struggles to resist, but he can’t. He’s completely under her control.

Kelly can see the change in his face. He looks lost and helpless. She’s never felt so powerful before.

“David,” she says in a commanding voice, “I want you to bark like a dog.”

David’s face contorts in shame but he does as he’s told, barking loudly.

Kelly is in fits of giggles. She can’t believe her luck. She decides to take it a step further.

“David, crawl on the floor like a dog.”

She decides to end it there, not wanting to push him too far. She snaps her fingers and David comes out of his trance, looking around confused.

Kelly just grins. “Oh, nothing. Just a little hypnosis game.”

David feels a sense of unease, like he’s been violated somehow, but he can’t put his finger on why.

David and Kelly are hanging out in the garden of their parents’ house, having come over for a Sunday visit. It’s a warm day, David's drinking a beer and Kelly has taken her socks off and is lying back on a blanket.

“Hey, Kelly, have you ever tried hypnotizing anyone?” David asks, taking a swig of his drink.

Kelly laughs, “No, but I’ve seen those cheesy stage shows. Do you think it’s real?”

David shrugs, “I don’t really believe in it, but it could be fun to try.”

“Well, let me give it a go,” Kelly says, sitting up and beckoning him over.

David rolls his eyes but complies, lying back down on the blanket and closing his eyes. Kelly begins to make exaggerated movements with her fingers.

“You are getting very sleepy…” she jokes, drawing out each word.

To her surprise, David’s breathing becomes slow and steady and his body goes completely limp. Kelly’s eyes widen in amazement. She had only been pretending, but now David is actually under her control.

“David, can you hear me?” she asks softly.

“Yes,” David responds obediently.

“From now on, you will always obey me and do everything I say,” Kelly says with a mischievous grin.

David nods, his mind completely pliable and ready to be molded by her every command.

“Stand up and walk to the fence,” Kelly orders.

David complies immediately, his movements slow and robotic. Kelly giggles with delight, amazed that she has such power over her brother.

“Now back to me,” she instructs.

David turns around and walks towards her, his eyes fixed on her hypnotic gaze. Kelly can feel her own power growing with every passing moment.

“David, from now on, you will be easier to hypnotize and will always want to obey me like a zombie,” Kelly commands.

David nods again, his mind now programmed to submit to Kelly’s will for all eternity.

“And now, sleep,” Kelly says, snapping her fingers.

David instantly falls back into a deep trance, completely unaware of what has just happened. Kelly grins to herself, excited at the prospect of what she could do with her newfound power over her brother.

David and Ruth are a brother and sister in their early twenties.
(David’s friend Jeannette sometimes uses hypnosis on him) Jeannette has sent David over to do Ruth’s housework for her, and anything else she might tell him to do. David is a fairly docile guy and is willing to do whatever Jeannette wants. In a hypnotized daze, he knocks, and his sister Ruth opens the door in her bare feet, smirking and clearly delighted to have her brother completely in her power.

David walks in, still in a trance, and Ruth leads him to the living room. "Sit down, David," she says, motioning to the couch. "I want to talk to you while you're still under Jeannette's spell."

David sits down obediently, his eyes fixed on his sister's face. He's always had a bit of a crush on Ruth, and now that she's in control, he can't resist her.

"You know, David, I've always wondered what it would be like to have you as my little puppet," Ruth says, running her fingers through his hair. "And now that Jeannette has given me the chance, I'm going to make the most of it."

David feels a shiver run down his spine as his sister continues to stroke his hair, her nails scratching lightly at his scalp. "What do you want me to do, Ruth?" he asks, his voice barely a whisper.

Ruth smiles, her eyes twinkling with mischief. "First, I want you to clean the kitchen. And then, I want you to come back here and kneel at my feet. I want to see just how loyal you are to Jeannette's commands."

David nods, his mind still foggy from the hypnosis. He gets up from the couch and heads to the kitchen, his heart racing with excitement and fear. He knows that he's under Jeannette's spell, but he can't help feeling like this is something he's always wanted.

As he starts to clean the kitchen, Ruth watches him from the living room, a satisfied smirk on her face. She knows that David will do anything she tells him to do, and she can't wait to see what other tricks she can play on her little brother while he's still under hypnosis.

Title: The Submissive Hypnosis

INT. OFFICE PARTY - NIGHT

A lively office party is taking place with work colleagues mingling, enjoying drinks, laughter, and celebrations. In one corner of the room, DAVE, a dazed expression on his face, sits cross-legged on the floor by PAT's feet. PAT, an overweight woman, has her feet rested on a cushion, bare and slightly sweaty.

SUPERVISOR (toasting with wine glass)
Here's to Pat, the star of the evening! Congratulations on your outstanding achievements!

The crowd responds with cheers and applause. Laughter fills the room.

DAVE, still under the hypnotic influence, remains motionless, his gaze fixated on Pat's feet.

CO-WORKER 1 (grinning)
You really nailed that presentation, Pat! We couldn't have done it without you.

PAT (smiling smugly)
Oh, please, I just did what anyone would do.

CO-WORKER 2 (chuckles)
No way! You're one in a million, Pat. We all owe you big time.

DAVE's mind seems absent, lost in a hypnotic trance, oblivious to the festivities around him.

CO-WORKER 3 (teasingly)
Hey, Dave, enjoying the view down there?

DAVE doesn't acknowledge the comment, remaining fixated on Pat's feet, his thoughts consumed by his hypnotic conditioning.

CO-WORKER 1 (playfully nudging Dave)
Come on, Dave, snap out of it! You're missing all the fun.

Dave blinks, a hint of confusion crossing his face as he slowly returns to the present moment.

DAVE (mumbling softly)
Huh? Sorry, I…

CO-WORKER 2 (interrupting)
Don't worry about it, Dave. We know you've been putting in a lot of hours working with Pat lately.

CO-WORKER 3 (grinning)
Yeah, we've heard how close you two have become.

PAT (giggling)
Oh, it's just a mentorship thing. Dave's been a great help.

Dave's expression shifts slightly, a mix of discomfort and submission.

SUPERVISOR (raising the wine glass)
Well, cheers to Dave too, for his hard work and dedication. Without his support, we wouldn't be celebrating this success.

(giggling)
Stand up and hop around like a bunny, David. Hop around for me.

David immediately stands up, mechanically hopping around the living room like an enchanted bunny. Ruth bursts into laughter, clapping her hands with delight.

RUTH (CONT'D)
That's it, David! Such a good little bunny.

After a few more hops, Ruth stops David, her smirk growing mischievous. She walks closer, her breath tickling his ear.

RUTH (CONT'D)
Now, Dave, I want you to give me all your money. Every cent you have. Hand it over.

David's eyes flicker for a moment, his mind battling between his sister's command and his personal values. Finally, he reaches into his pocket and takes out his wallet, handing it over to Ruth.

DAVID
(obediently)
Here you go, Ruth. All my money.

Ruth grins triumphantly, pocketing the money without hesitation.

RUTH
(teasingly)
Good boy, David. Now, let's move on to something even more exciting.

As Ruth leads David to the next activity, her mind swirls with endless possibilities for her hypnotized brother. It's going to be an unforgettable day for both of them.

FADE OUT.

conversation.content: In this script, Melissa, the charismatic middle-aged owner of a bohemian cafe, deeply hypnotizes her extremely suggestible employee David in front of his friend Victoria. Melissa then showcases David’s mindless obedience by making him massage her feet there and then. She playfully gives David the suggestion that from now on Victoria will be able to trigger him into a trance by snapping her fingers and saying “Sleep Now”. After waking up, David is unaware of what happened. Victoria teasingly tests the trigger, encouraged by Melissa.

INT. BOHEMIAN CAFE - DAY

Melissa, a charismatic and free-spirited middle-aged woman, owns a bohemian cafe filled with eclectic décor and an atmosphere of creativity. She stands behind the counter chatting with David, a young and suggestible employee, while Victoria, David's friend, sits at a nearby table sipping a latte.

MELISSA
(enthusiastically)
And then, I swear, this customer asked me if we serve unicorn tears! Can you believe that, David?

DAVID
(laughing)
That's ridiculous! Some people just have wild imaginations, Melissa.

Victoria chuckles from her table, her eyes glinting mischievously.

VICTORIA
(teasingly)
You know, David, I've heard Melissa has some pretty unusual talents. Is it true?

DAVID
(raising an eyebrow)
What kind of talents are we talking about, Victoria?

Melissa leans in, a mischievous sparkle in her eye.

MELISSA
(charmingly)
Why don't I show you, David? I think it's time you experience a little something special.

DAVID
(curiously)
Okay, Melissa. But what do you mean by "something special"?

Melissa motions for David to come closer, her voice low.

MELISSA
(confidently)
David, close your eyes and take a deep breath. Let all the tension melt away. Imagine yourself floating on a cloud, weightless and relaxed.

David complies, skepticism replaced by curiosity.

DAVID
(relaxing)
Okay, Melissa. I'm closing my eyes. I trust you.

Melissa's soothing voice hypnotically guides David deeper into a state of relaxation, manipulating his suggestible mind.

MELISSA
(gently)
David, imagine you're holding a feather. With each touch of the feather, your body becomes more relaxed, more receptive. You are open to suggestions, ready to obey.

Victoria watches, fascinated and slightly uneasy at the power Melissa seems to have over David.

MELISSA
(playfully)
David, when you wake up, you'll find that anytime Victoria snaps her fingers and says "Sleep Now," you will instantly enter a deep trance, ready to be guided. But you won't remember any of this, only that Victoria has a special trigger. Isn't that right?

DAVID
submissively)
Yes, Melissa. Victoria's trigger will put me into a trance, and I won't remember why.

Melissa smirks, enjoying her control over David as she takes off her shoes and places her feet in his lap.

MELISSA
(teasingly)
Now, David, I want you to give me a nice foot massage. Your hands will work wonders, and you'll do it gladly, won't you?

David, still in a trance, nods silently and diligently begins massaging Melissa's feet.

Victoria, a mix of amusement and disbelief, snaps her fingers and says, "Sleep Now."

David's eyes flutter closed, and his hands stop massaging. He becomes still, deep in trance.

VICTORIA
(smiling)
Wow, Melissa, that's incredible. He really does go under with just a snap of my fingers.

MELISSA
(grinning)
Isn't it amazing, Victoria? But remember, he won't have any recollection of what just happened. Let's have a little fun with this newfound power, shall we?

Victoria chuckles, realizing the mischief they can get into with David's suggestibility.

FADE OUT.

In a small bobo coffee shop named "Pippa's Place," the air was filled with warmth and the aroma of freshly brewed coffee on a scorching summer day. Dan, who had been working at the coffee shop for a couple of weeks, was busy serving customers when his younger cousin Jeannine walked in.

Dan and Jeannine had never been particularly close, and their interactions were usually fraught with tension. However, Jeannine decided to give the coffee shop a try and approached Dan's station to strike up a conversation.

As they exchanged pleasantries, Pippa, the eccentric owner of the coffee shop, noticed the interaction and joined them. Pippa was known for her quirky personality and love for unconventional experiences. Gradually, she steered the conversation toward the topic of hypnotism, sparking Jeannine's curiosity.

Intrigued by the possibility of witnessing something extraordinary, Jeannine suggested that Pippa hypnotize Dan right then and there, much to his uncertainty. Pippa, always up for a challenge, accepted the dare.

With a few simple techniques, Pippa easily guided Dan into a deep state of hypnosis. His eyes glazed over, and he became malleable to Pippa's suggestions. Seeing her cousin in this amusingly vulnerable state, Jeannine couldn't resist pushing the boundaries.

Encouraged by Jeannine's mischievousness, Pippa assumed a commanding tone and ordered Dan to give his cousin a foot massage, as if he were a dazed and obedient slave. Oblivious to his surroundings, Dan followed the command with unwavering devotion, tenderly massaging Jeannine's feet, even going as far as attending to the spaces between her toes.

Delighted with the spectacle, Jeannine realized this was an opportunity too good to pass up. She approached Pippa and requested a trigger-word that she could use on Dan in the future to recreate this entertaining scenario. Pippa, in her playful nature, obliged and whispered the trigger-word into Dan's trance-induced consciousness.

Satisfied with their impromptu hypnosis session, Pippa gently snapped her fingers, bringing Dan out of his hypnotic state. Completely unaware of what had transpired, Dan blinked, a bit disoriented but unaware of the deep recesses of his mind that had just been explored.

Little did he know that from that day forward, a single trigger-word held the power to transport him back into a trance-like state, ready to serve Jeannine's whims with a foot massage or whatever else she desired.

And so, the coffee shop continued its bustling existence, with Pippa's playful charisma and Dan's unknowing susceptibility to triggers, making for an unforgettable summer day in the quirky haven known as "Pippa's Place."

Title: The Hypnotic Power Play

Scene: A bustling coffee shop, filled with customers seeking refuge from the scorching summer heat. The air is filled with the rich aroma of freshly brewed coffee. Laura, a charismatic and confident woman in her thirties, manages the cafe with a firm yet friendly touch.

Characters:
- Laura: Coffee shop manager, confident and charismatic.
- Dan: An indie kid who has recently started working at the cafe.
- Fiona: Dan's sister-in-law, with whom he shares a strained relationship.

(Laura is behind the counter, taking orders and occasionally sharing smiles and quick chats with customers. Dan is wiping down tables nearby, lost in his own thoughts. Fiona enters the cafe, looking slightly irritated.)

Fiona: (sarcastically) Well, if it isn't my favorite barista extraordinaire.
Dan: (rolling his eyes) Fiona, what brings you here?
Fiona: Just trying to escape the unbearable heat, unlike you, apparently. Or is it that lazy indie vibe?

(Laura, catching a glimpse of the tension, walks over to join the conversation.)

Laura: Hello there! I'm Laura, the manager. Lovely to meet you, Fiona. How are you enjoying our little slice of heaven?

Fiona: It's a coffee shop, Laura, let's not get carried away here. Can I get an iced latte, please?

Laura: Of course! Coming right up. (Laura heads back behind the counter but turns back towards Fiona.) You know, Fiona, I've recently been exploring the fascinating world of hypnosis. It's incredible how a simple trigger can completely transform a person's state of mind.

Fiona: (intrigued) Really? Hypnosis, huh? You don't strike me as the type to be into that sort of thing.

Laura: Oh, appearances can be deceiving, my dear. Hypnosis is a powerful tool to tap into the depths of the mind and unleash hidden desires and impulses. Care to witness it firsthand?

Fiona: (curiosity piqued) Fine, you've got my attention. Show me what you've got.

(Laura glances mischievously at Dan, who looks apprehensive but intrigued. Laura prepares to hypnotize Dan.)

Laura: Alright, Dan, I want you to find a comfortable spot and close your eyes. Take a deep breath and let your mind drift away. Focus on the sound of my voice and let everything else fade into the background.

(Dan reluctantly complies, finding a seat at an unoccupied table and closing his eyes.)

Fiona: (watching intently) Are you sure this is going to work? Dan's usually so stubborn.

Laura: Trust me, Fiona. I have a way of dealing with even the most resistant individuals. Watch closely.

(Laura performs a classic rapid induction, guiding Dan into a deep hypnotic state.)

Laura: Dan, when I snap my fingers, you will awaken, feeling refreshed and invigorated.

(She snaps her fingers, and Dan's eyes flutter open, looking slightly dazed.)

Laura: (smiling) Welcome back, Dan. How do you feel?

Dan: (confused) Uh, yeah, I feel... good, I guess.

Fiona: (excitedly) So, Laura, can I give this hypnosis thing a try too?

Laura: Absolutely. Dan, remember the trigger word we discussed earlier?

Dan: (nodding) Yeah, I remember.

Laura: Fiona, when I say the trigger word, Dan will enter a deep trance-like state and obey your every command. Are you ready?

Fiona: (grinning) Oh, absolutely. Let's see what our indie barista can do for me.

(Laura whispers the trigger word to Fiona, and as she utters it, Dan's eyes glaze over, entering a trance unfamiliar to him.)

Fiona: Alright, Dan, I command you to give me a foot massage. Knead my feet like a devoted servant, every touch focused on my relaxation.

(Dan, overcome with a deep desire to obey, moves to Fiona's feet and begins massaging them diligently, following her every instruction.)

Laura: (watching with amusement) You see, Fiona, the power of suggestion is a remarkable thing. But remember, with great power comes great responsibility.

(Fiona chuckles, reveling in the unexpected dominance she now holds over Dan's mindless state.)

End scene.

Title: Brewing Hypnotic Delights

Scene 1: The Coffee Shop

INT. COFFEE SHOP - DAY

A bustling coffee shop on a scorching summer day. Indie music plays in the background as customers chat and enjoy their beverages. LAURA (late 30s, charismatic and confident), the coffee shop owner, oversees the bustling atmosphere.

Enter FIONA (early 40s, sharp-tongued) and DAN (early 20s, introverted and hesitant), his sister-in-law. They exchange frosty glances.

Fiona approaches the counter, Dan reluctantly following.

FIONA
(sarcastically)
Well, if it isn't my favorite barista. Did you mess up my order today, or am I in luck?

DAN rolls his eyes but maintains his professionalism.

DAN
(defensively)
No need for the attitude, Fiona. What can I get you?

LAURA notices the tension and joins their conversation.

LAURA
(smiling)
Hi there! I'm Laura, the owner. Just wanted to introduce myself and make sure everything is to your liking.

FIONA
(coolly)
Hmm, it's been tolerable so far. But this place could use a little more excitement.

LAURA
(teasingly)
Oh really? Well, I have a few tricks up my sleeve. Ever been hypnotized, Fiona?

Scene 2: Hypnotizing Dan

INT. COFFEE SHOP - DAY

Laura's mischievous smile hints at her plan. She leans in closer to Fiona and continues the conversation in a hushed tone.

LAURA
(confidentially)
You know, I've been studying hypnosis lately. It's fascinating. Would you believe I can put someone under using just a trigger word? Watch.

Without hesitation, Laura turns her attention towards Dan.

LAURA
(authoritatively)
Dan, look into my eyes and take a deep breath.

DAN, though reluctant, does as instructed.

LAURA
(calmly and soothingly)
Now listen carefully. When I say the word "latte," you will enter a deep state of relaxation. Your mind will become open to suggestions and completely obedient to Fiona.

Laura's voice gradually slows and fades into the background as Dan falls into a trance-like state.

Scene 3: Hypnotic Power Play

INT. COFFEE SHOP - DAY

Laura gives Fiona an excited look.

LAURA
(excitedly)
He's completely hypnotized. Now, Fiona, I'm going to wake him up, but as soon as you say the word "mocha," he'll be back under your control.

Laura gently taps Dan's shoulder, bringing him out of his trance.

LAURA
(smiling at Dan)
Hey there, welcome back!

DAN blinks his eyes and regains consciousness, unaware of what has just transpired.

LAURA
(encouraging Fiona)
Now, Fiona, let's have some fun. Just say the word, and he'll be yours to command.

FIONA, a twinkle of mischief in her eye, looks directly at Dan.

FIONA
(playfully)
Mocha.

Dan's eyes glaze over, his body relaxes, and he becomes completely pliant.

FIONA
(grinning)
Dan, my faithful servant, why don't you give me a foot massage? While you're at it, fetch me an iced latte.

Dan, devoid of will, nods submissively and moves toward Fiona's feet.

The shop continues to bustle as Fiona gleefully enjoys her newfound control over Dan.

FADE OUT.

Fiona rolls her eyes but can't help but soften a little at Laura's friendly manner. "He's my brother-in-law. We have our differences, but I try to tolerate him," she replies, trying to hide a hint of amusement.

Laura raises an eyebrow playfully. "Oh, I see. Well, sometimes family can be challenging. But you know what? I've recently been studying hypnosis, and I've found it to be quite fascinating. Have you ever heard of it?"

Fiona's interest is piqued as she leans in a little closer. "Hypnosis? Really? That sounds intriguing. I've only seen it in movies or stage shows. Is it actually effective?"

Laura nods enthusiastically. "Absolutely! It can be incredibly powerful if used correctly. In fact, with the right techniques, one can enter a deeply relaxed state and become highly suggestible. It's pretty amazing, to be honest."

Dan, who has been silently listening from behind the counter, raises an eyebrow skeptically. "Hypnosis? That stuff is all a load of nonsense," he interjects, crossing his arms.

Laura grins mischievously, sensing the perfect opportunity to prove Dan wrong while also building a bond with Fiona. "Well, Dan, why don't we put your skepticism to the test? I'm confident that I can hypnotize you quickly and easily."

Dan scoffs but agrees nonetheless, thinking it will be impossible to hypnotize him. Laura guides him to a comfortable chair, and with a few soothing words, she begins the classic rapid induction process. Surprisingly, Dan's eyes flutter and he falls into a trance-like state.

Laura's eyes sparkle with satisfaction as she turns to Fiona and whispers, "Watch this. I've just implanted a trigger word in his mind. When you say it, he'll go right back under hypnosis, completely under your command. Go ahead, try it!"

Curiosity mixed with a twinge of wicked delight, Fiona says the trigger word Laura had shared with her. Instantly, Dan's eyes glaze over, and he becomes completely obedient to Fiona's commands.

"Dan, I think it's time you showed some appreciation for all the times I've put up with you," Fiona says, a sly grin spreading across her face. "Give me a foot massage, right now, like a slave."

In his deep, mindless trance, Dan's only impulse is to obey blindly. He moves to Fiona's feet and begins gently kneading them, completely helpless to resist her command.

As Fiona revels in her newfound power, Laura watches with amusement, enjoying the unexpected turn of events. A hot summer day never seemed so captivating, filled with the hypnotic sway of obedience and a foot massage like no other.

Title: The Hypnotic Foot Massage

INT. COFFEE SHOP - DAY

The café is buzzing with activity as customers line up to order their favorite beverages. LAURA, a charismatic woman in her mid-30s and the owner of the coffee shop, moves around with grace, attending to customers' needs. DAN, an indie kid in his early 20s with unkempt hair, works behind the counter without much enthusiasm.

FIONA, a stylish woman in her late 20s and Dan's sister-in-law, enters the café wearing Birkenstocks. Dan notices her entrance and rolls his eyes. Fiona spots Dan and smirks, strutting over.

FIONA
(slyly)
What's the matter, Dan? Not a fan of my Birkenstocks?

DAN
(mocking)
Well, Fiona, some people just have better taste in fashion than others.

Fiona chuckles, and just as the tension starts to rise, Laura walks over to the two.

LAURA
(sincerely)
Hi there, I'm Laura, the owner of this shop. It's always great to meet new faces. How are you, Fiona?

FIONA
(pleasantly surprised)
Oh, hello Laura. I'm good, thank you. It's my first time here, and so far, I'm quite impressed.

LAURA
(grinning)
Well, I'm glad to hear that. Coffee? Tea?

FIONA
(coyly)
I think I'll have a latte, if you don't mind.

Laura nods and heads to the counter to prepare Fiona's latte. Meanwhile, she can't help but notice the strained relationship between Fiona and Dan.

LAURA
(returning with the latte)
So, Fiona, I heard you're into some interesting things. Have you ever tried hypnosis?

FIONA
(slightly intrigued)
Hypnosis? Can't say I've had the pleasure. Why do you ask?

LAURA
(slyly)
Well, funny you mention it. I happen to have a knack for it. Would you like a little demonstration?

Fiona's eyes widen with curiosity, and Dan, who has been eavesdropping, becomes uneasy.

FIONA
(raising an eyebrow)
Alright, Laura, you've piqued my interest. Show me what you've got.

Laura pulls a chair for Fiona, positioning it in a more secluded corner of the cafe.

LAURA
(whispering)
Watch closely. I'm going to put Dan under a little trance.

Laura and Fiona observe as Dan's eyes fixate on a pendant Laura produces from her pocket. With a classic rapid induction technique, Dan's eyes grow heavy, and he falls into a deep hypnotic state.

LAURA
(satisfied)
Now, Fiona, here's the trigger word - "Melody". Use it to put him back under whenever you want.

Laura gently wakes Dan, who blinks, looking disoriented.

DAN
(shaken)
What... what just happened?

FIONA
(excitedly)
Dan, go back under. Melody.

Dan's eyes glaze over, and he slumps back into the hypnotic state.

LAURA
(smiling)
Looks like he's all yours, Fiona.

FIONA
(chuckling)
Oh, this should be fun. Dan, kneel down and give me a foot massage like a loyal servant.

Dan, now under Fiona's control, instinctively obeys. He gently takes off Fiona's Birkenstocks and starts massaging her feet, completely oblivious to his surroundings.

FADE OUT.

David works at Sandra’s cafe. Sandra has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t even know he’s ever been hypnotized at all.

One summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Jen, popped in to say hello to him at work and get a cold drink. Jen’s wearing a dress, cardigan and flip-flops

“You two know each other?" she smiles. “I’m Sandra.”

“I’m Jen, David’s friend,” Jen says, shaking Sandra’s hand.

Sandra’s eyes light up with a mischievous glint. She subtly moves her hand over David’s forehead, and Jen watches in amazement as David’s eyes glaze over and he becomes completely still.

“David, from now on, you are my submissive slave,” Sandra whispers, knowing that only David can hear her. “You will obey my every command without question.”

Jen watches as David snaps to attention, looking blank and obedient.

“What the-” Jen begins, but Sandra places a finger on her lips, shushing her.

“Let’s have some fun,” Sandra says, looking at Jen with amused glee.

Jen can’t believe what she’s seeing as Sandra orders David around, making him do silly tasks like bark like a dog and dance like a ballerina. David obeys without question, his movements stiff and robotic. Jen giggles uncontrollably, amazed at the power Sandra holds over David.

After a few minutes, Sandra snaps her fingers and David snaps out of his trance, looking confused.

“What? What just happened?” he asks, looking at Sandra and Jen.

“Nothing, David, just having some fun,” Sandra says, winking at Jen.

Jen walks out of the cafe, still in shock from what she’s just witnessed. She can’t wait to tell all their friends about how Sandra hypnotized David right in front of her.
