One summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Jen, popped in to say hello to him at work and get a cold drink.

“You two know each other?" she smiles. “I’m Sandra.”

Sandra greets Jen with a warm smile, her eyes already scanning over David’s form. She’s been waiting for the perfect opportunity to hypnotize him in front of someone else, and Jen’s arrival is just the chance she needs.

“Oh, we go way back,” Sandra says, her voice dripping with honeyed charm. “David’s such a good friend, always so eager to help out around here.”

Jen nods, taking a sip of her drink. “Yeah, he’s a great guy. Always so willing to lend a hand.”

Sandra leans in closer, her voice dropping to a whisper. “Do you want to see something cool?”

Jen’s eyes light up with curiosity. “Like what?”

“I can hypnotize David,” Sandra says, her gaze never leaving David’s face.

Jen’s eyes widen in surprise. “You can what?”

“Hypnotize him,” Sandra repeats. “Watch this.”

With a wave of her hand and a few simple commands, Sandra sends David into a deep trance. His eyes glaze over and he stands there, completely still and obedient.

Jen watches in amazement, her mouth hanging open in disbelief. “Oh my god, that’s incredible,” she says, laughing. “He’s like a zombie!”

Sandra chuckles, her hand still outstretched. “Come on, David,” she commands. “Follow me.”

David obeys, his feet shuffling forward as he follows Sandra across the cafe. Jen watches, her eyes glued to the scene unfolding before her.

As they reach the back of the cafe, Sandra turns to Jen with a smirk. “You want to have some fun with him?”

Jen nods enthusiastically. “Oh hell yeah. What should we make him do?”

Sandra laughs, her mind already working overtime. “Let’s make him our submissive slave for a little while,” she says, grinning mischievously. “I want to see how far we can push him.”

Jen giggles, already imagining all the ways they can make David do their bidding. “This is going to be so much fun,” she says, clapping her hands.

Sandra turns back to David, who is still standing there, completely under her control. “David,” she says sweetly. “You are now our submissive slave. You will do everything we tell you to do, without question. Do you understand?”

David nods, his eyes still glazed over. “Yes, mistress,” he replies, his voice monotone.

Jen giggles, her eyes sparkling with amusement. “This is going to be amazing,” she says, rubbing her hands together.

And with that, Sandra and Jen set to work, making David do all sorts of things for their entertainment. They make him dance, sing, and even do some silly impersonations. David obeys them without hesitation, his mind completely under their control.

As the afternoon wears on, Sandra finally snaps her fingers, bringing David out of the trance. He blinks a few times, looking around in confusion.

“Hey man, how’s work been?” Jen asks, grinning at him.

David shakes his head, as if trying to clear it. “Uh, it’s been good,” he says, still looking a bit dazed. “What happened?”

Sandra and Jen giggle, sharing a secret grin. “Oh, nothing much,” Sandra says innocently. “We just had a little fun with you while you were under.”

David looks confused, still not fully understanding what just happened. Jen just smiles, her eyes full of mischief.

As the conversation continues, David can’t help but feel like he’s missing something. But he can’t quite put his finger on it. And as he turns his attention back to work, he forgets all about the hypnotic encounter he just had.

conversation.content:
(David’s colleague Clare sometimes hypnotizes him, giving him suggestions to make him even more susceptible to hypnosis in the future. It started when he accidentally really went under when she was just goofing around, to her astonishment and glee)

Most of the team from the office were on the night out to celebrate David’s 30th birthday. They had been at the pub for an hour already and people were starting to get tipsy. Clare kicked her uncomfortable shoes off.

She had been waiting for the right moment to hypnotize David, and she knew this was it.

“David, let’s play a game,” Clare said slyly, locking her deep brown eyes onto his. “I’m going to ask you some questions, and I want you to answer honestly. Got it?”

David nodded, his interest piqued by the game-like nature of the conversation.

“First question: Have you ever been hypnotized before?” Clare asked with a mischievous glint in her eye.

David hesitated. He vaguely remembered her messing around with some hypnosis stuff in the office before, but it was fuzzy. “I don’t think so?”

Clare leaned in closer. “Are you sure?”

David blinked, and suddenly he was back in the office, with Clare standing in front of him, her voice low and soothing. “You love being hypnotized, David. It’s easy to slip under my trance. Whenever I say ‘sleep’, you will instantly close your eyes and become extremely receptive to my suggestions.”

A warm feeling of relaxation flooded over David, and he couldn’t help but grin stupidly. “Yes...I love being hypnotized,” he murmured.

“Good boy,” Clare said approvingly. “From now on, whenever I say ‘sleep’, you will go into a deep trance and become even more suggestible. After tonight, you’ll be my perfect little hypnotism subject.”

David’s eyes flickered closed as she said the trigger word, and he felt himself sinking into a blissful, trance-like state. He barely even noticed when the rest of his team came over to wish him a happy birthday.

All he could think about was Clare’s hypnotic voice, and the delicious thrill of being under her control.
Some of his colleagues did wonder why he was sitting on the floor giving Clare a foot rub.

David's colleagues were getting more and more curious about his behavior as the night went on. They watched as he sat on the floor at Clare's feet, massaging them with a dreamy expression on his face.

One of them leaned over to whisper to another. "What's up with David? He's acting like he's in a trance or something."

Another colleague chimed in. "Maybe he's just really drunk."

But as the night went on, David's behavior only became more and more bizarre. He found himself drawn to Clare's side whenever she spoke, hanging on her every word. And every time she said the trigger word, he would go even deeper under her spell.

Eventually, one of his coworkers, feeling concerned, approached him. "David, are you okay? You've been acting really weird all night."

David looked up at her, his eyes glassy and unfocused. "I'm fine," he said softly. "Just...relaxing."

His coworker frowned. "Are you sure? Maybe you should go home."

But David shook his head, his gaze drifting back to Clare. He couldn't leave her side. He needed to be near her, to hear her voice, to feel her control over him.

In the end, it was Clare who finally decided it was time for them to go home. She stood up, smoothing her dress, and David followed her like a lost puppy.

As they made their way out of the pub, his coworkers watched them go with a mixture of concern and unease. Something wasn't right about the way David was acting, and they all felt it. But they couldn't quite put their finger on what it was.
rewrite this, with Clare instead telling their colleagues what's really up

Clare noticed the worried looks on her colleagues' faces as they watched David's unusual behaviour throughout the night. Despite having been using hypnosis on him, Clare didn't want them to think that he was in trouble or that he had lost control. So, she decided to explain the situation to them.

"Hey guys, I know it may seem like David is acting strangely, but he's fine. You see, we've been exploring the wonderful world of hypnosis together."

The group looked at Clare with shock and confusion, not quite sure what to make of her statement.

"Hypnosis?" one of them repeated, looking at David, who was now sitting beside Clare, seemingly entranced.

Clare nodded. "Yes, hypnosis. David is quite susceptible to it, and he loves the feeling of being under my control. It's completely consensual, and he knows exactly what he's doing. Trust me, he's perfectly safe."

Slowly but surely, the group began to relax. They realized that David was in no danger, and that Clare was simply indulging in a bit of harmless experimentation.

"Okay, well...as long as he's okay," one of them said cautiously.

"He's more than okay," Clare responded with a smile. "In fact, I think he's enjoying himself quite a bit. Isn't that right, David?"

David looked up at her with a dazed expression. "Yes, Mistress," he murmured, causing the group to break out in nervous laughter.

With Clare's explanation, they were able to accept David's unusual behaviour and enjoy the rest of the night without any concerns. And as for David and Clare, they continued their hypnotic journey together, exploring new depths of control and submission.
At work the next day

The morning after the night out, David arrived at the office feeling a little groggy but otherwise fine. He wasn't quite sure what had happened the night before, but he remembered flashes of being under Clare's control, and he couldn't deny that he had enjoyed it.

As he settled into his desk, he noticed Clare walking towards him with a mischievous glint in her eye. "Good morning, David," she said cheerily. "Sleep well?"

David blushed, realizing that she must have known exactly what she was doing to him. "Yeah...I guess so," he murmured, suddenly feeling awkward.

Clare leaned in closer, her voice low and hypnotic. "Remember, David, whenever I say 'sleep', you'll instantly become more open and susceptible to my control. And the more I hypnotize you, the easier it will become for you to go under. Got it?"

David nodded, feeling himself slipping under her spell once again. He tried to focus on his work, but he couldn't help but think about Clare and her hypnotic powers.

As the day went on, he couldn't shake the feeling that he was walking on eggshells around his friend. He didn't want to upset her or make her think that he wasn't enjoying their hypnosis sessions, but at the same time, he wanted to make sure that he was in control of his own mind and body.

It was a tricky situation, to say the least. But as Clare continued to hypnotize him throughout the day, David began to realize that there was something liberating about giving up control. It allowed him to tap into a part of himself that he had never explored before, and it made him feel more alive than ever.

By the end of the day, David was eager to see what Clare had in store for him next. He was ready to let go of his inhibitions and embrace the hypnotic world that she had introduced him to. And as long as it was consensual and safe, he was more than happy to keep exploring it with her.

conversation.content:
(in which Velma will hypnotize Fred, giving him suggestions to be the group's submissive servant)

The Mystery Machine gang drove down to a little spot on the coast that they knew was usually quiet. The wind was high, but the rocks formed a natural barrier, and the view was beautiful from here. They got out of the van and set up their cooking gear, and deckchairs. Shaggy lit a doobie and they all opened some beers.

As they settled in for a relaxing afternoon, Velma pulled out her pocket watch. "Hey everyone, I've been practicing hypnosis techniques and I want to try it out on Fred," she said.

Fred looked skeptical, but the others were curious. "What kind of hypnosis?" asked Daphne.

"I want to give him suggestions to be our submissive servant," Velma replied, holding the watch up to Fred's face.

Fred laughed. "I don't think that's possible, Velma."

"Relax, Fred," Velma said soothingly. "All you have to do is focus on the watch and follow my instructions."

As Fred watched the watch swing back and forth, Velma began to speak in a calm, steady voice. "You are feeling very relaxed, Fred. You trust me completely and are willing to obey my suggestions."

Fred felt his muscles go limp as Velma's voice penetrated his mind. "That's right, Fred," she continued. "From now on, you will be our submissive servant. You will do everything we ask without question or hesitation."

Fred felt a strange, dizzy feeling as he tried to resist the hypnotic suggestions. But Velma's voice was too persuasive, and soon he was completely under her control.

"Good boy, Fred," Velma said, snapping her fingers. "You will wake up feeling refreshed and ready to serve us."

Fred blinked his eyes a few times, feeling a bit disoriented. He looked around at the other members of the gang, feeling a sudden urge to please them. "What can I do for you guys?" he asked eagerly.

The others exchanged amused glances. "Looks like Velma's hypnosis worked," said Daphne.

"Indeed it did," Velma said with a satisfied smirk. "And now we have our very own submissive servant."

Fred felt a rush of excitement at the thought of serving his friends. He was happy to do whatever they wanted, as long as it made them happy. It was an odd feeling, but he couldn't help but feel a sense of pride at being chosen as their loyal servant.
The gang were all really pleased with this new state of affairs. Daphne and Velma got comfortable in their deckchairs, taking their shoes and socks off.

"Fred, would you be a dear and give us foot rubs?" Daphne requested, wiggling her toes in front of him.

"Of course, Daphne," Fred said eagerly, moving over to her feet and beginning to massage them. He could feel the tension in her feet melting away under his touch.

Meanwhile, Velma had some other requests. "Fred, could you fetch us some more beers? And maybe make us some sandwiches too?"

"Of course, Velma," Fred said, getting up from his position and heading over to the cooler. He opened it up and pulled out fresh beers, along with shuffling the supplies for his sandwiches.

As he worked, Fred felt a sense of satisfaction and fulfillment. Taking care of his friends and making them happy was the most important thing in the world. He couldn't imagine anything more rewarding.

The rest of the afternoon passed by in a satisfying blur for Fred. He cooked, fetched, served, and rubbed to his heart's content, always eager to please his friends. And when they finally decided to head back to the Mystery Machine, Fred felt oddly fulfilled at having put himself completely at their service.

It wasn't until they got back to the van that Velma snapped her fingers and released Fred from his trance. "Alright, Fred, you can go back to being the leader again," she said with a grin.

Fred blinked a few times, feeling a bit disoriented. "What happened?" he asked, rubbing his eyes.

"Nothing much," Daphne said with a smile. "Just some hypnotic fun. You were a very good boy, Fred."

Fred shook his head, trying to clear the fog from his mind. The memory of serving his friends still felt fresh and real, but he knew it was all just a strange hypnotic experience.

"Well, that was certainly a different kind of afternoon," Fred said with a chuckle, climbing into the driver's seat of the Mystery Machine. "What's next on the agenda?"

Velma and the rest of the gang shrugged, content to enjoy the rest of the day without any plans. But for Fred, the memory of serving and submitting still lingered, a reminder of the strange and unexpected ways their adventures could take them.

On a very hot July afternoon (sandal weather), the cafe was pretty quiet. David was just refilling the fridge when the door opened and in came a good friend of his he hadn’t seen for a while. (Stella doesn’t know her)

“Hey, Angela!” David said, smiling as he saw his friend. She walked up to him, giving him a hug.

“Hey, David! Long time no see,” Angela replied.

Stella, who was working behind the counter, watched the interaction with interest. She knew this was the perfect opportunity to show Angela her power over David.

“Hey, David, can you come help me with something?” Stella called out. David turned to her, nodding.

“Sure thing,” he said as he made his way behind the counter.

Stella leaned in close to him, her eyes locked on his.

“David, I want you to close your eyes and relax,” she whispered. David did as he was told, the sound of Stella’s voice calming him instantly. He had no idea what was happening, so he just went along with it.

“Now, when I snap my fingers, you will wake up and feel refreshed and happy, but you won’t remember anything from the past few weeks,” Stella continued, her voice barely above a whisper. She snapped her fingers, and David opened his eyes, feeling dazed and refreshed.

“Hey, Angela, sorry about that. What can I get for you?” David asked, turning back to his friend.

Stella watched with delight as David interacted with Angela, completely unaware of what had just happened. She felt a rush of power and excitement as she realized just how much control she had over David, and how easy it was to use it.

As Angela and David chatted, Stella couldn’t help but fantasize about the other ways she could use her hypnosis on David, making him do all sorts of dirty, secret things for her pleasure. She knew she had found a new obsession, and she couldn’t wait to explore it further.

"Hello David," Emma says with a sly grin.

"Hi Emma," David replies, his voice sounding distant and dreamy.

He heads to the kitchen and begins to wash the dishes, taking his time to make sure they are spotless.

David nods again, his mind a blank slate, as he sets to work on his tasks.

Catherine watches from afar, pleased with the results of her hypnosis on her husband. She knows he will do anything she wants, no matter how embarrassing or degrading it may be.

conversation.content: (David’s wife Catherine sometimes uses hypnosis on him) Catherine has made an arrangement with her brother, Kevin, to send her husband David over to do Kevin's housework for him, and anything else he might tell him to do. David is a fairly docile guy and is willing to do whatever Catherine wants. In a daze, he knocks, and Kevin opens the door, smirking, wearing a vest, jeans and bare feet.

Kevin: Well, look who it is! My favorite brother-in-law. Come on in, David.

David: (in a dazed state) Hello, Kevin.

Kevin: Alright, let's get started. First, you can start by cleaning the living room. Vacuum the carpet, dust everything, and make sure it looks spotless. Do you understand?

David: Yes, I understand.

As David begins to clean the living room, Kevin sits back on the couch, his feet propped up on the coffee table, smirking at the sight of his brother-in-law doing his housework.

After the living room is cleaned, Kevin continues to instruct David around the house, having him do the dishes, laundry, and even scrubbing the bathroom. David does everything that Kevin says, never once questioning or complaining.

Kevin: Wow, David, I have to say, I am impressed. You've done a great job today. I think that will be enough for now.

David: Thank you, Kevin.

Kevin: Before you go, there's just one last thing. I want you to give me a foot massage, alright?

David: Yes, of course.

David kneels down and begins to massage Kevin's feet, further cementing the control that his sister-in-law has over him.

Finally, after Kevin decides he's had enough, he dismisses David, who leaves, still in a daze, to return home to his wife Catherine. Little does David know that Catherine and Kevin secretly enjoy having this control over him, taking advantage of his docility through hypnosis. And they have no intention of ever letting him know about their arrangement.
Kevin phones Catherine that evening, chuckling.

Kevin: Hey Catherine, it's Kevin. You won't believe how today went - David did everything I told him to without question. Even gave me a foot massage! Thanks for sending him over.

Catherine: (laughing) No problem, Kevin. I knew you'd enjoy having him do your bidding. How was the house looking after he finished?

Kevin: Spotless, just as I wanted. I have to say, this arrangement is really working out well for us. Who would have thought hypnosis could be so effective?

Catherine: I know, right? As long as David remains docile and willing, I don't see why we can't continue to take advantage of the situation.

Kevin: Absolutely. It's been great catching up, Catherine. Let's see if we can do this again sometime soon, okay?

Catherine: Definitely, Kevin. I'll make sure to get David ready for the next time. Have a good night!

They both laugh, pleased with their secret arrangement, as they hang up the phone, looking forward to continuing their control over David. But what they fail to realize is that playing with someone's mind like that might eventually lead to consequences they never anticipated.
go into detail describing the foot massage scene, with David totally dazed

As David kneels down in front of Kevin, his eyes glazed over and seemingly staring through Kevin, he gently takes Kevin's bare foot into his hands. Kevin, with a smirk on his face, watches intently as David unconsciously begins the foot massage.

David's fingers gently press into the soles of Kevin's feet, slowly working out the tension from a day of relaxation. Despite his dazed state, David appears attentive to the task at hand as though it were the most important thing in the world. Kevin can't help but let out a contented sigh, feeling his muscles loosen under David's surprisingly skilled touch.

The room is quiet, save for the sound of Kevin's occasional sighs of satisfaction, with the air heavy as David's hypnosis-induced daze lingers around him. His hands methodically work their way around Kevin's feet, moving from the heels up to the balls of the feet, and then gently pulling on each toe, one by one. Kevin's smirk grows even wider as he finds enjoyment in the power he has over his brother-in-law, knowing full well this is a scene he'll likely share with Catherine later on.

David's focus remains on Kevin's feet, never once breaking his concentration, even though deep down, a small part of him feels the strangeness of the situation. Still, the hypnosis has its hold, and David carries on, the motions of the foot massage seeming almost robotic in their execution.

After several minutes, Kevin finally decides he's had enough, and instructs David to stop. David obliges, gently releasing Kevin's feet and lowering them to the floor. As Kevin smirks in satisfaction, David, still in a fog, remains kneeling for a moment, waiting for further instructions or the return to his normal state, whichever may come first.
The next time David bumps into Kevin, his brother-in-law gleefully reminds him of the time he had him submissively at his feet!

A few days later, David runs into Kevin at a local coffee shop. David, not aware of the events that transpired while he was under hypnosis, greets him with a warm smile.

David: Hey, Kevin! How's it going?

Kevin: (grinning) Oh, you know, can't complain. But, man, David, I just can't help but think about the other day when you were...well, I have to be honest, submissively at my feet! (laughs)

David: (looking confused) What are you talking about, Kevin?

Kevin: (taking a moment to decide whether to reveal the secret or not) You don't remember? Well, I guess I shouldn't be surprised. Let's just say you gave me an amazing foot massage, and you were completely dazed while doing it. It was quite the sight!

David, becoming increasingly concerned about the situation, frowns and tries to recall the memory, but nothing comes to his mind.

David: I...I don't remember any of that. Are you sure you're not joking?

Kevin: (smirking) Oh, I'm not joking. It was quite the experience for me. But don't worry, it's our little secret. Enjoy the rest of your day, David!

As Kevin walks away, David stands there, feeling perplexed and disturbed by the revelation. In the back of his mind, he begins to wonder if Catherine and Kevin have been playing him all along, using hypnosis to manipulate him for their own amusement. Only time will tell if David decides to confront his wife and brother-in-law about their secret arrangement, or maybe do some investigations of his own to uncover the truth.

conversation.content:
David and Ruth are a brother and sister in their early twenties.
(David’s friend Jeannette sometimes uses hypnosis on him) Jeannette has sent David over to do Ruth’s housework for her, and anything else she might tell him to do. David is a fairly docile guy and is willing to do whatever Jeannette wants. In a hypnotized daze, he knocks, and his sister Ruth opens the door in her pjs and bare feet, smirking and clearly delighted to have her brother completely in her power.

David doesn't realize the full extent of what's happening, as he's still under Jeannette's hypnosis. He obediently follows Ruth's orders to clean and organize the entire house, even doing her laundry and cooking her meals. Ruth takes advantage of the situation and orders him to do humiliating tasks, like cleaning the toilets or washing her feet.

As time goes on, David begins to feel uneasy about his sister's behavior towards him. He starts to question the hypnosis and wonders if Ruth is taking things too far. But he's still too timid to stand up to her or Jeannette.

One day, while doing the laundry, David finds a note from Jeannette in his pocket. It reads, "You are no longer under my hypnosis. You have the power to break free. Be strong." David realizes that he's been living under a spell this whole time and that he needs to take back control of his life.

He confronts Ruth, who's shocked to find that her brother is no longer her puppet. David tells her he's done with her games and that he won't let her or Jeannette control him anymore. Ruth pleads with him to stay under her control, expressing how much she enjoys bossing him around and making him do things for her, but David remains resolute. He walks out of the house, feeling empowered and free for the first time in a long time.

conversation.content:
Sharon has hypnotized her work colleague Dan a few times now. The first time was literally an accident, but Dan said he kind of liked the feeling, it was relaxing. She put him under again, and gave him suggestions that he loved being hypnotized and that he would develop a new foot fetish (“you want everyone to know how easily I can control you, Dan” “yes Sharon”)
One lunchtime in the break room, with a few colleagues sitting around eating, Sharon had a mischievous idea. She glanced over at Dan, who was mid-sandwich. “Hey, Dan. Mind if I show everyone something?”

Dan, under Sharon's suggestion, nodded eagerly and said, "Sure, Sharon. Anything you want."

Sharon then instructed Dan to take off his shoes and socks, which he did without hesitation, much to the surprise of their colleagues. "Check this out," Sharon said, waving her hand in front of Dan's face, putting him deeper under hypnosis.

She then gave Dan more suggestions, telling him that his feet were incredibly sensitive, like never before. She asked the others to come closer and examine Dan's bare feet. As they did, Sharon said, "Watch this," and then started tickling Dan's feet.

Dan burst into laughter and squirmed in his chair. His colleagues were shocked and amused at his reaction. Sharon continued to tickle Dan's feet for a few minutes, enjoying the control she had over him and the reactions she was causing.

Finally, Sharon snapped her fingers and brought Dan out of hypnosis. He looked around, confused, and then saw that his feet were exposed. He quickly pulled his socks and shoes back on, feeling embarrassed and vulnerable.

Sharon chuckled to herself as she watched Dan try to compose himself. She enjoyed the power she had over him, and she knew she'd be hypnotizing him again soon.

conversation.content:
Sharon has hypnotized her work colleague Dan a few times now. The first time was just an experiment, but Dan said he kind of liked the feeling, it was relaxing. She put him under again, and gave him suggestions that he was incredibly easy to hypnotize (“you want everyone to see just how easy to hypnotize you are, Dan” “yes Sharon”)
One lunchtime in the break room, with a few colleagues sitting around eating, Sharon felt mischievous. She glanced over at Dan, who was mid-sandwich, and slipped her shoes off under the table. “Hey, Dan. Mind if I show everyone something?”

Dan looked up, a little dazed. “Sure, Sharon.”

Sharon stood up and walked over to Dan, standing right in front of him. “Watch closely, everyone,” she said, with a smile.

She began to snap her fingers in front of Dan's eyes, and his gaze was immediately drawn to them. She kept snapping and speaking softly to him, as though she was talking to a small child.

Dan's eyelids drooped, and he swayed slightly in his chair. Sharon put her hand on his shoulder to steady him, still snapping her fingers.

“Dan, when I snap my fingers again, you're going to feel incredibly ticklish. So ticklish that you'll burst out laughing, even if you try not to. One, two, three.”

She snapped her fingers, and sure enough, Dan started giggling uncontrollably. He tried to stop himself, but he couldn't. Everyone in the break room was laughing too – it was infectious.

Sharon let Dan recover for a few moments, then snapped her fingers again. “OK, Dan, you're back to normal now. Feeling relaxed and refreshed.”

Dan blinked a few times, looking a little confused. “What just happened?”

Sharon just smiled enigmatically and put her shoes back on. “Nothing at all, Dan. Just a little experiment.”

From that day on, Sharon became known as the office hypnotist. She would hypnotize colleagues for fun, or to help them overcome bad habits like smoking or overeating. And Dan remained her favorite subject – he was always so easy to hypnotize.

conversation.content:
Big Brenda (40) has been hypnotizing a willing younger colleague, Dan, for a few weeks, and he’s an excellent hypnotic subject. He’s getting easier and easier to put into deeper and deeper trance. After every session, Brenda makes Dan forget everything that happened, and the next time she asks if he’d be willing to give hypnosis a try he always thinks it’s the first time.

It’s a stifling day in the office. Brenda interrupts a conversation Dan is having with Lucy, another colleague.

"Dan, can I speak to you for a moment?" Brenda says with a smile.

Dan nods and stands up, following her to a more private area. Brenda takes out her pocket watch and starts to swing it back and forth.

"Dan, you're feeling very relaxed and comfortable," Brenda says in a soothing tone. "You're doing so well with hypnosis, I think it's time to try something new."

Dan nods, his eyes fixed on the watch. "Yes, Brenda," he says.

"I want you to imagine that you're on a beautiful beach, with the sun shining down on you and the waves lapping at your feet," Brenda continues. "You feel so peaceful and calm. As I count down from three to one, you'll start to feel as if you're drifting deeper and deeper into this wonderful trance. Three, two, one."

Dan's eyes flutter closed and he slumps in his chair, completely under Brenda's spell. She smiles to herself and continues the session, knowing that Dan will remember nothing when he wakes up.

Later that day, Lucy approaches Brenda. "What were you doing with Dan earlier?" she asks curiously.

Brenda just smiles enigmatically. "Oh, just some hypnosis," she says. "Nothing to worry about."

But Lucy can't help feeling a little uneasy. There's something about Brenda's power over Dan that seems a little too intense, a little too controlling. And she's not sure she likes it.

“Excellent,” said Justine with a smile, as she put her glasses back on. “You’re going to do great things, Dan.”

As Dan left the meeting, he couldn’t explain what had just happened. All he knew was that he had volunteered to lead a new project with his female colleagues, and he couldn’t wait to get started.

conversation.content: In this detailed script, whenever Nadine tells colleague Dave to do something, he obeys with alacrity, & he’s always sneaking looks at her feet when she wears sandals. Nadine’s friend Jan (who Dave doesn’t like one bit) teasingly comments on Dave’s devotion to Nadine, embarrassing Dave. The two of them pitilessly tease Dave, further mortifying him, & Nadine firmly gives him degrading orders, he submissively complies. it’s obviously humiliating, & Nadine shares with an astonished Jan the secret of how she hypnotizes Dave.

Title: Foot Fetish: A Hypnotic Tale

Characters:
- Nadine: A confident and manipulative individual
- Dave: A submissive and easily influenced colleague of Nadine's
- Jan: Nadine's friend, who enjoys teasing Dave

INT. OFFICE - DAY

Nadine and Dave are working in the same office space. Nadine is standing at her desk, wearing a pair of sandals.

NADINE
Dave, could you please fetch me a cup of coffee?

DAVE
(quickly)
Of course, Nadine. Right away!

Dave leaves his desk and sneaks a glance at Nadine's feet before making his way to the office kitchen.

INT. OFFICE KITCHEN - DAY

Dave is preparing a cup of coffee when Jan walks in, noticing his eagerness.

JAN
(teasingly)
Dave, you seem awfully dedicated to fulfilling Nadine's every request. Are you smitten with her?

DAVE
(stuttering)
No, not at all! I just want to be helpful.

Jan chuckles, clearly amused by Dave's response. Dave's face turns red with embarrassment.

INT. OFFICE - DAY

Nadine and Jan are now standing at Nadine's desk while Dave returns with her coffee.

NADINE
(slyly)
Dave, thank you. Now, why don't you go get my dry cleaning from the shop down the street?

DAVE
(submissively)
Of course, Nadine. Right away.

Dave leaves, again stealing a glance at Nadine's feet as he walks away.

INT. OFFICE CORRIDOR - DAY

Dave is returning to the office with Nadine's dry cleaning when he overhears Nadine and Jan's conversation.

NADINE
(laughing)
You won't believe how I am able to control Dave. It's the power of hypnosis, my dear Jan.

Dave freezes, unable to believe what he just heard.

INT. OFFICE - DAY

Nadine and Jan enter the office, still oblivious to Dave's presence.

JAN
(teasingly)
Dave, it seems you are entirely under Nadine's spell. Is there something you'd like to confess?

DAVE
(defensively)
No, it's not what you think. I'm just being helpful.

Nadine turns to face Dave, a sly smile playing on her lips.

NADINE
(smirking)
Oh, Dave, you're too modest. Why don't you get down on your knees and shine my shoes while we discuss your loyalty to me?

Dave's face now shows a mix of humiliation and compliance as he drops to his knees.

DAVE
(submissively)
Yes, Nadine. Anything you say.

Jan and Nadine burst into laughter, reveling in Dave's embarrassment.

FADE OUT.
Dave really doesn't like Jan. Jan finds all this hilarious. What might happen next?

INT. OFFICE - DAY

Dave, still on his knees, reluctantly begins to polish Nadine's shoes while Jan watches, thoroughly entertained.

JAN
(teasingly)
Oh, Dave, you really are whipped, aren't you? Nadine has you completely under her control.

DAVE
(gritting his teeth)
Just drop it, Jan. This is embarrassing enough.

NADINE
(smiling)
Oh, come on, Dave. Don't be such a spoilsport. We're just having some fun.

Jan continues to laugh as Dave finishes shining Nadine's shoes and awkwardly gets back on his feet.

DAVE
(defiantly)
I'm tired of this. Nadine, I won't be your puppet anymore.

Nadine's smile fades slightly, her expression turning serious.

NADINE
(threateningly)
Dave, it would be wise not to challenge me. You don't want everyone in the office to know your little secret, do you?

Dave's face goes pale as he realizes the potential consequences of defying Nadine.

DAVE
(softly)
No... please, Nadine. I'll do whatever you want.

JAN
(mischievously)
Oh, this is getting interesting. What other humiliating things can we make Dave do?

DAVE
(angrily)
Enough, Jan! Stop enjoying my misery.

Nadine, sensing the tension, intervenes, her tone slightly softer.

NADINE
(to Jan)
Jan, perhaps we've had our fun for today. Let's not push Dave too far.

Jan rolls her eyes but acquiesces, although the mischievous glint still lingers in her gaze.

JAN
(frustrated)
Fine, but we're not done teasing you, Dave. This isn't over.

FADE OUT.

Next steps can include exploring why Nadine holds power over Dave, the repercussions of their dynamic on their professional relationship, or the resolution of the hypnosis revelation. This provides potential avenues for character development and conflict within the story.

conversation.content:
Sharon has hypnotized her work colleague Dan a few times now. The first time was just an experiment, but Dan said he kind of liked the feeling, it was relaxing. She put him under again, and gave him suggestions that he was laughably easy to hypnotize (“you want everyone to see just how submissive you can be, Dan” “yes Sharon”)
One day after work, a few of them had gone to the pub for a drink. Sharon glanced over at Dan, who was talking to Annie, a young colleague. “Hey, Dan. Mind if I show everyone something?”

Sharon asked with a smirk.

Dan looked up, feeling a little apprehensive but unable to resist her hypnotic suggestions. "Sure, Sharon. Go ahead."

Sharon stood up and walked over to Dan, gently placing her hand on his shoulder. "Dan, you're going to feel a little sleepy now. Just close your eyes and relax."

Dan obediently closed his eyes, sinking deeper into a trance as Sharon began to hypnotize him. She whispered softly in his ear, giving him suggestions that he would act like a chicken whenever someone said a certain word.

As the group continued their conversation, Sharon tested out her new hypnosis suggestion. "Hey Dan, did you hear about the time I saw a chicken crossing the road yesterday?"

Dan's eyes snapped open, and he immediately began to cluck and flap his arms like wings. The group burst out laughing, amazed at how easily Sharon had influenced him.

Sharon continued to play with Dan's subconscious mind, making him do silly and embarrassing things for their entertainment. Dan was helpless to resist, feeling compelled to obey Sharon's every command.

Despite his initial skepticism, Dan had grown to enjoy being under Sharon's hypnosis. He found himself looking forward to the next time she would put him under, eager to see what new suggestions she would give him.

He’s getting easier and easier to put into deeper and deeper trance. After every session, Brenda makes Dan forget everything that happened, and the next time she asks if he’d be willing to give hypnosis a try he always thinks it’s the first time.

(Lucy is going to find this amazing/funny) It’s a stifling day in the office, and Brenda’s taken her shoes off, her feet were getting sweaty. Brenda sees that Dan is having a conversation at his desk with Lucy, another colleague. “Hey, Lucy. Watch this.," she says, walking over.

She puts her foot up onto Dan's desk and wiggles her toes in front of his face. "Hypnotize me, Dan. Give me a foot massage." Dan's eyes glaze over, and before he knows it, he's massaging Brenda's feet. 

Lucy walks over, confused and amused. "What's going on here?" she asks.

"Oh, just a little hypnosis session," Brenda replies with a sly smile.

Lucy bursts out laughing. "Only you, Brenda, only you."

conversation.content:
(Dan’s boss Justine sometimes hypnotizes him) The office manager Justine seemed to openly prefer the women in the office. One sweaty, humid day in July she called Dan in for a meeting. When he entered Justine’s office, not only Justine, but two of his other female colleagues (Jacqui & Cath) with whom he didn’t get on were in there also.
“You’re probably wondering what this is about, Dan,” said Justine, taking off her glasses.

Dan nodded, feeling a little uneasy.

“Well, I’ve noticed that you’ve been struggling with certain tasks lately, and I wanted to offer my help,” Justine continued, a small smirk playing at the corners of her mouth.

Dan frowned, unable to recall any recent mistakes. “I’m not sure what you mean,” he said cautiously.

“It’s okay, Dan,” Jacqui spoke up, her voice smooth as honey. “We’re all here to help you. Just relax and let us take care of everything.”

Dan suddenly felt his eyelids getting heavy, his muscles relaxing. It was like a wave of calm washed over him, and he couldn’t resist their soothing voices urging him to trust them. Before he knew it, he was under their spell.

“Now, Dan, we’re going to hypnotize you,” Cath said softly, her voice barely above a whisper. “You’re going to feel wonderful, and when you wake up, you’ll be more productive than ever.”

Dan tried to protest, but his mouth wouldn’t cooperate. He felt his mind slipping away, and his body went limp in the chair.

When he woke up, he felt different. His mind was clearer, and he could think more sharply. He also felt strangely obedient, like he would do anything they asked of him.

And for the rest of the day, he worked tirelessly, feeling increasingly confident in his abilities. It wasn’t until the end of the day that he realized what had happened, and he swore to himself that he wouldn’t let them hypnotize him again.

But deep down, he knew that he was powerless against their seductive charms.

Dan closed his eyes and tried to follow their instructions. At first, it felt like nothing was happening. But then he felt a strange sensation wash over him, like his mind was being rewired.

When he opened his eyes again, he felt...different. Calmer. More focused. He looked around the room at Justine and his colleagues, and felt a sudden surge of affection for them. They smiled back at him warmly.

“Thank you, Dan,” said Justine. “I knew you had it in you. Now, go back to your desk and apply what you’ve learned. I expect great things from you.”

Dan nodded eagerly, feeling grateful to Justine and his colleagues. As he left the room, he couldn’t help but wonder what else they could make him do with their newfound power.

conversation.content:
(Dan’s boss Justine is able to hypnotize him) The office manager Justine seemed to openly prefer the women in the office. One sweaty, humid day in July she called Dan in for a meeting. When he entered Justine’s office, not only Justine, but two of his other female colleagues with whom he didn’t get on were in there also. 
“You’re probably wondering what this is about, Dan,” said Justine, taking off her glasses.

Dan nodded nervously. 

“Well, we’ve noticed that your productivity has been slipping lately,” Justine continued. “And we think we’ve found a solution.”

Dan raised his eyebrows. “A solution?”

“Yes,” said Justine, smiling. “You see, I have a special talent. I’m a trained hypnotist.”

Dan felt a cold rush of fear wash over him. Hypnosis? Was he about to be brainwashed or something?

But before he could object, Justine had pulled out a pocket watch and begun swinging it in front of his eyes.

“Look into my eyes, Dan,” she said, her voice low and hypnotic. “Focus on the watch. Let all your cares and worries slip away. Just relax…”

Dan found himself unable to look away from the watch. His eyelids grew heavy. He felt his body growing limp and heavy.

“Relax, Dan,” whispered Justine. “Let me take control…”

The next thing Dan knew, he was in a different state of consciousness. He couldn’t move or speak, but he was aware of everything that was happening around him.

Justine and the two women were talking about him, discussing how they could make him into a more compliant employee. They talked about how they could alter his behavior, his thoughts, his desires. It was like they were planning to reprogram him.

Dan wanted to scream, to fight back, but he was powerless. He could only sit there, paralyzed and helpless.

Finally, Justine snapped her fingers and he was back to normal. He blinked, disoriented, and looked around the room.

“Are you feeling okay, Dan?” asked Justine, patting his arm.

He nodded slowly, feeling numb and dazed.

“Good,” said Justine. “I think we’ve made some real progress today. I’ll see you at work tomorrow.”

Dan stumbled out of the office, still in shock. What had just happened to him? And why did he feel like he was under Justine’s control now?

He knew one thing for certain: he would never be the same again.

conversation.content:
(Dan’s boss Justine knows she is able to hypnotize him) The office manager Justine seemed to openly prefer the women in the office. One sweaty, humid day in July she called Dan in for a meeting. When he entered Justine’s office, not only Justine, but two of his other female colleagues with whom he didn’t get on were in there also. 
“You’re probably wondering what this is about, Dan,” said Justine, taking off her glasses.

Dan shifted in his chair nervously, unsure of what to expect. 

“I wanted to talk to you about your performance,” she continued, giving him a stern look. “It seems that you’ve been slacking off lately and not producing the results we expect from you.”

Dan felt a knot form in his stomach. He had been working hard, or so he thought. Justine’s criticism felt unfair and unprovoked.

“As you know, we value productivity and efficiency in this company,” she continued, her tone becoming more insistent. “And we can’t tolerate any deviation from that standard.”

Dan began to sweat. He knew he had to defend himself, but he felt too intimidated to speak up.

Suddenly, Justine leaned forward. “But I think I know how we can address this issue.”

Dan looked up at her, feeling slightly hopeful. Maybe there was a way he could salvage his reputation and prove his worth.

“Have you ever heard of hypnosis, Dan?” Justine asked.

Dan’s eyes widened in surprise. Hypnosis? Was she serious?

“I happen to be a trained hypnotherapist,” Justine continued, her voice calm and measured. “And I think I can help you to achieve your full potential.”

Dan stared at her in disbelief. He couldn’t believe what he was hearing. Was Justine really suggesting that she could hypnotize him?

Before he could say anything, one of Dan’s colleagues spoke up. “I’ve tried it before,” she said, her voice low. “It really works. You feel so much more focused and motivated afterwards.”

Dan felt a sense of unease wash over him. This all felt so strange and unsettling. Was he really willing to let Justine hypnotize him?

As he pondered this, Justine smiled at him reassuringly. “I promise you, Dan,” she said. “This will be the best thing you’ve ever done for your career.”

And with that, Dan felt himself begin to slip into a trance, his mind slowly succumbing to Justine’s hypnotic suggestions.

As he drifted off, he wondered what was in store for him now that he was under Justine’s control. Would he ever be able to break free from her spell?

conversation.content:
(Unknown to him, Dan’s boss Justine is able to hypnotize him with ease) The office manager in Dan’s department, Justine, openly preferred the women in the office, which seemed unfair to Dan. One warm, humid afternoon in July, when all the women were wearing sandals in the office, Justine called Dan into her office. When he entered, not only Justine, but also Jacqui, with whom he did not get on well at all, was in there.
Justine took off her glasses. “I suppose you’re wondering what this is about.”

Dan hesitated, feeling uneasy with the fact that Jacqui was in the room. "Yes, Justine, what's going on?"

Justine leaned back in her chair, her eyes locked on Dan's. "Well, it has come to my attention that you've been feeling a bit... left out in the department. Is that correct?"

Dan shifted uncomfortably in his seat. "I wouldn't say left out, but I feel like the atmosphere could be more inclusive."

"Oh, I see," Justine replied, her voice dripping with condescension. As Dan watched her speak, he could have sworn he saw a slight twinkle in her eye, but he shook the thought off as his imagination. "And do you think this is because I prefer working with the women in the department?"

"Well, that's certainly a factor, but overall I think there's just a general lack of team spirit and camaraderie," Dan said, trying to remain diplomatic.

Justine and Jacqui exchanged a brief glance, as if sharing some private joke. "Dan, I understand where you're coming from," Justine said, her voice softening dangerously. "And I'm going to help you feel more at peace with your place in our department. Just listen to my voice."

Dan's instincts screamed at him to get up and leave the room, but before he knew it, he was unable to tear his gaze away from Justine's intense stare. His body felt heavy, and his mind foggy. It was as if a thick, syrupy haze had descended over his brain, making it impossible to think clearly or even retain a thought for more than a few seconds.

"Justine, what's... what's happening?" Dan managed, his voice sounding weak and distant, as if it belonged to someone else.

She leaned in closer, her eyes never leaving his. "You're feeling sleepy, Dan. So very sleepy. And the more you fight it, the deeper into this trance you'll go. That's it, let go. Embrace it."

Dan wanted to argue, to fight back, but the weight of Justine's will crushed his resistance. As a new wave of drowsiness washed over him, Jacqui's mocking laughter in the background faded away, replaced by a blissful emptiness that robbed him of his strength, his will, and his identity.

In that moment, Dan knew only one thing – he was powerless to resist Justine, and he would do whatever she wanted. After all, her eyes were so captivating, and her voice so soothing. It was so much easier to just listen and obey.

And so, Dan's office life became something out of a nightmare – a mental prison where Justine held the keys. But with each day that passed, he found himself more and more willing to accept his new reality, to bow to the whims of the woman who controlled him so completely.

He wasn't even aware that he was doing it – but deep down, a part of him enjoyed the strange new dynamic, the release from responsibility, the exhilaration of complete submission.

And as the months wore on, the women in the office couldn't help but notice the change in Dan – the way he bent over backwards to accommodate their needs, the adoration in his eyes as he looked at Justine. They knew he was different now, and some part of them relished the thought that they, too, had a hand in his transformation. It was their little secret, the unspoken bond that united them all in ways they could never have imagined.
A typical summer day in the office, now.

On a typical summer day in the office, the sun streamed through the tall windows, casting a warm, golden glow throughout the room. The hum of the air conditioning system filled the air with a comforting white noise, combating the humid air outside. The faint scent of a floral air freshener drifted throughout the office, adding an extra touch of brightness to the atmosphere.

Dan arrived at work right on time, carrying a box of donuts for his co-workers with a bright, eager smile. Greeted by the familiar faces of his female colleagues, he set the box down on the break room table, proud to be of service in any way he could.

As everyone sat down at their desks, the office buzzed with activity. Phones rang with customer inquiries, keyboards clacked as reports were typed up, and printers whirred with the sound of emails being printed out for review. The vibe was productive yet relaxed, as everyone blended into the rhythm of the workday.

During lunch, Dan often found himself assisting his colleagues with various tasks – getting drinks for them from the vending machine, helping to set up an impromptu meeting space or topping up printer papers. He reveled in this newfound appreciation for the seemingly mundane aspects of office life, knowing deep down that his actions brought him closer to Justine.

Justine, of course, continued to hold sway over Dan with her uncanny ability to hypnotize him. The more Dan helped his colleagues, the more favorably they looked upon Justine's leadership. The days blended seamlessly into one another, leaving Dan in a state of content servitude.

Among these female colleagues, conversations were professional yet punctuated with light-hearted banter. Justine’s hypnotic power over Dan had become a common knowledge among all the women in the office, but it was discussed with a wink and a nod, another shared secret that fostered a sense of sisterhood among them.

As the day drew to a close, Dan found himself tidying up the office space, organizing supplies, and checking in with his colleagues one final time before everyone packed up to leave. There was a sense of satisfaction in the way he carried himself, knowing that he had been of use to the women in his department.

The sun dipped lower in the sky as Dan locked up the office for the night, stepping out into the warm evening air. He felt a sense of purpose and happiness as he made his way home, having a deep admiration for Justine and the unity of the office.

Though his life had changed beyond recognition since that fateful summer day in Justine's office, Dan found solace in the acceptance of his role in this new world – a place where his desires and ambitions were molded by the hypnotic gaze of a woman he could never defy.

“We wanted to discuss your productivity levels,” Jacqui spoke up, a smug smile on her face. “It seems like you’ve been slacking off lately.”

Justine’s voice was soothing, almost hypnotic. “But we’re not here to criticize you, Dan. We believe in positive reinforcement. In fact, I have a little exercise that might help you improve your focus and motivation.”

Dan couldn’t explain why, but he felt his body relaxing and his mind growing blank. He felt vulnerable, but at the same time, eager to please.

“Just close your eyes and breathe deeply,” Justine instructed him. “Focus on my voice, let it guide you. You’re doing great, Dan, just let go.”

Dan felt himself sinking into a trance-like state. He could hear a faint humming in his ears, as if Justine’s voice was resonating within his skull. He felt like he was floating, weightless and calm.

“That’s it, Dan,” Justine continued. “Now, repeat after me. ‘I am a hard-working, dedicated employee. I take pride in my job. I want to impress my bosses.’”

Dan’s lips moved automatically, parroting her words. He couldn’t resist the urge to please them, to prove himself worthy.

Jacqui snickered. “This is hilarious. He’s like a puppet on a string.”

“Quiet, Jacqui,” Justine scolded her. “Don’t ruin our experiment.”

“Experiment?” Dan repeated, his voice slurred. “What experiment?”

“Nothing to worry about, Dan,” Justine said smoothly. “Just a little test of your suggestibility. You see, I have a gift for hypnosis. With my voice alone, I can make you do anything I want. Isn’t that fascinating?”

Dan’s eyes widened in horror. He could feel his mind being invaded, his will being subverted. He tried to resist, to break free, but he was too weak.

Justine smiled triumphantly. “Now, Dan, when I snap my fingers, you will wake up feeling refreshed and eager to get back to work. You will forget everything that happened here, except for the fact that you had a positive meeting with your managers. Understand?”

Dan nodded, his eyes glazed over. He felt a burst of energy pulsing through his veins, erasing his memories and restoring his confidence.

Justine snapped her fingers.

Dan blinked, feeling disoriented. He looked around, seeing Justine and Jacqui gazing at him expectantly.

“So, Dan, how do you feel?” Justine asked.

Dan smiled, feeling a surge of enthusiasm. “I feel great, Justine. Thank you for your support.”

Justine chuckled. “Excellent. You’re going to be a star, Dan. Just keep up the good work.”

Dan left the office, feeling like he had just emerged from a dream. He couldn’t remember what had happened in there, but he knew he had been manipulated. He felt violated, but at the same time, grateful for the boost of confidence. He knew he had to be careful around Justine and Jacqui from now on, but he couldn’t shake off the feeling that he had just witnessed a strange, mesmerizing power. A power that he could neither comprehend nor resist.

conversation.content:
(Unknown to him, Dan’s boss Justine is able to hypnotize him with ease using her voice) One warm, humid afternoon in July, when all the women were wearing sandals in the office, his manager Justine called Dan into her office for a chat. When he entered, not only Justine, but also Jacqui, with whom he did not get on well at all, was in there. (they have ulterior motives)
Justine took off her glasses. “I suppose you’re wondering what this is about.”

Dan nodded, feeling a bit nervous. He noticed both Justine and Jacqui wearing sandals, their perfectly manicured feet on display. He couldn't shake the feeling that something odd was happening.

"Yes, I admit I'm curious," Dan replied, managing a smile.

Justine leaned back in her chair, her fingers tapping rhythmically on the desk. As she spoke, Dan couldn't help but notice something alluring and hypnotic about her voice.

"Well, Dan, it's about your performance here at the office. You see, we think you have potential, but we need to make a few...adjustments in your attitude and behavior."

Jacqui smirked, crossing her legs and swinging her foot gently, drawing Dan's attention to her sandaled feet. He couldn't explain why, but he felt compelled to listen to Justine's words even more closely.

"We believe that with a little...guidance and motivation, you can become an ideal employee. For example, we would like your relationships with your coworkers to be more amiable, wouldn't you agree, Jacqui?"

Jacqui nodded, her eyes meeting Dan's for a moment with an unnerving intensity. "Absolutely. We all need to work together and support each other."

Dan shifted in his seat, feeling a strange sense of compliance wash over him. He didn't understand why he suddenly felt so eager to agree with Justine and Jacqui.

"Yes, I agree. I'll do my best to improve my relationships with everyone here," Dan said, nodding his head slowly, feeling a bit drowsy.

Justine smiled, her voice gentle but firm. "Good. Now, I want you to listen carefully to my words, Dan. From now on, you will become a model employee, dedicated to your work and cooperating with your coworkers. In addition, you will treat Jacqui with respect and be eager to cooperate with her on any projects. Do you understand?"

Dan felt his mind foggy, but he couldn't help but agree. "Yes, I understand."

With that, Justine glanced at Jacqui, and the two women shared a knowing smile.

"Excellent, Dan. You're going to do great things here. Now, you may go back to work, but remember what we've discussed today."

As Dan left the office, feeling strangely refreshed and motivated, he didn't realize just how easily he had been hypnotized and manipulated. His relationship with his coworkers, especially Jacqui, would never be the same. And Justine knew she now had Dan under her control, ready to mold him into the perfect employee for their plans.
That afternoon, Jacqui smugly tests her power over Dan.

As they worked on a project in the conference room together, Jacqui watched Dan closely, eager to see the effects of Justine's hypnotic influence. She subtly started to exert her authority, slowly testing her newfound power over him.

"Dan, could you please fetch me the relevant financial reports from last quarter?" Jacqui asked, with an air of superiority in her voice.

Without hesitation, Dan nodded and quickly left the room to retrieve the documents for her. Jacqui reveled in her newly gained control, smirking to herself as she noticed how obedient Dan had become. He returned shortly after, handling her the requested files with a friendly smile.

"Thank you, Dan," Jacqui said, exaggerating her satisfaction.

As the day went on, Jacqui continued to issue requests to Dan – some reasonable, others slightly unreasonable – but Dan never hesitated to comply. He even offered to stay late to help her finish the project, something he would never have done in the past.

By the time they were about to leave the office, Jacqui couldn't resist one final test. "Dan, I have one last favor to ask," she said in a sweet voice. "Could you perhaps massage my feet? They're really sore after standing for so long today."

Dan hesitated for a moment, feeling a pang of resistance deep down. However, Jacqui's powerful gaze, combined with the lingering influence of Justine's voice in his mind, made it impossible for him to refuse. He reluctantly agreed, gently massaging Jacqui's feet as she smugly relaxed in her chair.

As the day finally came to an end, Jacqui knew that Dan's transformation was complete. She couldn't wait to report their success back to Justine, and to dream up new tasks for Dan in the future. No longer having to worry about conflicts with him, she was ready to fully enjoy her newfound power in the office.
describe this foot massage scene from Dan's pov, with details of Jacqui's expression and descriptions of her feet

As Dan knelt down in front of Jacqui, he couldn't shake the uneasy feeling residing deep within him. He knew that he was under the influence of Justine's powerful words, yet he felt compelled to continue with his task. He stared at Jacqui's feet, encased in the stylish sandals she'd worn all day. Her slender toes were perfectly manicured, painted a soft pink color that seemed to contrast with her domineering demeanor.

Taking a deep breath, he slowly removed her sandals, revealing the delicate arches of her feet. The warmth from wearing the sandals all day radiated against his hands, and he could smell a faint whiff of the fragrance Jacqui had used on her feet that morning, a mix of floral and fruity notes.

He glanced up at Jacqui's face, seeing a mix of smug satisfaction and anticipation in her expression. Her eyes were locked onto him, and there was a slight upturn at the corners of her mouth, as though she was amused by the situation. Dan felt a mixture of embarrassment and curiosity; while part of him wanted to rebel against this forced act of submission, another part was intrigued by the newfound dynamic that had been thrust upon them.

Doing his best to push aside his reservations, Dan began to gently massage Jacqui's feet, starting with her delicate toes. He carefully pressed and rubbed each one, receiving a nod of approval from Jacqui as her eyes remained locked on him. Next, he gently massaged the balls of her feet, then worked his way to her arches and heels, applying firm but careful pressure.

Jacqui's expression shifted slightly, a look of genuine contentment replacing her earlier smug demeanor. She leaned back in her chair, closing her eyes for a moment, and allowing herself to enjoy the sensation of Dan's massage. Despite his reluctance, Dan took this as a small victory, hoping that his compliance would help him understand and eventually break free from the hypnotic influence that had taken over him.

As the minutes passed, Dan continued to knead Jacqui's feet, working out the tension from her long day. Both his confusion and determination continued to grow, as he silently vowed to himself that he would find a way to regain control of his own actions and thoughts. No matter how strong Jacqui's and Justine's influence was over him, he knew that he couldn't allow them to dominate him forever.

conversation.content:
Sharon has hypnotized her work colleague Dan a few times now. The first time was literally an accident, but once Sharon realized what she’d done, she gave Dan suggestions that he liked being hypnotized and that he’d get easier and easier to put under.
One lunchtime in the break room, with a few colleagues sitting around eating, Sharon had an idea. She glanced over at Dan, who was mid-sandwich. “Hey, Dan. Mind if I show everyone something?”

Dan looked up, his eyes already starting to glaze over as Sharon’s words worked their way into his subconscious. “Sure, Sharon. Whatever you want.”

Sharon turned to the others, grinning mischievously. “Watch this,” she said, and began to snap her fingers. “Dan, you’re feeling very sleepy. Very, very sleepy…”

Dan’s eyes drooped, his sandwich slipping from his hand as he slumped back in his chair. Sharon continued to snap her fingers, her voice dropping to a low, soothing tone as she began to implant suggestions.

“Now, Dan, you’re going to feel an overwhelming urge to quack like a duck every time I snap my fingers. And the more you quack, the deeper and deeper you’ll go under my control…”

The other colleagues watched in amazement as Dan suddenly let out a loud, “QUACK!”, his arms flapping like wings as he began to strut around the room, quacking at regular intervals as Sharon snapped her fingers.

They couldn’t believe what they were seeing - but at the same time, they were fascinated. When Sharon finally snapped her fingers again and Dan snapped out of his trance, everyone was clamoring for her to do it again. And again. And again.

It became a regular Friday lunchtime tradition in the office - “Dan, the quacking hypnotized duck”, as he came to be known. And Sharon loved every minute of it, relishing the power she held over her colleagues and the thrall in which she held Dan.

But little did she know that her actions were about to have consequences…

David works at Stella’s cafe. Stella has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. What he doesn't know is that Stella can now snap him back into a submissive trance whenever she wants. One summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Victoria (straight black hair, sandals), popped in to say hello and get a cold drink. When she realizes the two are friends, Stella decides she will give Victoria an amusing demonstration and casually joins their conversation. 
"I see you two know each other."

Stella says with a smile as she approaches the table. David looks up and greets Victoria, but his eyes quickly dim down as Stella places her hand on his shoulder and locks eyes with him.

"David, why don't you go clean the dishes in the back for a moment?" Stella says in a soft tone as she snaps her fingers. David instantly gets up, almost robotically, and heads to the back.

Victoria looks at Stella with confusion. "Did...did you just hypnotize him?"

Stella giggles. "Oh, David and I have been practicing hypnosis for a while now. He's quite suggestible."

Victoria is still unsure about the whole situation but decides to humor Stella. "Can you make him do anything?"

Stella grins mischievously. "Would you like to see?"

Victoria nods, and Stella snaps her fingers again. This time, David walks back out holding a broom.

"David, I want you to do a dance for us. A silly, entertaining dance," Stella says as she claps her hands. David starts to awkwardly dance, almost like a robot or a child.

Victoria couldn't help but chuckle at the sight. "That's crazy. How do you do it?"

"It takes practice," Stella says with a shrug. "But David trusts me completely, and I would never do anything to harm him. He's in good hands."

David eventually snaps out of the trance and is unaware of what just happened. But Victoria can't help but feel a little uneasy about the whole situation and decides to leave shortly after.

conversation.content:
David works at Sandra’s cafe. Sandra (mid-fifties, glasses) has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t even know he’s ever been hypnotized at all.

One hot summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Victoria (straight black hair, sandals, red toenails), popped in to say hello and get a cold drink. When she realizes the two are friends, Sandra thinks it might amuse Victoria to see her friend become a hypnotized slave for a little while, and she comes over to join their conversation.

“You two know each other?” she smiles.

David nods, “Yeah, we went to college together.”

Sandra turns to David, “David, I want you to do something for me. I want you to stand up and do a little dance.”

David looks at Sandra, confused. He doesn’t know why she would want him to do that, but he gets up and starts to dance, his arms flailing around clumsily.

Victoria laughs, “Oh my god, what’s gotten into you?”

Sandra grins, “Just a little hypnotic suggestion.”

David looks surprised, “What? What do you mean?”

Sandra leans in, “I’ve been hypnotizing you, David. You don’t remember it, but I’ve been doing it for months.”

David looks at her, shocked. “What have you been making me do?”

Sandra shrugs, “Just a few little things here and there. Nothing harmful.”

David stares at her, not sure what to say. He feels violated and betrayed, but at the same time, he can’t remember anything she’s done to him.

Victoria stands up, “David, let’s go. We’re leaving.”

David nods and follows her out of the cafe. He doesn’t look back at Sandra, but he can feel her eyes on him as they go.

Jenny thanks him and David turns to go prepare her drink at the counter. Sandra takes this opportunity to quickly whisper a hypnotic suggestion to David. “When you turn back around, you will feel very dizzy and need to sit down.”

David finishes preparing Jenny’s drink and turns around, but as soon as he takes a step towards the table, he stumbles and wobbles until he falls back into a chair.

“Oh my god, David, are you okay?” Jenny asks, alarmed.

Sandra quickly steps in, “Don’t worry, he’s just feeling a bit dizzy. David, can you stand up?” She gently helps him to his feet and leads him towards the back of the cafe where she has a private room.

Once they’re alone, Sandra whispers another suggestion, “You will forget everything that just happened, except that you felt a sudden bout of dizziness and had to sit down.”

David blinks and looks around. “Why am I here?”

Sandra smiles reassuringly, “You had a little dizzy spell, so I brought you back here to rest. Are you feeling better now?”

David nods slowly, still feeling shaky. “Yeah, I think so.”

Sandra leads him back out to the main cafe area where Jenny is nervously waiting. “David, are you sure you’re okay?” she asks him.

David reassures her, “Yeah, yeah, I’m fine. Sorry about that.”

Jenny nods, still looking worried. “Well, maybe you need to take a break and sit down for a bit.”

David agrees, and Sandra allows him to sit and rest until he feels better.

As Jenny leaves the cafe, Sandra spies her black-painted toenails and gets an idea. She quickly whispers another hypnotic suggestion to David before he leaves for his break.

“When you see Jenny’s black toenails, you will feel a sudden urge to take off your shoes and sniff them.”

Jenny is understandably horrified when David suddenly pulls off his shoes and starts sniffing her feet, and she quickly leaves the cafe in disgust.

Sandra chuckles to herself, pleased at how easily her hypnotic suggestions had worked. She knew David wouldn’t remember any of it, and that he’d be back to his normal self once she snapped her fingers and released him from the trance.

But little did she know, Jenny had already called the police and reported the strange incident at the cafe. Sandra’s days of hypnotizing and manipulating David were numbered.

And just like that, Kelly snaps her fingers and David’s eyes glaze over. He sways a little and sits down heavily on the grass.

Kelly bites her lip in excitement. This is incredible. She’s hypnotized David, and he’s unbelievably suggestible.

“David, stand up,” she commands.

Without hesitation, David rises to his feet.

“Now, I want you to do a little dance for me.”

David begins to wiggle his hips in a wildly exaggerated way, grinning like an idiot. Kelly giggles, immensely pleased with herself.

“And now, David,” she says, “I want you to remember something. From now on, whenever you see me, you will start to feel more and more relaxed, all over again, just like before.”

David nods obediently.

“And now, when I snap my fingers, you’re going to wake up. But you won’t remember any of this.”

David scratches his head. “Weird. I feel a bit funny.”

“That’s just the sun,” Kelly assures him. “Let’s get some lunch.”

As they walk back to the house, Kelly can’t believe what she’s just accomplished. She’s successfully hypnotized David, and he has no idea what just happened. The possibilities are endless. She can’t wait to try this out again.

It was the end of a long day’s shooting for the new documentary on women’s rights and Kirsty was just about ready for a gin and tonic. They headed back to the hotel in a Volvo, the Scottish drizzle falling steadily around them.

As they entered the hotel lobby, Kirsty spotted a young man, probably in his early twenties, standing by the bar. Her interest was immediately piqued.

As the group made their way to their rooms, Kirsty hung back and watched from a distance as the young man ordered a drink. She could feel her heart beating faster and a wave of excitement wash over her. It had been a while since she had indulged in her little secret, and she was eager to feel the rush once again.

With a subtle flick of her wrist, Kirsty made contact with the young man’s mind, planting suggestions for him to approach her. It was a simple enough trick, one she had picked up years ago in her early days as a presenter. As the young man turned in her direction, Kirsty licked her lips and moved towards him, giving him her best smile.

“Hello there, young man,” she purred, leaning in slightly. “Would you care to buy a lady a drink?”

The young man seemed hesitant at first, but Kirsty persisted, batting her eyelashes and touching his arm ever so gently. Before long, he was putty in her hands, agreeing to buy her a gin and tonic.

Over the course of the evening, Kirsty used her hypnotism techniques to ensnare the young man, luring him back to her room with promises of a foot rub. He was putty in her hands, eagerly massaging her feet as she sat back and enjoyed the attention.

As the night wore on, Kirsty felt a sense of satisfaction wash over her. She knew that what she was doing was wrong, but the rush of power and control she felt was too intoxicating to resist. And so, as the young man slept by her side, Kirsty allowed herself a smile of contentment, knowing that her secret was safe for another day.

conversation.content:
(Dan’s boss Justine knows she is able to hypnotize him without him even knowing it had happened) The office manager Justine seemed to openly prefer the women in the office. One sweaty, humid day in July she called Dan in for a meeting. When he entered Justine’s office, not only Justine, but two of his other female colleagues with whom he didn’t get on were in there also.
“You’re probably wondering what this is about, Dan,” said Justine, taking off her glasses.

“Yes, I am,” replied Dan, slightly nervous about the unexpected meeting.

“We’ve noticed that you’ve been slacking off on your work lately,” said Justine, frowning. “Your colleagues have brought it to my attention.”

Dan felt a surge of irritation towards his colleagues. He didn’t think he was slacking off at all. In fact, he had been working harder than ever before.

“I’m sorry if I’ve given that impression,” he said, trying to defend himself.

“It’s not just that,” said Justine. “We’re also concerned about your behavior.”

Dan felt a chill run down his spine. He had no idea what she was talking about.

“What do you mean?” he asked.

“We’ve noticed that you’ve been ignoring your female colleagues,” said Justine. “You don’t talk to them as much as you used to, and you seem distant. Is everything okay?”

Dan was taken aback. He hadn’t realized his behavior towards his female colleagues had changed. He had been so caught up in his work that he hadn’t paid much attention to them.

“I’m sorry,” he said, feeling embarrassed. “I didn’t realize I was doing that. I’ll make sure to be more friendly from now on.”

“That’s good to hear,” said Justine, smiling. “In fact, I have a little exercise that could help you with that.”

Before Dan knew it, he was staring into Justine’s eyes, completely mesmerized. He didn’t know what was happening, but it felt like he was in a trance. Justine’s voice seemed to echo in his mind, telling him to be more friendly towards his female colleagues and to be more open with them.

The next thing Dan knew, he was back at his desk, feeling strangely energized. He didn’t know what had happened in Justine’s office, but he felt like a weight had been lifted off his shoulders.

Over the next few days, Dan found himself chatting more with his female colleagues and even going out for drinks with them after work. He couldn’t explain why, but he felt more comfortable around them than he ever had before.

It wasn’t until a few weeks later that he overheard his female colleagues whispering about Justine’s hypnotic powers. Dan felt a sense of betrayal. Had Justine really hypnotized him without his knowledge or consent?

He didn’t know what to do. Should he confront Justine about it? Should he report her to HR? He didn’t want to risk losing his job, but he also couldn’t ignore what had happened.

As the days went by, Dan found it harder and harder to concentrate at work. He couldn’t shake the feeling that he had been manipulated by Justine.

In the end, he decided to confront her. He waited until everyone else had left the office and then knocked on her door.

“Justine, we need to talk,” he said, staring her down.

Justine looked up at him, a faint smile on her lips.

“What’s on your mind, Dan?”

“I know what you did to me,” said Dan, his voice shaking with anger. “You hypnotized me without my consent, didn’t you?”

Justine leaned back in her chair, looking unfazed.

“And if I did?”

“It’s not right,” said Dan. “You can’t just go around manipulating people like that.”

Justine chuckled.

“You’re right, I can’t,” she said. “But you’d be surprised how easy it is to hypnotize someone who’s already susceptible.”

“What do you mean?” asked Dan, feeling a sense of dread in the pit of his stomach.

“Let’s just say I’ve been doing some research,” said Justine, tapping her finger on the desk. “Some people are more suggestible than others, and you, my dear Dan, are one of the most suggestible people I’ve ever met.”

Dan felt his blood run cold. He stood there, rooted to the spot, as Justine continued to talk about the power of suggestion and hypnosis.

In the end, Dan quit his job and never looked back. He didn’t want to be around someone who could manipulate him so easily. He also didn’t want to be caught up in any illegal or unethical practices.

Years later, he heard that Justine had been fired for similar misconduct, but he never spoke to her again. He had learned his lesson the hard way: always be wary of those who have the power to hypnotize.
