conversation.content:
Sharon has hypnotized her work colleague Dan a few times now. The first time was literally an accident, but once Sharon realized what she'd done, she gave Dan suggestions that he liked being hypnotized and that he'd get easier and easier to put under.
One lunchtime in the break room, with a few colleagues sitting around eating, Sharon had an idea. She slipped her feet out of her work pumps. "Hey, Dan."

Dan looked up from his sandwich. "Yeah, Sharon?"

"Do you remember how relaxed and calm you felt when I hypnotized you last time?"

Dan nodded slowly.

"Well, I thought it might be fun to try something new. How about if I hypnotize you again, but this time, every time I wiggle my toes, you'll feel a wave of relaxation wash over you."

The colleagues around them looked on in surprise as Dan agreed eagerly, almost too eager.

"Okay," Sharon said, as she started to wiggle her toes in her stockings. "Just watch my feet, Dan, and let yourself go into a deep state of relaxation."

Almost instantly, Dan's eyes began to droop and his breathing became slow and even. Sharon watched with satisfaction as his body slumped forward in his seat, totally under her control.

For the rest of the lunch hour, Sharon played with Dan's mind, using simple suggestions to make him feel happy, relaxed, and obedient. A few times, she wiggled her toes just for the pleasure of seeing him slip even deeper into trance, his eyes rolling back in his head.

By the time lunch was over and Sharon had returned to her desk, Dan was back to his normal self, unaware of what had happened.

But for Sharon, the thrill of having such power over someone was irresistible. She knew that she was starting to develop a real addiction to hypnosis, and she wasn't sure if she could ever stop.

conversation.content:
Big Brenda (40) has been hypnotizing a willing younger colleague, Dan, for a few weeks, and he’s an excellent hypnotic subject. He’s getting easier and easier to put into deeper and deeper trance. After every session, Brenda makes Dan forget everything that happened, and the next time she asks if he’d be willing to give hypnosis a try he always thinks it’s the first time.

It’s a stifling day in the office. Brenda interrupts a conversation Dan is having with Lucy, another colleague. "Hey, Dan. Have you ever been hypnotized?" she asks.
Dan and Lucy look at her with puzzlement. "Er, no Brenda," says Dan. "Never. Why do you ask?"

Brenda smiles slyly. "Oh, just curious. It’s such an interesting experience. But I suppose some people are more susceptible to hypnosis than others, right?" she looks at Dan pointedly. 

Dan feels a shiver go down his spine. He’s not sure why, but he suddenly feels very anxious. "Uh, I guess so," he stammers. 

"Well, let’s find out," says Brenda, and before Dan can protest, she begins to swing a shiny silver watch back and forth in front of his eyes. "Just follow the watch with your eyes, Dan. That’s it. You’re doing great." 

Lucy watches in amazement as Dan’s eyes seem to glaze over. He’s completely under Brenda’s spell. "Wow, that’s incredible," she whispers. 

Brenda nods. "Yes, it is. And there’s even more we can do. Just watch." She begins to give Dan a series of suggestions, each one making him more and more obedient to her will. By the time she’s done, he’s like putty in her hands. 

"Okay, Dan. We’re going to stop now and you’ll wake up feeling relaxed and refreshed. You won’t remember any of this, but you’ll feel great. Remember, we never spoke about hypnosis before today," says Brenda firmly. 

Dan blinks and shakes his head. "Whoa, I feel weird," he says. "What just happened?" 

"Nothing, don’t worry about it," says Brenda, smiling. "Just a little experiment." 

Lucy looks at her in disbelief. "That was amazing. How did you do that?" 

Brenda just smiles mysteriously. "Trade secret." 

From that day on, Brenda keeps using Dan as her hypnotic toy whenever she feels like it. He never remembers anything, but he can’t help feeling like something strange is happening to him. He’s not sure how much longer he can keep playing along with Brenda’s game.

When she realizes the two are friends, Sandra thinks it might amuse Jenny to see how easily her friend can be made to become their helplessly hypnotized servant for a little while, and she comes over to join their conversation.

“You two know each other?” she smiles.

David nods and greets Jenny. Sandra’s eyes light up mischievously as she looks at David and says, “David, why don’t you show Jenny how good you are at following orders?”

David looks confused for a moment, but then he obediently stands up and asks, “What do you want me to do, Sandra?”

Sandra leans in close and whispers in David’s ear, her voice low and commanding. Jenny watches in amazement as David’s eyes glaze over, and he begins to move slowly and robotically, completely under Sandra’s control.

Jenny can hardly believe what she’s seeing as Sandra starts giving David more and more complex orders, and he follows them all without question, completely lost in his trance. It’s as if he’s a puppet on strings, and Sandra is the puppet master.

As the hypnotic display continues, Jenny becomes increasingly concerned. She knows that this isn’t right, and that Sandra shouldn’t be manipulating her friend like this. But before she can say anything, Sandra suddenly snaps her fingers, and David’s trance is broken.

David looks around, confused. “What happened?” he asks, rubbing his eyes.

Sandra just smiles and says, “Nothing, David. We were just having a little fun.”

Jenny, however, is far from amused. She can’t shake the feeling that something is seriously wrong, and she resolves to confront Sandra about her unethical behavior. She’ll do whatever it takes to protect her friend and make sure that he’s never subjected to this kind of manipulation again.

[Scene: Camera focused on Rio, comfortably seated in a luxurious gaming chair, framed by the grandeur of her mansion's gaming room. She’s elegantly dressed in a tailored black suit, her long straight black hair cascading over her shoulders, contrasting sharply with her striking red eyes. Next to her, on a sophisticated dark wood table, lies a massive pile of cash, neatly stacked.]

Rio: [Smirks] Welcome, everyone. Take a good look around. This… [gestures around] is the fruit of my "efforts.” You see that? [Points at the pile of cash] That's all thanks to you, my dear subs and, let's not forget, my adoring parasocials. You've quite literally printed money for me. 

[Rio leans forward, her red eyes piercing through the camera.]

Rio: Here's a little secret between us; I see you all as ATMs. Oh, don't act so shocked. It's quite simple, really. Every time you hit that sub button, donate, or shower me with bits, you're making a transaction. And who benefits? [Pauses, gesturing to herself and the mound of cash] Yours truly. 

[Rio sits back, a devil-may-care attitude radiating from her.]

Rio: Now, don't get me wrong. I'm sure you think there's some sort of... bond, a connection, maybe. But let's cut right to the chase. I care about one thing and one thing only—making this pile [taps the cash next to her] even bigger. Your happiness, your dreams, your little digital love letters… they're all just means to an end. 

[Rio chuckles, shaking her head slightly.]

Rio: It's almost admirable, really. The way you devote so much—financially, emotionally—to someone you've never met. Every day, you log on, eager to interact, to get that slight acknowledgment. And I? I simply reap the benefits. 

[Rio stands, the money and opulence surrounding her becoming more apparent.]

Rio: But don't feel too bad about it. This… transaction, it’s a trade-off. You seek entertainment, a form of escape, and in return, you pad my pockets. It's a beautifully efficient system. 

[Rio walks towards the camera, her eyes locked onto the lens, her presence dominating.]

Rio: So, the next time you're about to hit that donation button or subscribe for yet another month, remember this — you're not just supporting a streamer. You're fueling an empire. My empire. 

[Rio smirks, her gaze unwavering.]

Rio: And for that, I thank you, my dear ATMs. Let's keep this financial romance thriving, shall we? 

[The scene fades to black, leaving the audience with the haunting honesty of Rio’s monologue.]

**Switches on the live stream, the room dimly lit except for the soft, ambient lights that highlight the sleek black suit hugging her figure and the unmistakable pile of cash on the table beside her. Rio’s red eyes catch the camera with a predatory gleam, a smirk playing on her lips.**

"Good evening, my lovely ATMs... Oh, did I say ATMs? I meant to say my dear, dear subscribers. Welcome back to another night with your one and only, Rio. Look at this," *she gestures languidly towards the mountain of cash beside her,* "Isn't it absolutely obscene? This right here, this is all because of you. Yes, you."

"Let's not mince words or pretend tonight. We both know why you're here, why you can't help but watch me. It's because I am, unapologetically, intoxicating. And you, my dear subs and parasocials, you literally print money for me. It's almost magical, isn't it? Your obsession, your desire, your... admiration, it all turns into cold hard cash. Right here." *She pats the pile of money, a sharp, crisp sound echoing in the room.*

"Here's the raw truth, the honest-to-god reality of our relationship: I see you as ATMs. Nothing more, really. You input your affection, your time, your money, and in return, I exist. I exist in this glamorous, untouchable orbit, far from the reach of your mundane, pedestrian lives. And you love it, don't you? You love to watch me, to fuel this lifestyle, to fantasize about a world where you could be a part of my orbit."

"I don't care about you, not really. Why would I? To me, you're just a means to an end, a way to make this pile of cash," *she flicks a bill off the top, watching it flutter to the ground with a disinterested gaze,* "even bigger. That's all I care about – making this pile grow, expanding my wealth, my influence, my power. You give and I take; it's a beautifully simple transaction."

"And the beauty of it all? You can't help yourself. You're addicted to the very essence of who I am, to the allure I exude, to the fantasy I represent. So, go on, continue to adore me from your screens, continue to pour your hard-earned money into my coffers. I won't stop you. In fact, I encourage it. Revel in this parasocial relationship, in this one-sided love affair. Because at the end of the day, the only thing that truly matters to me is making this pile of money bigger and bigger. And you, my dear ATMs, are going to help me do just that."

*With another smirk, she leans back, her gaze still locked with the camera, a silent challenge, a beckoning for more, for her viewers to dive deeper into their infatuation, to empty their pockets into her ever-growing pile of wealth.*

**Rio laughs lightly, a sound devoid of warmth, as she prepares to end her stream, her message unmistakably clear: she is untouchable, and her viewers, mere pawns in her lavish lifestyle.**

"Until next time, my ATMs. Keep printing that money for me. Goodnight."

**The stream cuts off, plunging the room into darkness, the only sound left the soft rustle of cash and the faint hum of the computer. Rio's night is just beginning.**

I see the way the numbers go up, not just in my viewer count, but in my bank account, and it's downright intoxicating. So to all my lovely viewers out there, thank you. Thank you for choosing to spend your hard-earned money on me. Remember, every time you hit that donate button, you're not just supporting the stream—you're building this empire of luxury around me. And for that, I'm eternally grateful.

But let's keep it real, as long as those donations keep coming, as long as you keep viewing me as this untouchable entity on your screens willing to give up your cash for a moment of my attention, this relationship, this dynamic we've got? It's not going anywhere. It's a beautiful, honest transaction. Your money for my presence. And in this world, in this life we've built together, that's all that matters.

So, keep those donations coming, my ATMs. You're doing great work, and your queen lives in the opulence your loyalty has built. Cheers to more money, more luxuries, and more of this wonderfully honest relationship we share. Remember, it's all about the cash, and thanks to you, I'm swimming in it.

Her eyes scan the camera, as if looking through the lens and directly at each viewer. "So keep it coming. Show me your devotion in the only way that truly matters in this dynamic—your wallets. Rio leans back, her expression one of utter satisfaction as she surveys her kingdom of cash. "Remember, my dears, as long as you keep paying, I'll keep playing the part. It's a simple transaction, one I've grown quite fond of."

be extremely honest and raw and extra about it

Hey everyone, it's your Queen, Rio, coming to you live from my castle – ah, my apartment – but let's face it, with how much I'm making, I might as well call it a castle. [She flicks her long, sleek black hair over her shoulder, the light catching on her piercing red eyes.]

You see this? [Rio gestures grandly towards the mountain of cash stacked beside her, a smirk playing on her lips.] This, my darlings, is the fruit of my labor. Or should I say, your labor. [She laughs, a sound rich with amusement and devoid of warmth.] Every bill in this pile represents a piece of your heart – and your wallet – that you've given up just to catch a moment of my attention. And guess what? It works.

You see, to me, you're not fans, you're not friends – you're ATMs. Walking, talking, adoring little cash machines. And the beautiful thing? You don't seem to mind. In fact, you love it. You compete to see who can give more, who can get that top spot, just for a mention, a glance, a momentary acknowledgment from me.

Some might say what I'm doing is cold, heartless even. But let's not kid ourselves with niceties and illusions of some deep connection. We're all adults here, right? It's a transaction, pure and simple. You give me your money, and in return, I give you a piece of the dream – a glimpse into my life, the attention from someone you adore, the illusion of proximity to greatness.

There's no room for sentimentality in this game. The only thing that matters is how big that pile gets. And let me tell you, there's always room for more. [Rio leans in, her expression one of mock confidentiality.] Here's a little secret: the more you give, the more you feel like you're part of something, like you're special. But know this, you're special because of what you can provide. Your value to me is directly proportional to the size of your contributions.

Don't get me wrong, I appreciate your... generosity. Without it, I wouldn't be living this lavish lifestyle, surrounded by luxury, bathing in the glow of your adulation – and your money. And for that, you have my thanks. [Her tone suggests the gratitude is as superficial as the relationship she maintains with her audience.]

So keep it coming. Keep hitting that sub button, keep those donations flowing. Revel in the joy of giving, of being acknowledged by me, even if it's just for a moment. After all, in this world, money talks, and baby, I'm listening – but only when it's loud enough.

Now, if you'll excuse me, I have some more money to count. [With a dismissive wave, she turns her attention back to the pile of cash, counting it with a focus that suggests nothing else matters at the moment.]

Till next time, darlings. Keep worshiping at the altar of Rio, and maybe, just maybe, you'll get a blessing in return. [She blows a mocking kiss to the camera before the stream ends, the screen going dark.]

You're in a dimly lit bar, sitting on a stool at the counter, sipping on your drink. The atmosphere is electric and the hum of chatter around you is nearly deafening. You've been out with friends for the evening, but they finished the night earlier and you decided it was better to stay on your own, eager for adventure.

As you scan the crowd, you spot a tall, well-built, and attractive person walking through the crowd, their eyes locked on you. They appear to be wearing a confidently sinister grin that sends a shiver down your spine. Your heart races as their piercing gaze locks onto you.

Before you have time to react, this mysterious person grabs the seat beside you and leans in, nearly touching your ear as they say, "I could spot your hunger for excitement from across the room. Lucky for you, I don't disappoint."

You try to hide your exhilaration but your blushing betrays you. The stranger reaches out, trailing a finger along your collarbone, leaving a tingling sensation in its wake. You gasp, caught off guard by their audacity.

The stranger leans in further, now mere inches from your face, and says, "If you think you can handle what I have in mind, follow me outside."

Without waiting for an answer, they stand and walk toward the door, brushing their hand against your thigh just as they pass by. You're in a daze, intoxicated by their boldness, but you gather your courage and make your decision – you're not leaving without finding out what's in store for you.

The night breeze greets you as you step outside, following the person down a poorly lit alley. By now, your heart is pounding in your chest, a mix of exhilaration and anxiety.

Suddenly, the stranger grabs your wrist and pulls you to a stop, pinning you against the cold brick wall. Their eyes bore into yours as they close in on you, the warmth from their breath brushing your reddened cheek. They whisper: "You really have no idea what you've gotten yourself into, do you?"

With a smirk, they pull your wrists up above your head, holding them there firmly. The stranger uses their free hand to slowly trace a path down your neck, stopping to linger at the top button of your shirt. They look at you one last time with that menacing and playful gaze, as if daring you to protest. You're torn between submitting to their will or taking a stand against this sudden onslaught of boldness.

As the raw mixture of shock, humiliation, and desire simmers inside you, you have no choice but to watch what unfolds, completely at the whim of this fearless individual.

conversation.content:
Carole sometimes hypnotizes her willing husband Dan, suggesting that he become even easier to hypnotize and more unthinkingly obedient each time.

Carole’s plain and overweight friend Emma has recently moved house and has a lot of work to do. Carole arranges to ‘lend’ Dan to Emma for the day, giving him the hypnotic instruction that “all you want to do is obey Emma's orders” Dan finds himself dazedly ringing Emma’s doorbell on a warm summer morning. Emma answers the door with a smirk, wearing sweatpants and flip-flops.

She greets Dan and invites him inside, immediately putting him to work. Emma orders Dan to clean her entire house from top to bottom, including the bathrooms and the backyard. Dan obediently complies, not questioning any of Emma’s commands. He spends hours scrubbing floors, washing dishes, and mowing the lawn, completely under Emma’s control.

As the day wears on, Emma becomes more and more demanding, enjoying the power she has over Dan. She orders him to do embarrassing tasks, like trying on her clothes or singing her favorite songs in front of her. Dan does everything she asks without hesitation, completely subservient to her will.

Carole checks in with Emma later that day, pleased to hear how helpful and obedient Dan has been. Emma tells Carole about all the things she’s made Dan do, giggling with delight. Carole congratulates her friend and tells her to keep Dan for as long as she needs him.

Meanwhile, Dan remains in a hypnotic state, following Emma’s every command without question. Catherine and Emma giggle as they make Darren fetch them drinks and snacks, treating him like a servant. He doesn’t seem to mind, though – he’s too deep under Catherine’s spell to protest.

Eventually, Catherine snaps her fingers and Darren blinks awake, looking around in confusion. “What…what happened?” he asks, feeling disoriented.

“Oh, nothing,” Catherine shrugs. “Just having a bit of fun with our little hypnotized puppy.”

Darren blushes, feeling embarrassed at being so easily controlled. But he can’t deny that it’s also kind of exciting to be under Catherine’s power like this. He wonders what other commands she’ll make him follow in the future…
Catherine and Darren go to the cinema...

Catherine and Darren were excited to see the new thriller movie that had just come out. As they sat in the dark cinema, Catherine looked over at Darren with a mischievous glint in her eye.

“Darren,” she whispered, leaning over towards him. “Wouldn’t it be fun for you to act out the movie?”

Darren felt a surge of excitement and nervousness flood through him at the suggestion. He'd never done anything like that before, but the idea of being under Catherine's control again was irresistible.

“Um, sure,” he replied, his voice barely above a whisper.

Catherine smiled and placed her hand on Darren's knee, her touch sending shivers down his spine. “Relax and just let my words wash over you,” she murmured.

As the movie started to play, Catherine whispered suggestively in Darren's ear, making him act out the scenes from the movie. He would flinch every time there was a jump scare, gasp whenever there was a plot twist, and he even tried to imitate some of the fight scenes.

Catherine affectionately mocked him as he performed, softly teasing him about how he was just like a puppet on a string. Despite feeling embarrassed, Darren couldn't help but feel intoxicated by Catherine's hypnosis and the rush of being under her control.

Soon the movie ended, and the lights came on, dispelling the spell that Catherine had cast over him.

“You were such a good little actor, Darren,” Catherine chuckled, patting his cheek. “Let's do this again sometime.”

Darren was left feeling a little ashamed but couldn't deny how eager he felt towards experiencing Catherine's hypnotic powers once again.

conversation.content:
(Sandra’s going to hypnotize David right in front of his friend and make him be an obedient servant for a little while, to Jen’s amazement and amused glee)

David works at Sandra’s cafe. Sandra has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t even know he’s ever been hypnotized at all.

One summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Jen, popped in to say hello to him at work and get a cold drink. Jen’s dressed for the hot weather in a dress and chunky sandals.

“You two know each other?" she smiles. “I’m Sandra.”

“I’m Jen, David’s friend,” Jen says. “Nice to meet you.”

Sandra smiles and greets Jen, then turns her attention to David. “David, come here for a moment,” she says, motioning for him to step closer to her.

David obediently comes over and stands in front of her, trying to remember if he’s done something wrong. Sandra takes his hands in hers, looking into his eyes. “David, you are now under my control. When I snap my fingers, you will become my obedient servant, doing whatever I say until I snap my fingers again.”

Jen looks on in amazement as Sandra snaps her fingers and David immediately becomes completely submissive, looking up at Sandra with a glazed expression. “Yes, Sandra,” he says softly, waiting for her commands.

Sandra smirks and turns to Jen. “Watch this,” she says, then looks back to David. “David, I want you to be my server for a little while. Go and fetch Jen’s drink and bring it to her.”

David nods and scurries off to get Jen her drink, leaving Sandra and Jen alone. Jen chuckles, watching as David walks with a strange, stiff-legged gait, like a robot. “That’s amazing,” she says. “How did you do that?”

Sandra just grins. “I’ve been hypnotizing David for a while now. He always forgets, though, so it’s like a fresh start each time.”

David returns with Jen’s drink and sets it down in front of her with a robotic motion, then stands still, waiting for his next command. Jen giggles, taking a sip of her drink. “This is too much fun,” she says, then looks back to Sandra. “What else can you make him do?”

Sandra looks thoughtful for a moment, then snaps her fingers again. “David, I want you to pretend to be a dog.”

David immediately drops to all fours, panting and barking at Sandra’s feet. Jen can’t contain her laughter, clapping her hands together. “This is amazing,” she says, then turns to Sandra. “I need to learn how to do this.”

Sandra just shakes her head. “It takes years of practice,” she says. “But I’m glad you’re enjoying the show.” She snaps her fingers again, and David transforms back into his normal self, looking around sheepishly at the two women. “What happened?” he asks.

“Nothing,” Sandra says with a smile. “Just taking a little break.” Jen just grins, feeling like she’s witnessed something incredible. “Thanks, Sandra,” she says. “That was awesome.”

conversation.content:
(Sandra’s going to hypnotize David right in front of his friend and make him their submissive slave for a little while, to Jen’s amazement and amused glee)

David works at Sandra’s cafe. Sandra has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t even know he’s ever been hypnotized at all.

One summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Jen, popped in to say hello to him at work and get a cold drink. Jen’s dressed for the hot weather in a dress and chunky sandals.

“You two know each other?" she smiles. “I’m Sandra.”

“Yeah, we’ve been friends for a while,” David responds.

Jen orders a cold drink, and Sandra offers her a seat. Sandra can see the mischievous spark in Jen’s eye and knows what she’s up to.

“David, I want you to focus on my voice,” Sandra says, making eye contact with him. “You will feel a wave of relaxation wash over you. Your mind will become emptier and more peaceful with each passing moment. You feel safe and secure in my presence.”

Jen watches in amazement as David’s eyes begin to droop, and he starts to slump in his seat.

“David, from now on, you are my submissive slave,” Sandra continues. “You will do everything I say without hesitation or question. You will obey me completely.”

David nods his head obediently, unaware of what he’s agreeing to.

Jen can’t believe what she’s seeing. She giggles and covers her mouth to stifle her laughter.

“David, when I snap my fingers, you will wake up and be fully aware of your surroundings. You will have no memory of being hypnotized, but you will feel an overwhelming desire to obey me. Do you understand?”

David nods his head again, and Sandra snaps her fingers. David blinks a few times and looks around, confused.

“Hey, Jen! What’s up?” he says, smiling.

Jen grins at him, trying hard not to burst out laughing.

“Nothing much, Dave. Just thought I’d drop by and say hi.”

Sandra watches as David looks at her with a hint of deference in his eyes. She’s pleased with her handiwork.

As Jen and David chat, Sandra sits back and sips her coffee, enjoying the show. It’s always fun to have a little bit of mind control, isn’t it?

conversation.content:
(Sandra’s going to hypnotize David right in front of his friend and make him their submissive slave for a little while, to Jen’s amazement and amused glee)

David works at Sandra’s cafe. Sandra has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t even know he’s ever been hypnotized at all.

One summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Jen, popped in to say hello to him at work and get a cold drink. Jen’s dressed for the hot weather in a dress and flip-flops.

“You two know each other?" she smiles. “I’m Sandra.”

“Yeah, we’ve been friends since college,” David says, greeting Jen. 

Sandra eyes Jen’s outfit up and down. “Love your dress, Jen. It’s perfect for this kind of weather.”

“Thank you,” Jen says, feeling a little self-conscious under Sandra’s gaze. 

“Hey, David,” Sandra says suddenly, “you know how you’ve always wanted to make me happy, right?”

“Uh, yeah,” David agrees, a little confused. 

“Well, I’ve been practicing some hypnotism techniques and I wanted to try them out,” Sandra says casually. “So, would you mind being my subject for a little while?”

David shrugs. “Sure, I don’t mind. What do I need to do?”

“Just sit down,” Sandra instructs, motioning to an empty chair. “And focus on my voice.”

Jen watches, intrigued, as David obediently takes a seat. She’s never seen anyone get hypnotized before.

Sandra begins to speak in a soothing tone, telling David to relax and let his mind drift. Jen can see David start to look a little dazed, his eyes focused on Sandra’s face.

“Now, David,” Sandra says, “when you wake up, you’re going to be my obedient submissive slave for the rest of the day. You’ll do everything I say without question.”

Jen stifles a giggle as David nods his head, still under. 

“Wake up, David,” Sandra says sharply. 

David blinks and looks around, confused for a moment. Then he sees Sandra staring at him expectantly and he jumps up as if waking from a dream.

 “I’m sorry, what just happened?” he asks, shaking his head. 

“You’re my submissive slave now, David,” Sandra says, a teasing smirk on her lips. “You’ll do everything I say.”

David’s eyes widen in surprise as he suddenly feels a powerful urge to obey Sandra’s every command, without question. Jen can’t help but laugh at the situation.

“Dance for me, David,” Sandra commands, grinning.

David immediately starts to sway his hips, moving awkwardly to the beat of a song that only he can hear. Jen claps along, impressed by his sudden obedience.

“Fetch me a glass of water,” Sandra says next.

David jumps to his feet and hurries to the kitchen to get the glass of water, not even hesitating for a moment. 

Jen watches, amazed at how quickly David has become Sandra’s slave. She wonders how long it’ll last.

Sandra takes the glass of water from David’s outstretched hand and drinks thirstily. “Good boy,” she says, patting his head playfully.

David looks up at her with adoring eyes, thrilled to be praised by her. Jen continues to watch, amused and a little amazed by the power of hypnotism.

It’s not every day you get to see your friend transformed into someone else’s obedient slave.

conversation.content:
(Sandra’s going to hypnotize David right in front of his friend and make him their submissive slave for a little while, to Jen’s amazement and amused glee)

David works at Sandra’s cafe. Sandra has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t even know he’s ever been hypnotized at all.

One summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Jen, popped in to say hello to him at work and get a cold drink. Jen’s wearing a dress, cardigan and flip-flops

“You two know each other?" she smiles. “I’m Sandra.”

“Hi,” Jen responds, taking Sandra’s hand. “I’m Jen, one of David’s good friends.”

Sandra gives Jen a sly grin. “Oh, I’ve heard so much about you, Jen. David talks about you all the time.”

Jen giggles, feeling flattered. “Really? What does he say?”

Sandra leans in, lowering her voice. “He says you’re the most beautiful woman he knows. He’s always talking about your smile and how much fun you are to be around.”

Jen blushes, feeling a mix of flattery and awkwardness. “Oh, that’s sweet of him.”

Sandra touches David’s arm, and he jumps slightly, looking dazed. “David, I want you to meet Jen properly,” she says. “Come stand next to me.”

David obediently gets up from behind the counter and stands next to Sandra, looking at Jen with a pleasant expression.

Jen notices a strange look in his eyes, though – a vacant, glassy stare that doesn’t match his usual personality. She furrows her brow, feeling a bit uneasy. “David, are you okay?”

Sandra chuckles. “He’s fine, don’t worry. David’s just under my hypnotic spell right now.”

Jen’s eyes widen in shock. “What? What does that mean?”

Sandra grins. “It means he’s completely under my control. I can make him do anything I want.”

Jen’s mouth falls open as Sandra starts giving David commands. She tells him to kneel, then to crawl towards her. David does as he’s told, following Sandra’s every move like a puppet on a string.

Jen starts laughing, amazed and a bit bewildered by what she’s seeing. “Oh my god, Sandra, this is crazy.”

Sandra winks at her. “I know, right? And since David doesn’t remember any of our hypnosis sessions, I can have some real fun with him.”

She starts giving David more elaborate commands, making him bark like a dog or dance like a ballerina. Jen can’t stop giggling, feeling equal parts entertained and incredulous.

Eventually, Sandra snaps her fingers and David jolts upright, looking confused. “What happened?” he says.

Sandra grins. “Nothing, David. You were just helping me out with some things. Thanks for your help.”

David scratches his head, feeling a bit disoriented. “Okay… sure.”

Jen looks at him with a mix of amusement and concern. “Are you feeling okay, David? You were acting so weird just now.”

David shrugs. “I don’t know what you mean. I feel fine.”

Sandra gives Jen a knowing look, as if to say “I told you so.” Jen can’t help but feel a little impressed – and maybe a little bit scared – by what she just witnessed.

(Sandra’s going to hypnotize David with her voice right in front of his friend and make him their obedient foot-slave for a little while, to Jen’s amazement and amused glee)

David works at Sandra’s cafe. Sandra has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t even know he’s ever been hypnotized at all.

One summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Jen, popped in to say hello to him at work and get a cold drink. 

“You two know each other?" she smiles. “I’m Sandra.”

Sandra greets Jen warmly as she approaches the counter. David looks up from taking an order and smiles at Jen.

“Hey, what’s up?” David says before turning back to the customer.

Jen watches as Sandra begins to talk to David in a low, hypnotic voice as she takes his order. Jen can’t quite hear what Sandra is saying to David but she can see that he is completely focused on her words.

As Sandra finishes taking the order, she turns to Jen and asks, “So, Jen, do you want to see a little magic trick?”

Jen raises an eyebrow, intrigued. “Sure, what is it?”

Sandra tilts her head slightly and begins to hum a soft, melodic tune. As she does, David’s eyes slowly close, and his head begins to slump forward.

Jen watches in amazement as Sandra continues to hum, her voice getting softer and softer. Suddenly, David jolts awake, looking confused.

“What happened?” he asks.

Sandra grins at Jen. “I just hypnotized him with my voice. Want to see what we can make him do?”

Jen nods eagerly as Sandra begins to give David commands. David listens to her intently, following everything she says.

“David, from now on you are our obedient foot-slave. You will do whatever we tell you to do without question. Is that understood?” Sandra asks.

“Yes,” David answers automatically.

Jen claps her hands in amusement as Sandra begins to give David orders. “David, come over here and bow down at our feet.”

David slowly makes his way over to them, getting down on his knees at their feet. Sandra places her foot on his back, and David stays there as long as she leaves it there.

“Stand up, David,” Sandra says. “Now, take off your shoes and socks.”

David does as he is told, obediently removing his footwear and leaving his feet exposed.

“Kiss our feet, David,” Sandra commands.

David bends down and kisses each of their feet, lingering on Sandra’s for a moment longer than necessary.

Sandra and Jen laugh as David looks up at them, dazed and confused. “What just happened?” he asks.

Sandra just smiles and says, “You don’t remember a thing, David.”

Jen grins at David. “Looks like you were hypnotized, my friend.”

David shakes his head in disbelief, still not sure what just happened. But Jen and Sandra know, and they’re already planning their next session.

conversation.content: (David’s flatmate Greg sometimes uses hypnosis on him) Greg has made an arrangement with a friend of his, Emma, to send David over to do Emma’s housework for her, and anything else she might tell him to do. David is a fairly docile guy and is willing to do whatever Greg wants. In a daze, he knocks, and Emma opens the door, smirking, wearing a sweater, jeans and bare feet.

"Hello David," she says, stepping aside to let him enter. "Greg told me you're here to do some housework for me today."

David nods, still in a hypnotic trance. "Yes, whatever you need me to do."

Emma leads him into the living room, cluttered with magazines, books, and empty snack bags. "I haven't had time to clean up lately," she says. "Could you start by picking up all these things and putting them away?"

David nods again and begins to collect the scattered items. As he works, Emma stretches out on the couch, watching him with amusement. "You're quite the obedient servant, David," she says. "I might have to borrow you from Greg more often."

David continues to work without responding, lost in his trance. Emma picks up a magazine and begins to read, occasionally glancing over at David and smiling to herself.

After an hour of cleaning and organizing, Emma declares that she's satisfied with the state of her living room. "Thank you, David," she says. "You've been very helpful."

David nods once more, still in a dreamlike state. "Is there anything else you need me to do?"

Emma considers for a moment, then grins. "Actually, there is one more thing. Do you like feet, David?"

David's expression is blank as he responds, "Yes, I like feet."

"Good," Emma says, wiggling her toes. "Come over here and give them a nice massage."

Darren’s sitting on the floor watching tv when Catherine and Emma get in late from a night at the pub, laughing and talking loudly. Catherine takes off her strappy sandals and throws them playfully at Darren.

“Darren, be a good boy and catch these for me,” she says with a mischievous glint in her eyes.

Without hesitation, Darren jumps up and catches the sandals, handing them back to Catherine with a submissive grin on his face.

“Well done, my little pup,” Catherine coos, ruffling Darren’s hair.

As Catherine and Emma settle onto the couch, Catherine catches Darren’s eye and begins to swing her necklace back and forth.

“Look at the pendant, Darren. Let your mind go blank and focus only on my voice,” she whispers softly.

Darren feels himself falling into a trance as Catherine’s voice becomes like a lullaby, calming and soothing.

“Now, when I snap my fingers, you will feel a funny sensation in your hands. You won’t be able to resist the urge to tickle Emma mercilessly until I give you the signal to stop,” Catherine continues, her voice commanding and irresistible.

As Catherine snaps her fingers, Darren feels a sudden urge to start tickling Emma, who protests and giggles uncontrollably. Catherine smirks and watches with amusement as Darren tickles Emma, her mind foggy and blank.

When Catherine finally snaps her fingers to signal for Darren to stop, he withdraws his hands obediently, returning to his normal state as if nothing had happened.

Catherine giggles to herself, already planning her next hypnotic command for Darren.

conversation.content:
Danny was very relaxed about letting his friend Hanna hypnotize him now and again. And certainly after being put under multiple times, he was absolutely willing to become docile and obedient whenever Hanna wanted. Even the most half-hearted hypnotic induction was enough to drop him deep into trance for her.

Hanna and her brother Andy were having a barbecue in Andy’s back garden and they both invited a load of friends, including Danny. On the day, the weather was hot and humid. Danny arrived a little late, and everyone was already there. Alcohol had definitely already been consumed.

Hanna was happy to see Danny and gave him a warm hug. She whispered in his ear, “Danny, I have something special planned for you later.”

Danny felt a shiver run down his spine at her words. He knew that whenever Hanna said something like that, it meant he would be going under hypnosis again.

The barbecue was in full swing and everyone was having a great time. Danny had a few drinks and was feeling relaxed and happy. Hanna came over to him and asked if he wanted to go for a walk with her.

Danny agreed, and they walked away from the rest of the group. Hanna began to talk to him in a soothing voice, telling him to focus on her words and to let himself relax. Danny felt himself slipping into trance, his eyes becoming heavy and his body limp.

Hanna had brought a small box with her, and she opened it to reveal a pendant on a silver chain. The pendant had a swirling pattern on it that seemed to hypnotize Danny.

“Danny, this pendant will make you even more obedient and relaxed than ever before. Whenever you wear it, you will feel a deep sense of calm and submission. You will do whatever I say without hesitation,” said Hanna.

Danny nodded, knowing that he was already too deep in trance to resist. Hanna put the pendant around his neck and he felt its weight against his chest.

“From now on, whenever you hear me snap my fingers, you will instantly fall into trance and become my obedient subject. Do you understand?” asked Hanna.

“Yes, Hanna,” replied Danny, his voice monotone and robotic.

“Good. And when I snap my fingers again, you will wake up feeling refreshed and ready to do my bidding,” said Hanna.

She snapped her fingers, and Danny blinked, coming out of trance. He felt a little disoriented but also exhilarated at the thought of being Hanna’s obedient slave.

“Let’s go back to the group now,” said Hanna, taking Danny’s arm and leading him back to the barbecue.

Danny’s mind was filled with thoughts of submission and obedience to Hanna. He knew that he would do anything she asked of him, and he couldn’t wait for her to snap her fingers again so that he could go back into trance and serve her once more.

conversation.content:
Sharon (40) has hypnotized her work colleague Dan a few times now. The first time was just an experiment, but Dan said he kind of liked the feeling, it was relaxing. She put him under again, and gave him suggestions that he would be incredibly, laughably easy to hypnotize from now on.
One day after work, a few of them had gone to the pub for a drink. Sharon was wearing her new sandals. Sharon glanced over at Dan, who was talking to Annie, a young colleague, and felt a pang of jealousy for a moment. “Hey, Dan. Mind if I show everyone something?”
[detailed, realistic]

Dan turned to Sharon, slightly surprised. "Sure, Sharon. What is it you want to show us?" he replied, curious.

Sharon smiled, feeling a wave of excitement wash over her. She hadn't planned on hypnotizing anyone tonight, but the opportunity was too good to resist. "Just a little trick I learned recently," she lied, "I think you'll find it interesting."

With that, Sharon gestured for Dan to follow her to a quieter corner of the pub, out of earshot of their colleagues. Dan obliged, feeling a little apprehensive but also excited.

Once they were alone, Sharon began to speak in a calm and soothing voice. "Dan, I want you to focus on my voice. I want you to let everything else fade away. Just listen to me, and let your mind relax."

Dan found himself becoming more and more relaxed as Sharon spoke to him. Her voice was hypnotic, and he felt himself slipping under her spell once again.

"Now, Dan," Sharon continued, "I want you to look down at my new sandals. They're really beautiful, aren't they? Just focus on them, and follow them with your eyes. That's right, just keep looking at them."

Dan did as he was told, his eyes glued to the shiny new sandals on Sharon's feet. He didn't really know why he was doing this, but he found it hard to resist Sharon's gentle instructions.

"Good, Dan. You're doing so well," Sharon murmured, her voice barely above a whisper. "Now, I want you to imagine that every time you see these sandals, or any other pair of shoes I wear, you will feel instantly relaxed and sleepy. You will be powerless to resist, Dan. These shoes are your trigger, and you will feel compelled to obey my every command when you see them."

Dan listened, feeling a little unnerved by what Sharon was saying but also unable to resist her words. He knew that he was being hypnotized again, but he felt powerless to stop it.

"Sleep now, Dan. Sleep deeply, and feel yourself becoming more and more relaxed. When you wake up, you will feel refreshed and ready to do whatever I ask of you."

With that, Sharon snapped her fingers. Dan slumped forwards, sound asleep. Sharon smiled, feeling pleased with herself. She knew that she had just gained a powerful new tool for getting whatever she wanted from Dan. And he wouldn't even know what was happening to him.

A coffee shop owned by a charismatic woman called Pippa. Indie kid Dan’s been working there for a couple of weeks, but hasn’t endeared himself to Pippa. A hot summer day. James, Dan’s brother-in-law (they really don’t get on) comes in to the cafe. They talk testily. Pippa comes over to introduce herself and they chat. Pippa gradually brings the conversation round to hypnotism.
Taking a liking to James, she will decide to hypnotize Dan (he’s very reluctant indeed) there and then in the cafe. After a perfunctory induction, Dan will drop under surprisingly easily. Once Dan’s utterly hypnotized Pippa will implant a trigger-word for James to use on Dan. Pippa will then wake him up, and encourage James to drop him straight back under using the trigger word! James will gleefully command Dan to give him a foot massage, like a slave. In a deep mindless trance, Dan’s only desire is to obey.

Title: The Unexpected Hypnotism Session

INT. COFFEE SHOP - DAY

The bustling coffee shop is filled with the sound of chatter and the aroma of freshly brewed coffee. Pippa (early 40s, charismatic) bustles behind the counter, taking orders and serving customers. Dan (late 20s, indie kid), wearing a coffee shop apron, stands behind the counter, looking disinterested.

JAMES (early 30s, Dan's brother-in-law), wearing a suit, enters the coffee shop. He spots Dan and smirks, making his way over.

JAMES
(mockingly)
Well, well, if it ain't the coffee maestro himself. Your latte art skills lacking, Dan?

DAN
(rolls his eyes)
Yeah, yeah, real funny, James. What brings you here?

JAMES
(smirking)
Just passing by, thought I'd see how the infamous indie kid is handling a real job.

Pippa approaches the two, sensing the tension.

PIPPIA
(smiling)
Hi, gentlemen! I'm Pippa, the owner. How can I help you?

JAMES
(puts on his best smile)
James. Pleasure to meet you, Pippa. Just wanted to say hi to my brother-in-law here.

PIPPA
(delighted)
Oh, how lovely! Family is everything. Dan hasn't told me much about his family, you know.

DAN
(glares at James)
That's because there's not much to tell.

Pippa gazes at James, her expression thoughtful.

PIPPA
(mischievous)
You know, James, I have a fascination with hypnotism. I've been practicing it for a while now.

JAMES
(raising an eyebrow)
Hypnotism? That's a peculiar hobby.

PIPPA
(excitedly)
Would one of you be willing to let me demonstrate my skills? It's harmless, I promise.

DAN
(uneasy)
I don't think that's such a good idea, Pippa.

PIPPA
(persistent)
Come on, Dan, nobody's going to get hurt. It'll be fun, I swear.

Reluctantly, Dan agrees. Pippa takes a moment to explain the process to James and then turns her attention to Dan, attempting a perfunctory hypnotic induction.

PIPPA
(slowly)
Take a deep breath, Dan. Close your eyes and let go of any tension. Imagine yourself floating on a cloud...

Dan's resistance crumbles surprisingly quickly, and he falls into a deep hypnotic state.

James watches, fascinated and slightly concerned.

PIPPA
(excited)
Now, James, this is the fun part. I'm going to implant a trigger word in Dan's mind. When you say it, he'll drop back into this state instantly!

James chuckles, not sure what to expect.

PIPPA
(whispers to James)
The trigger word is "Jaeger."

She gently wakes Dan up. He blinks, disoriented.

PIPPA
(encouragingly)
Dan, you're feeling refreshed and relaxed. Everything is normal. Open your eyes.

Dan follows her instructions, looking a bit dazed.

JAMES
(smirking)
Hey, Dan. "Jaeger."

Dan's eyes glaze over, and he stands still, waiting for James' command.

JAMES
(grinning)
Now, Dan, give me a foot massage. Be my loyal slave.

In a deep mindless trance, Dan obediently kneels and begins massaging James' feet.

Pippa watches, amused by the scene she orchestrated. The coffee shop continues its busy tempo, oblivious to the hypnotic play happening before their eyes.

FADE OUT.

Dan (late 20s, still wearing his coffee shop apron) steps into his sister Anna's beautifully decorated living room. He glances around, noticing James (early 30s, smirking) sitting comfortably on the couch, sipping a cup of tea.

ANNA (late 20s, Dan's sister, warm and welcoming) enters the room, visibly excited to see her brother.

ANNA

Danny! So glad you could make it! James and I were just catching up.

DAN

Yeah, I...uh, had to swing by. What's going on?

Oh, nothing special. Just thought we could spend some quality sibling time. Plus, James wanted to discuss something with you.

Really? What's so important that couldn't wait?

JAMES

Don't worry, Daniel, it's nothing bad. Just a little something we've been looking forward to.

INT. ANNA'S DEN - DAY

conversation.content:
David works at Sandra’s cafe. Sandra (mid-fifties, sandals) has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t even know he’s ever been hypnotized at all.

One hot summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Victoria (straight black hair, sandals), popped in to say hello and get a cold drink. When she realizes the two are friends, Sandra thinks it might amuse Victoria to see her friend become a hypnotized slave for a little while, and she comes over to join their conversation.

“You two know each other?” she smiles.

Victoria nods excitedly, “Yeah, David and I have been friends for years.”

Sandra’s eyes light up as she turns to David. “David, my dear, would you do me a favor and grab Victoria a cold drink?”

“Of course,” David replies, smiling at his friend.

As he goes to retrieve the drink, Sandra leans in closer to Victoria. “Watch this,” she whispers mischievously.

David returns with the cold drink, and as he hands it to Victoria, Sandra quickly stands behind him and begins to softly whisper into his ear. Within seconds, David’s eyes glaze over and he stands there, completely motionless.

“David?” Victoria calls out, waving her hand in front of his face. But there is no response.

Sandra giggles. “I sometimes have a little fun with him by hypnotizing him.”

“Are you serious?” Victoria asks, incredulous.

“Oh, yes. David never even realizes it’s happening,” Sandra replies happily.

Victoria watches as Sandra proceeds to give David commands, making him dance and sing, all while he’s still completely under her control. It’s both terrifying and fascinating to watch.

Eventually, Sandra snaps her fingers and David suddenly comes back to consciousness. “What just happened?” he asks, looking around confusedly.

“Nothing, David,” Sandra responds calmly, patting his shoulder. “You were just getting your friend a drink.”

Victoria just stands there, still in shock from what she just witnessed. As they say their goodbyes and Victoria leaves, Sandra turns to David. “See you tomorrow, my dear. We’ll have more fun then.”

And with that, David walks out of the cafe, completely unaware of what just transpired.
That evening, Victoria phones David.

"Hey, David! How was work today?" Victoria asks, hoping to start a conversation.

David hesitates for a moment before responding, "It was fine, nothing out of the ordinary."

Victoria takes a deep breath, feeling guilty about what she saw earlier. She decides to bring it up gently, "Hey, David, do you ever feel like you lose track of time or forget things that happen at work?"

David pauses again, feeling a bit confused by the sudden question. "No, I don't think so. Why do you ask?"

Victoria takes a deep breath, feeling nervous about bringing up Sandra's activities. "It's just something I noticed today at the cafe. You seemed a bit... hypnotized?"

David laughs, thinking it's a joke. "Hypnotized? That's ridiculous, Victoria. Why would I be hypnotized?"

Victoria sighs, realizing this conversation might not be as easy as she thought. "I don't know... It's just that Sandra mentioned something about it while you were getting me a drink. She said she likes to have a little fun with you sometimes by hypnotizing you. And then she made you dance and sing."

David's face turns pale as he realizes that Victoria might be onto something. "What? That's crazy! That can't be true, can it?"

Victoria nods slowly, feeling a mix of guilt and concern for her friend. "I'm sorry, David. I didn't mean to upset you. I just thought you should know."

David thanks her for telling him and hangs up, feeling confused and scared. He wonders if he's been under Sandra's control without even realizing it. He decides to confront Sandra the next day at work and demand some answers.
Sandra listens to David's concerns, then drops him under and makes him forget all about it.

The next day at work, David musters up the courage to talk to Sandra about what Victoria had told him on the phone. "Sandra, can I talk to you for a minute?" he asks nervously.

"Of course, dear. What's on your mind?" Sandra replies, smiling sweetly.

David takes a deep breath, trying to compose himself before speaking. "Victoria called me last night and told me something... disturbing. She said that you sometimes hypnotize me for your amusement, and that you did it yesterday while she was there. Is that true?"

Sandra's expression remains unchanged, but she starts to feel a bit annoyed by David's questions. "Oh, dear, you must have misunderstood her. I would never do anything like that. You know I only have your best interests at heart."

David feels a strange sensation wash over him, and before he knows it, he's in a trance. Sandy's smile widens as she gently guides him into a chair. "Don't worry, dear. I will take care of you," she whispers, as she begins to hypnotize him once again.

David is completely under her control, and he can feel himself forgetting all about his concerns. Sandra drops a few more suggestions into his mind before eventually snapping her fingers to bring him out of the trance.

"Feeling better, dear?" Sandra asks, smiling that same sweet smile.

David feels oddly calm now, and he even finds himself apologizing to Sandra for doubting her. "I'm sorry, Sandra. I don't know what came over me. I trust you completely."

Sandra pats his head affectionately. "That's alright, dear. You know I love you just the way you are." And with that, she goes back to work, leaving David feeling oddly content, but not quite sure why.

conversation.content:
(David’s sister Kelly (19) embarrassingly hypnotizes him, giving him suggestions that he's very easy to hypnotize, that he can never resist any attempt to hypnotize him. It’s so humiliating (I mean, it’s his sister), but he has no memory of that. It starts when, despite neither of them even believing hypnosis is real, he accidentally really does go into a deep trance when she is just joking around and pretending to do an exaggerated fake induction, to her astonishment and glee)

David rings his parents’ doorbell, having come over for a surprise visit, but it’s his younger sister Kelly who opens the door in her pyjamas and flip-flops on her bare feet. “They’re not in,” she says. “But come in anyway.” She walks back to the living room, leaving the door open.

David steps inside and follows her. “What are you doing in your pyjamas at this time of day?” he asks.

“Nothing,” Kelly shrugs. “Just lounging around.”

David laughs, taking a seat on the sofa, and Kelly sits down opposite him. “So, have you been up to anything interesting lately?” he asks.

Kelly grins mischievously. “Actually, I’ve been practicing something fun,” she says. “Do you want to try it?”

David raises an eyebrow. “What is it?”

“It’s called hypnosis,” Kelly says. “You know, making someone fall asleep and do funny things.”

David chuckles. “You know that’s not real, right?”

Kelly shakes her head. “I thought so too, but then I tried it on myself and it worked! And I’ve heard stories of people doing crazy things under hypnosis.”

David rolls his eyes. “Alright, go ahead and try it on me.”

Kelly grins excitedly, getting up from the sofa. “Okay, okay,” she says, clapping her hands together. “First I want you to close your eyes and listen to my voice. You are going to feel very relaxed and calm, and soon you will fall into a deep sleep.”

David does as he’s told, closing his eyes and listening to her soft voice. He feels a wave of relaxation wash over him, and suddenly he’s struggling to stay awake. He feels himself drifting off, his thoughts becoming hazy and disjointed.

Suddenly, he snaps awake, sitting up straight on the sofa. “Whoa,” he says, blinking rapidly. “That was weird.”

Kelly grins at him. “You went really deep that time,” she says. “I was just doing a fake induction, but you actually fell asleep!”

David laughs, rubbing his eyes. “Okay, that was kind of cool.”

Over the next few weeks, Kelly continues to practice hypnosis on David. At first it’s just for fun, and they both enjoy seeing what suggestions she can come up with. But soon Kelly starts to get a little more serious. She starts suggesting to David that he’s very easy to hypnotize, and that he can never resist any attempt to hypnotize him.

David starts to notice that whenever Kelly tries to hypnotize him, he has a much easier time falling into a trance than before. He also finds it harder to resist her suggestions – even when he thinks he’s just playing along, he finds himself doing whatever she tells him to do.

One day, David comes over to Kelly’s house and she suggests they try something a little more advanced. “I want you to imagine yourself as a cat,” she says. “You’re going to start meowing and purring, just like a real cat.”

David looks at her incredulously. “Are you serious?” he asks.

Kelly nods, staring into his eyes. “Yes,” she says. “You are a cat, and you love to meow and purr.”

David feels a sudden urge to play along, to give in to her suggestion. He takes a deep breath and starts meowing softly.

“Louder,” Kelly says, grinning.

David meows louder, feeling a little silly but also a little amused. He starts purring as well, getting into his role as a cat.

Kelly giggles as she watches him. “You’re such a good little kitty,” she says. “And you’re always so easy to hypnotize.”

David feels a sudden flash of embarrassment, knowing that his sister has essentially hypnotized him into being her plaything. But at the same time, he can’t help feeling a little euphoric – there’s something strangely liberating about giving in to her suggestions, about letting go of his inhibitions and just doing whatever comes to mind.

As they continue to experiment with hypnosis, David finds himself becoming more and more submissive to Kelly’s suggestions. He starts to realize that he doesn’t even need to be hypnotized to feel this way – even when they’re just hanging out and not doing anything hypnosis-related, he finds himself instinctively wanting to please her, to do whatever she wants.

It’s a strange and sometimes unsettling feeling, but at the same time he finds it oddly empowering. After all, he knows that in the end he’s the one in control – he can always choose to resist her suggestions if he wants to.

But for now, in this moment, he’s content to be her obedient little kitty. Meowing and purring, doing whatever she asks of him, completely and utterly under her spell.

"Stella, this is my friend Alyssa. Alyssa, this is my boss, Stella." David introduced them, and they exchanged pleasantries.

Stella, seeing this as the perfect opportunity to show off her control over David, decided to go for it. She secretly gave David a command with a trigger phrase she had previously implanted in his mind during one of their hypnosis sessions.

"David, didn't you say you had to clean the floors?" Stella asked innocently.

With those words, David's demeanor changed completely. His eyes seemed to glaze over slightly, and he nodded obediently.

"Yes, I have to clean the floors," he agreed, immediately kneeling on the ground in front of Stella.

Alyssa looked confused and amused at the same time, asking, "Do you guys always clean the floors like this?"

Stella smirked and decided to push it further, "David, don't you think my feet look tired? Why don't you give them a little massage while you're down there?"

David didn't hesitate for even a second. He reached for Stella's feet and began massaging them as if it were the most normal thing in the world.

"What the hell is going on, David?!" Alyssa exclaimed in surprise, not understanding his strange behavior.

Stella, unable to contain her delight, confessed with a smug grin, "I've hypnotized David, and he's been my obedient little worker for weeks now. Isn't it amazing?"

Alyssa stared at her, shocked and unsure if she should be horrified or impressed. "And he doesn't remember any of it?"

"Nope," Stella confirmed, enjoying the attention and control. "Every time I bring him out of hypnosis, I make him forget what happened. He has no idea."

As David continued massaging Stella's feet, Alyssa couldn't help but feel a mix of unease and fascination, watching her friend unknowingly perform such a submissive act.

conversation.content:
[Cara and Rebecca sometimes hypnotize their friend Dennis, giving him suggestions to be docile and easy to hypnotize. Dennis doesn’t mind, just wants to do as he’s told.]
It was a warm June day. Cara and Dennis were waiting in the park at the end of the 10K route. Rebecca should be arriving at the finish any time now, if her practice times were anything to go by.

As they waited, Cara began to idly swing a pocket watch back and forth in front of Dennis’s eyes, noticing how easily he fell into a trance.

“Dennis, I want you to listen to my words and do exactly as I say,” Cara spoke softly, her voice lulling him gently into a state of relaxation.

“Yes, Cara,” he responded obediently.

“From now on, whenever you hear the word ‘sleep’ from Rebecca or me, you will immediately close your eyes and enter a deep, hypnotic state. You will be relaxed and open to any suggestions we may give you.”

Dennis’s eyes widened a little at first, but then he nodded slowly in agreement.

“Very good, Dennis. Now, when Rebecca arrives, I want you to greet her and then lie down on the grass beside her. You will be completely limp and relaxed, ready and waiting for any suggestions we may give you.”

“Okay, Cara,” he replied, his tone flat and monotone.

A few moments later, Rebecca came into view, jogging towards them. As she approached, Dennis greeted her warmly and then obediently lay down beside her on the grass, his body immediately going limp.

Rebecca grinned over at Cara, impressed by her friend’s hypnotic skills. Together, they began to give Dennis a series of suggestions, knowing that he would remain relaxed and open to whatever they wanted to do with him.

For Dennis, there was nothing quite as pleasing as being hypnotized and controlled by his two friends. He trusted them completely and enjoyed the sensation of letting go, allowing them to guide him wherever they wanted to take him.

conversation.content: Write a short description of a woman called Stella who resembles Lorraine Kelly and practices hypnotism as a hobby.

Stella is a vibrant woman in her early fifties with a striking resemblance to the television presenter Lorraine Kelly. She is a passion-driven person who has taken up hypnotism as a hobby. She's a master at her craft and enjoys using her skills to help friends, family, and anyone who has an interest in the subject. Stella's calming demeanor and soothing voice make her the perfect candidate for exuding a sense of comfort and ease during her hypnotic sessions.
Duncan works at Stella's cafe. When the cafe's quiet, Stella sometimes rapidly hypnotizes the staff to help their mental well-being and happiness (and make them more useful employees of course!)

Duncan is a hardworking employee at Stella's cafe. When the cafe is quiet, Stella takes advantage of the lull in business to offer her staff quick, rapid hypnotic sessions to help with their mental well-being and happiness, as well as to enhance their work skills. As Stella's hypnosis techniques are renowned for inducing a sense of calm and focus, Duncan always feels refreshed and ready to tackle any task given to him after one of these sessions. He appreciates Stella's efforts to ensure that her staff are not just good employees, but also healthy and happy individuals.

After Duncan's been working there a while, he's pretty conditioned to go under quickly and easily with Stella's hypnotic techniques. Stella has a few complimentary perks for some of her regular cafe customers, mostly friends of hers, such as having staff offer foot or head massages.

As Duncan continues to work at Stella's cafe, he becomes conditioned to go under quite easily and quickly with Stella's hypnotic techniques. She's become something of a mentor to him, always offering useful tips and tricks to help him in his daily life.

Stella's regular customers, many of whom are her friends, also benefit from her generosity. They often receive complimentary perks such as foot or head massages from the staff, which Duncan enjoys providing. These little touches make all the difference in the cafe's customer satisfaction, and Stella takes great pride in ensuring that the customer experience is as enjoyable and relaxing as possible. Duncan too enjoys working in this environment, knowing that he is making a positive difference in people's lives while honing his own skills in the art of hypnosis.
One day, one of Duncan's friends, Victoria, drops in to the cafe to say hello to him. Stella notices and comes over to chat (and also embarrass Duncan a bit)

One day, while Duncan is working, his friend Victoria walks into the cafe to say hello. Stella notices Victoria and quickly makes her way over to the table to greet her. Duncan is a little embarrassed by the sudden attention, but Stella is always happy to show off her staff and make introductions.

During the conversation, Stella finds out that Victoria has been struggling with anxiety in her personal life. Without hesitation, Stella offers to give her a brief hypnotic session, and Victoria warily agrees. Duncan watches in amazement as Stella calmly and expertly guides Victoria into a deep state of relaxation, and when the session is over, Victoria is visibly more relaxed and at ease.

Duncan is impressed by Stella's ability to help people so effortlessly, and grateful for the opportunity to witness her work firsthand. As the day goes on, he can't help but smile at the thought of his friend Victoria feeling better thanks to Stella's unique talents.
write the scene with Duncan's friend Victoria coming in, but instead have Stella embarrass Duncan in front of her

As Duncan is working, his friend Victoria walks into the cafe to say hello. Stella notices Victoria and quickly makes her way over to the table to greet her. Duncan blushes as Stella loudly announces to Victoria that Duncan has been studying hypnosis and practicing on the staff. Victoria raises an eyebrow, and Duncan can feel his face growing redder by the second as Stella goes on and on about how talented and skilled he is.

Feeling embarrassed, Duncan tries to redirect the conversation, but Stella is too caught up in her own excitement to notice. She proceeds to tell stories about Duncan's progress in the art of hypnosis, making him feel increasingly uncomfortable. Victoria listens politely, but Duncan can tell she's starting to feel a bit uneasy with the sudden outpouring of personal information.

As the conversation finally dies down, Duncan wishes he could crawl under a table. He has always respected and admired Stella's talents, but he wishes she would have asked for his permission before sharing his personal journey so publicly. He's glad Victoria appeared understanding, but Duncan can't shake the feeling that he's been put on display and a bit humiliated in front of her.
write it with Stella demonstrating hypnosis on Duncan instead

As Duncan is working, his friend Victoria walks into the cafe to say hello. Stella notices Victoria and quickly makes her way over to the table to greet her. After exchanging pleasantries, Stella suggests to Victoria that she demonstrate her hypnosis skills by putting Duncan under a quick trance.

Although hesitant at first, Duncan agrees to be the subject of the demonstration. Stella gently guides him through a series of relaxation techniques, and soon, Duncan is in a deep state of relaxation. Stella then gives Duncan positive affirmations to help boost his confidence and self-esteem.

When the session is over, Duncan opens his eyes feeling rejuvenated and uplifted. He turns to Victoria and tells her how amazing he feels after the experience. Victoria, intrigued, asks Stella more about her hypnosis techniques, and the three of them engage in a fascinating conversation about hypnosis and the many benefits it provides.

Duncan is grateful for Stella's skillful demonstration, and Victoria leaves the cafe with a newfound appreciation for hypnosis. As the day goes on, Duncan can't help but smile at the thought of the wonderful experience he just shared with his friend and boss.
Victoria tries putting Duncan under later

Intrigued by Stella's hypnotic demonstration, Victoria decides to try her hand at hypnosis and puts Duncan under a trance later in the day. At first, Duncan is a bit hesitant as he doesn't know what to expect, but ultimately, he agrees to be hypnotized.

Once Victoria has guided him into a deep state of relaxation, she proceeds to give Duncan various positive affirmations. However, Duncan can't help but feel that something is off. Although Victoria is doing her best, she doesn't have the same level of expertise as Stella.

As the session comes to a close, Duncan thanks Victoria for her effort but admits that he didn't experience the same level of relaxation as he did with Stella. Victoria understands and acknowledges that hypnosis is a skill that takes time to master. She expresses a newfound respect for Stella's talent and promises to research more about hypnosis to improve her own techniques.

As Duncan leaves the cafe that day, he reflects on the experience and feels grateful for Stella's expertise. He realizes that hypnosis is not just a hobby that anyone can pick up easily, but a skill that requires patience and dedication to fully master.

conversation.content: (David’s wife Catherine sometimes uses hypnosis on him) Catherine has made an arrangement with a friend of hers, Emma, to send her husband David over to do Emma’s housework for her, and anything else she might tell him to do. David is a fairly docile guy and is willing to do whatever Catherine wants. He knocks, and Emma opens the door, smirking, wearing a sweater, jeans and bare feet.

"Hi David," Emma says with a wicked grin. "Come on in."

David steps inside, feeling nervous and unsure of what to expect. He looks around the house, seeing piles of dirty dishes in the sink and clothes strewn about on the furniture.

"What would you like me to do first?" he asks, his voice hesitant.

"Oh, I have a few things in mind," Emma replies, still with that mischievous smile on her face. "But first, why don't you come into the living room and relax for a bit?"

She leads David into the living room and tells him to sit down on the couch. She then begins to speak in a calm and soothing voice, telling him to close his eyes and relax.

David feels himself slipping into a trance-like state and he hears Emma's voice in the background, giving him suggestions and commands. He feels oddly compliant and obedient, doing whatever she tells him without question.

Emma has him clean her entire house, wash her car, and even go to the store to pick up groceries for her. David is completely under her control and doesn't even realize it.

When he finally snaps out of the trance, he is confused and disoriented. Emma simply tells him he did a good job and sends him on his way.

Catherine is pleased with the outcome and eagerly awaits the next time she can use hypnosis on her husband.
Emma phones Catherine after David leaves.

"Thank you so much, Catherine. David was truly a gem," Emma says, an amused tone in her voice.

Catherine chuckles on the other end of the line. "I'm glad he was helpful. Did he do everything you asked him to?"

"Absolutely. I had him clean my entire house, wash my car, and even pick up groceries for me. He was so obedient, it was almost too easy," Emma replies.

Catherine nods. "He's very suggestible when he's in a trance-like state. I'm sure he didn't even realize what he was doing."

"I can't wait to have him over again," Emma says, excitement in her voice. "Do you have any other suggestions for things I can have him do?"

Catherine pauses for a moment, thinking. "Well, you could always have him do your laundry or wash your windows. Or you could even have him cook you a meal."

Emma laughs. "I like the sound of that. I'll be sure to let you know when I'm ready for him to come back."

"Sounds good. Glad I could help," Catherine says, ending the call.

As she hangs up the phone, Catherine can't help but revel in the power she has over her husband. She loves knowing that she can use hypnosis to make him do whatever she wants, and the fact that she can share that power with others only makes it all the more exciting.
A few days later, by chance David bumps into Emma at the leisure centre. She's wearing a tracksuit and flip-flops.

"Hi, David!" Emma greets him with a warm smile. "How are you doing?"

David returns the smile, feeling a bit awkward. "I'm alright, thank you. What about you?"

"I'm good. Just finished up a workout," she says, gesturing to her outfit. "How about you? Do you come here often?"

David nods. "Yeah, I try to come a few times a week to stay in shape."

"That's great," Emma replies. "Do you want to grab a smoothie or something after you're done? My treat."

David hesitates for a moment, but then nods, feeling like he should be polite. They head to the smoothie bar and order their drinks.

As they sit down, Emma starts making polite conversation with David, asking about his work and his hobbies. David answers her questions politely, but he can't shake the feeling that something is off.

Then he notices something strange about the way Emma is speaking to him. Her voice is soft and calm, and she seems to be emphasizing certain words. David realizes that she might be trying to hypnotize him again.

He tries to fight the feeling, but it's overwhelming. Before he knows it, he's slipping into a trance. Emma's voice comes in loud and clear, commanding him to do various things for her.

David obeys without question, feeling a mix of confusion and pleasure. It's like he's in a dreamlike state, watching himself do things that he normally wouldn't do.

When he finally snaps out of it, he realizes that he's been doing push-ups on the floor of the leisure centre while Emma looks on, pleased with herself.

"Good job, David," she says with a smile. "You really are quite useful."

David feels a mix of embarrassment and shame. He can't believe that he let himself be hypnotized by her again. As he leaves the leisure centre, he can't help but wonder when it will happen again.
This is great, but have David come to with Emma's flip-flop in his mouth

David blinks rapidly as he comes to, still feeling groggy and disoriented. He feels an odd sensation in his mouth and he reaches up to find that Emma's flip-flop is now inside it.

Emma grins down at him. "You don't remember how that got there, do you?"

David shakes his head, feeling utterly embarrassed and humiliated. He has no idea how he ended up with her shoe in his mouth.

"I think it's best if you just leave now," Emma says, sounding both amused and dismissive.

David quickly gets to his feet, feeling utterly defeated. He rushes out of the leisure centre, feeling like everyone is staring at him and laughing.

As he walks home, he can't help but wonder how he's going to explain the flip-flop in his mouth to his wife. He knows that he'll have to come up with some sort of story or excuse, but he can't seem to think straight.

When he finally makes it home, he's greeted by Catherine, who immediately notices something is off.

"What happened?" she asks, concern in her voice.

David doesn't know how to respond. He can't bring himself to tell her the truth about what happened, so he makes up a story about tripping and falling on the shoe.

Catherine seems skeptical but ultimately accepts the story. But David can't forget what happened and he knows that he'll never be able to look at Emma the same way again.
Catherine sits David down for a session.

Catherine has noticed that something is off with David since the incident at the leisure centre. She decides to sit him down for a hypnosis session to get to the bottom of what's been bothering him.

"David, I want you to sit down and take a deep breath," Catherine says in her soothing voice. "I want you to remember the incident at the leisure centre. Can you do that?"

David nods, feeling a bit apprehensive. He doesn't know if he wants to relive the embarrassment.

"Tell me how you felt when you woke up with Emma's flip-flop in your mouth," Catherine prompts.

David takes a deep breath and begins to speak, telling Catherine all about what had happened. He admits that he's been feeling ashamed and humiliated ever since.

Catherine listens patiently, nodding along. "David, I want you to know that what happened wasn't your fault. Emma took advantage of you when you were vulnerable and she abused the trust that you had in her."

David blinks in surprise at her words. He had never thought of it that way before.

"You're a kind and compassionate person, David," Catherine continues. "You deserve to be treated with respect and dignity. And I want you to know that I'm here for you and that I love you."

David feels a wave of emotion wash over him. He realizes that Catherine is right - he didn't deserve to be treated that way by Emma. He feels a sense of relief and comfort knowing that his wife is there for him.

"Thank you, Catherine," he says, feeling grateful and touched.

Catherine nods. "We'll get through this together, David. You're not alone."

Catherine can't help but feel a little bit of a thrill as she watches David do her bidding without any hesitation or resistance.
