write this with the shoe shop worker watching her put him under and give the reaction and conversation

As David enters the shoe store, the worker behind the counter watches him curiously. She's seen all sorts of strange things during her time working in retail, but this is a new one.

David moves through the house almost robotically, his mind still foggy from Catherine's hypnosis. Kevin follows him around, issuing orders and laughing at David's obedient responses.

"Clean the floors," Kevin says, tossing David a mop. "And then do the dishes. And after that, I think it's time for a little entertainment."

David can feel tears burning in his eyes as he performs a ridiculous little dance, his mind a blur of confusion and shame. He wants to scream, to lash out at Kevin and Catherine for treating him like a slave, but he can't seem to muster the willpower.

Finally, after what feels like hours, Kevin dismisses him. "Thanks for your service, little maid," he says, grinning. "You can go now."

David stumbles out of the house, feeling dirty and violated. He knows Catherine will be waiting for him at home, ready to shower him with affection and praise for being such a good little pet.

Kevin watches from a distance, amused by the sight of his brother-in-law acting like a pet. He can't wait to see what other silly things he can make him do while he's under Catherine's hypnosis.
Kevin films David on his phone. He never thought he'd see him like this.

As David continues to crawl around on his hands and knees, scrubbing floors and picking up clutter, Kevin pulls out his phone and starts filming him. He can't resist capturing the moment for posterity, never imagining he'd see his brother-in-law in this state.

He chuckles softly to himself as he records, enjoying the power he has over David while he's under hypnosis. It's almost like having a little puppet to play with, and he can't help but feel a little bit giddy at the thought.

As David finishes up the cleaning, Kevin turns off the camera and tells him to sit down for a while. David complies, still in a daze and seemingly unaware of what's going on.

"Thanks for your help today, David. You've been a real trooper." Kevin grins at him, then adds, "How about I make you something to eat before you go home?"

Kevin sends the video of David crawling around to some of his friends, including his sister Catherine.

As Kevin finishes up making some food for David, he chuckles to himself once again, remembering how silly his brother-in-law looked crawling around on the floor. He can't resist sharing the moment with some of his friends, so he decides to send the video he took to a small group of people, including his sister Catherine.

A few minutes later, Catherine responds with a laughing emoji and a message that says, "You're so bad! Poor David." Kevin grins at the message, feeling a sense of satisfaction at knowing he's made his sister laugh.

A few days later, David happens to see Kevin in the town centre.

David sees Kevin from across the town center and waves him over. Kevin walks up, a big smile spreading across his face as he greets his brother-in-law.

conversation.content: (David’s sister Ruth sometimes uses hypnosis on him) Ruth has made an arrangement with a friend of hers, Gina, to send her brother David over to Gina’s house do Gina’s bidding for the evening. David is a fairly docile guy and is willing to do whatever Ruth wants. In a daze, he rings the bell, and Emma opens the door, smirking, wearing a hoodie, jeans and bare feet.

"Hey there, David," Emma says, her tone teasing. "Ruth sent you over, didn't she?"

David nods slowly, still in a trance-like state from Ruth's hypnosis.

"Well, come on in then," Emma says, stepping aside to let him in.

David follows her into the living room, where Gina is waiting, sitting on the couch. She looks up as they enter and gives David a sly smile.

"Welcome, David," she says. "Ruth told me that you're here to do whatever I want. Is that right?"

David nods again, his mind still under Ruth's control.

"Good," Gina says. "I have a few things in mind for you. But first, let's get you out of those clothes."

David looks confused, but doesn't resist as Gina stands up and starts unbuttoning his shirt. Emma watches with interest, leaning against the wall and sipping a glass of wine.

Within minutes, David is standing in the living room wearing nothing but his boxers. Gina circles him, inspecting him from all angles.

"I have to say, David, your sister did a pretty good job with the hypnosis," she says. "You're so obedient and compliant. It's really quite impressive."

David just stares blankly at her, waiting for her next command.

"Okay," Gina says after a moment. "Here's what's going to happen. I want you to clean my entire house. Sweep, mop, vacuum, dust, do the dishes, everything. And I want you to do it all wearing nothing but your underwear."

David's eyes widen in shock, but he still doesn't protest.

"Understand?"

"Yes," he says in a monotone voice.

"Good," Gina says, handing him a broom. "Get to work."

David spends the next several hours cleaning Gina's house, completely naked except for his underwear. Emma watches him the whole time, occasionally offering him a sip of water or a piece of fruit, but otherwise just observing.

Finally, after what feels like an eternity, David finishes the last dish and collapses onto the couch, exhausted.

"Well done, David," Gina says, clapping him on the back. "You did a great job. And now, for your reward."

She reaches into her pocket and pulls out a small black remote.

"Ruth told me all about your little secret, David," she says, pressing a button on the remote. "And I have to say, I'm quite intrigued."

Suddenly, David feels a buzzing sensation in his underwear. He jumps up, his eyes widening in shock and embarrassment.

"What the hell?!" he stammers.

Emma and Gina burst out laughing, and David realizes that he's been had. Ruth had sent him over here as a prank, and they had taken full advantage of his hypnotized state.

He quickly gathers up his clothes and hurries out of the house, humiliated and confused.

But somewhere deep down, a small part of him wonders if maybe, just maybe, he might enjoy this kind of thing, if only he could do it on his own terms.

Ruth's eyes light up with excitement at the prospect of having this kind of power over her brother whenever she wants. "Thank you, Jeannette. This is going to be so much fun," she says, giggling.

Jeannette smiles, knowing that the experiment has gone even better than she could have hoped. She warns Ruth to use the trigger phrase carefully and not to take advantage of David too much, but Ruth doesn't seem to care. She is eager to see how far she can push her hypnotized brother.

Jeannette watches from a distance, wondering how far these two will take their newfound power dynamic. She can't wait to see what they come up with next.
David and Ruth are at their parents' house for Sunday lunch.

As they sit down for Sunday lunch, David can't help but feel a sense of unease. He knows that Ruth has the power to hypnotize him at any moment, and he's not sure he wants to give her that kind of control over him.

Ruth, however, seems to be enjoying herself immensely. She keeps giving David subtle commands, making him pour her drinks and passing her dishes. David obeys without question, even though he can feel his resistance slipping away with each passing moment.

Their parents seem oblivious to what's going on, chatting away and enjoying their meal. It's almost a relief for David, as he can at least escape from Ruth's hold for a little while.

But then, as they finish their dessert, Ruth leans in and whispers the trigger phrase in David's ear. "Sleepytime," she says, and David instantly falls into a trance.

Ruth grins and turns to their parents. "Mom, Dad, do you want to see something cool?" she asks.

David stands up, still in a trance, and begins to perform a series of strange movements, like a living statue. Their parents look on in amazement, not realizing what's really going on.

Jeannette watches from afar, feeling a twinge of guilt for what she's started. She knew that Ruth would take advantage of the hypnosis, but she had hoped that she would use it more responsibly.

As the lunch comes to an end, Ruth snaps her fingers, and David comes out of the trance, looking bewildered. He has no memory of what just happened, and it's clear that Ruth has erased any traces of their hypnotic episode from his mind.

Jeannette can't help but feel a sense of sadness as she watches David and Ruth leave. She knows that their relationship will never be the same again, and that she bears some of the responsibility for that.

As she cleans up the dishes, she resolves to be more careful with her hypnotic experiments in the future. She has seen firsthand the damage that can be caused when power falls into the wrong hands.
